tika-s0403t0:5_1: Pañcakanipātassa paṭhame kāmaṃ sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvopi balaṭṭho eva,
tika-s0403t0:5_2: paṭipakkhehi pana akampanīyattaṃ sātisayaṃ balaṭṭhoti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0403t0:9_3: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadā nāma samadhigamo evāti āha “paṭilābhatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:10_0: Gatiatthā dhātusaddā buddhiatthā hontīti āha “udayañca vayañca paṭivijjhituṃ samatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:10_1: Missakanayenāyaṃ desanā gatāti āha “vikkhambhanavasena ca samucchedavasena cā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:10_3: Vipassanāpaññāya vikkhambhanakiriyato sā ca kho padesikāti nippadesikaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “maggapaññāya paṭilābhasaṃvattanato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:10_7: nāssa puna khepanakiccaṃ atthīti upāyena ñāyena sā pavattatīti āha “hetunā nayenā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:13_1: Sattame asanti lūnanti tenāti asitaṃ, dāttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:13_2: Vividhā ābhañjanti bhāraṃ olambenti tenāti byābhaṅgī, vidhaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:13_5: Tattha “tena kho pana samayena raṭṭhapālo nāma kulaputto tasmiṃyeva thullakoṭṭhike aggakulikassa putto”ti
tika-s0403t0:13_7: “Ye te kulaputtā saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā”ti evaṃ āgatā pana yattha katthaci kule pasutāpi ācārasampannā ācārakulaputto nāma.
tika-s0403t0:16_8: Āgamanīyappaṭipadāya āgatā hi saddhā sātisayā mahābodhisattānaṃ paropadesena vinā saddheyyavatthuṃ aviparītato gahetvā adhimuccanato.
tika-s0403t0:16_10: “Sammāsambuddho bhagavā”tiādinā buddhādīsu uppajjanakappasādo pasādasaddhā mahākappinarājādīnaṃ viya.
tika-s0403t0:16_15: Okappanasaddhā saddheyyaṃ vatthuṃ ogāhitvā anupavisitvā “evameta”nti paccakkhaṃ karontī viya pavattati.
tika-s0403t0:22_7: Ettha ca yassa catubbidhaṃ sīlaṃ akhaṇḍādibhāvappavattiyā suparisuddhaṃ visesabhāgiyattā appakasireneva maggaphalāvahaṃ saṅgharakkhitattherassa viya,
tika-s0403t0:22_8: so tādisena sīlena imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ āpajjissati.
tika-s0403t0:22_12: so virūḷhamūlo viya pādapo suppatiṭṭhitattā sāsane virūḷhiṃ āpanno nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t0:22_16: so arahā sīlādidhammakkhandhapāripūriyā sati vepullappatto hoti.
tika-s0403t0:27_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame abhijānitvāti abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena jānitvā.
tika-s0403t0:27_9: Abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato”ti evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi.
tika-s0403t0:30_1: Tatiye kāmaṃ sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvopi balaṭṭho eva,
tika-s0403t0:30_2: paṭipakkhehi pana akampanīyattaṃ sātisayaṃ balaṭṭhoti vuttaṃ “muṭṭhassacce na kampatī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:33_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana nepakkaṃ nāma paññāti adhippāyena “nepakkaṃ vuccati paññā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:33_4: Evaṃ sati añño niddiṭṭho nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t0:33_5: Satimāti ca iminā savisesā sati gahitāti paratopi “cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā anussaritā”ti satikiccameva niddiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:33_7: tasmā satinepakkenāti satiyā nepakkabhāvenāti sakkā viññātuṃ labbhateva.
tika-s0403t0:34_0: Cirakatampīti attanā vā parena vā kāyena cirakataṃ cetiyaṅgaṇavattādimahāvattappaṭipattipūraṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:34_1: Cirabhāsitampīti attanā vā parena vā vācāya cirabhāsitaṃ sakkaccaṃ uddisanauddisāpanadhammāsāraṇadhammadesanāupanisinnakaparikathāanumodanīyādivasena
tika-s0403t0:34_3: Saritā anussaritāti tasmiṃ kāyena cirakate kāyo nāma kāyaviññatti,
tika-s0403t0:34_7: Iti ime rūpārūpadhammā evaṃ uppajjitvā evaṃ niruddhāti sarati ceva anussarati ca,
tika-s0403t0:34_10: Tāya satiyā esa sakiṃ saraṇena saritā,
tika-s0403t0:37_1: Pañcame savisayasmiṃyevāti attano attano visaye eva.
tika-s0403t0:37_2: Lokiyalokuttaradhamme kathetunti lokiyadhamme lokuttaradhamme ca tena tena pavattivisesena kathetuṃ.
tika-s0403t0:37_3: Catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesūti sappurisasaṃsevo saddhammassavanaṃ yonisomanasikāro dhammānudhammappaṭipattīti imesu catūsu sotāpattimaggakāraṇesu.
tika-s0403t0:37_4: Kāmañca tesu satiādayopi dhammā icchitabbāva tehi vinā tesaṃ asambhavato,
tika-s0403t0:37_5: tathāpi cettha saddhā visesato kiccakārīti veditabbā.
tika-s0403t0:38_3: sammappadhānabhāvanāya vīriyaṃ viya ca satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya yasmā “vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassa”nti
tika-s0403t0:38_4: vacanato pubbabhāge kiccato sati adhikā icchitabbā,
tika-s0403t0:38_6: “ariyasaccabhāvanā paññābhāvanā”ti katvā tattha paññā pubbabhāge adhikā icchitabbāti pākaṭoyamattho.
tika-s0403t0:38_7: Adhigamakkhaṇe pana samādhipaññānaṃ viya sabbesampi balānaṃ saddhādīnaṃ samatāva icchitabbā.
tika-s0403t0:38_8: Tathā hi “ettha saddhābala”ntiādinā tattha tattha etthaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0403t0:39_0: Idāni saddhādīnaṃ tattha tattha atirekakiccataṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:39_3: Nesaṃ kīḷanatthaṃ ekajjhaṃ vīthiotaraṇaṃ viya balānaṃ ekajjhaṃ vipassanāvīthiotaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:39_4: sahāyesu paṭhamādīnaṃ yathāsakaṃ geheva vicāraṇā viya saddhādīnaṃ sotāpattiaṅgādīni patvā pubbaṅgamatā.
tika-s0403t0:39_5: Sahāyesu itaresaṃ tattha tattha tuṇhībhāvo viya sesabalānaṃ tattha tattha tadanvayatā,
tika-s0403t0:39_7: Na hi tadā tesaṃ sasambhārapathavīādīsu āpādīnaṃ viya kiccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-s0403t0:39_8: saddhādīnaṃyeva pana kiccaṃ vibhūtaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati puretaraṃ tathāpaccayehi cittasantānassa abhisaṅkhatattā.
tika-s0403t0:39_9: Ettha ca vipassanākammikassa bhāvanā visesato paññuttarāti dassanatthaṃ rājānaṃ nidassanaṃ katvā paññindriyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:44_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame ābhisamācārikanti abhisamācāre uttamasamācāre bhavaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:47_1: Tatiye na ca pabhāvantanti na ca pabhāsampannaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:47_7: Uppajjituṃ appadānenāti ettha nanu lokiyakusalacittassapi suvisuddhassapi uppajjituṃ appadāneneva upakkilesatāti?
tika-s0403t0:47_12: Parittakusalaṃ pana yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjamānaṃ nīvaraṇehi upahate santāne uppattiyā aparisuddhaṃ hontaṃ
tika-s0403t0:47_14: Apica nippariyāyato uppajjituṃ appadāneneva tesaṃ upakkilesatāti dassento “yadaggena hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t0:50_1: Pañcame sammādiṭṭhīti vipassanāsammādiṭṭhītiādinā aṅguttarabhāṇakānaṃ matena ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā āraddhā,
tika-s0403t0:51_2: Phalakkhaṇe nibbattā cetovimutti phalaṃ assāti cetovimuttiphalā.
tika-s0403t0:51_3: Tadeva cetovimuttisaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ ānisaṃso assāti cetovimuttiphalānisaṃsā.
tika-s0403t0:51_14: kammaṭṭhāne khalanapakkhalanaṃ chindantassa vipassanāpādikāsu aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu kammaṃ karontassa,
tika-s0403t0:51_15: sattavidhaṃ anupassanaṃ bhāventassa arahattamaggo uppajjitvā phalaṃ deti.
tika-s0403t0:52_0: “Yathā hi madhuraṃ ambapakkaṃ paribhuñjitukāmo ambapotakassa samantā udakakoṭṭhakaṃ thiraṃ katvā bandhati,
tika-s0403t0:52_1: ghaṭaṃ gahetvā kālena kālaṃ udakaṃ āsiñcati,
tika-s0403t0:52_3: Yā hoti samīpe valli vā sukkhadaṇḍako vā kipillikapuṭo vā makkaṭakajālaṃ vā,
tika-s0403t0:52_5: khaṇittiṃ gahetvā kālena kālaṃ mūlāni parikhaṇati,
tika-s0403t0:52_6: evamassa appamattassa imāni pañca kāraṇāni karoto so ambo vaḍḍhitvā phalaṃ deti,
tika-s0403t0:52_8: Rukkhassa samantato koṭṭhakabandhanaṃ viya hi sīlaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:52_11: samīpe valliādīnaṃ haraṇaṃ viya kammaṭṭhāne khalanapakkhalanacchedanaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:52_12: kālena kālaṃ khaṇittiṃ gahetvā mūlakhaṇanaṃ viya sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ bhāvanā,
tika-s0403t0:52_13: tehi pañcahi kāraṇehi anuggahitassa ambarukkhassa madhuraphaladānakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno imehi pañcahi
tika-s0403t0:53_0: Ettha ca laddhūpakārāti yathārahaṃ nissayādivasena laddhapaccayā.
tika-s0403t0:53_1: Vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiyā anuggahitabhāvena gahitattā maggasammādiṭṭhīsu ca arahattamaggasammādiṭṭhi.
tika-s0403t0:53_3: aggaphalasamādhimhi tapparikkhāradhammesuyeva ca kevalo cetopariyāyo niruḷhoti sammādiṭṭhīti arahattamaggasammādiṭṭhi.
tika-s0403t0:53_4: Phalakkhaṇeti anantaraṃ kālantare cāti duvidhepi phalakkhaṇe.
tika-s0403t0:53_9: Sabbakilesehi cetaso vimuccanasaṅkhātaṃ paṭippassambhanasaññitaṃ pahānaṃ phalaṃ ānisaṃso cāti yojanā.
tika-s0403t0:53_12: Aññathā phaladhammā eva ānisaṃsoti gayhamāne punavacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā.
tika-s0403t0:53_17: Sammāsatisammāvāyāmā pana samādhipakkhiyā evāti āha “avasesā dhammā cetovimuttīti veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:54_5: Tassa kammaṭṭhānassa ekavāraṃ vidhiyā appaṭipajjanaṃ khalanaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:54_8: Pūrentassāti vivaṭṭasannissitaṃ katvā pālentassa brūhentassa ca.
tika-s0403t0:55_1: Thiraṃ katvā bandhatīti asithilaṃ daḷhaṃ nātimahantaṃ nātikhuddakaṃ katvā yojeti.
tika-s0403t0:55_2: Thiraṃ karotīti udakasiñcanakāle tato tato pavattitvā udakassa anikkhamanatthaṃ jalāvāṭapāḷiṃ thirataraṃ karoti.
tika-s0403t0:55_6: Koṭṭhakabandhanaṃ viya sīlaṃ sammādiṭṭhiyā vaḍḍhanūpāyassa mūlabhāvato.
tika-s0403t0:55_8: Mariyādāya thirabhāvakaraṇaṃ viya samatho yathāvuttāya bhāvanādhiṭṭhānāya sīlamariyādāya daḷhībhāvāpādanato.
tika-s0403t0:55_10: Samīpe valliādīnaṃ haraṇaṃ viya kammaṭṭhāne khalanapakkhalanacchedanaṃ icchitabbabhāvanāya vibandhanāpanayanato.
tika-s0403t0:55_11: Mūlakhaṇanaṃ viya sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ bhāvanā tassā vibandhassa mūlabhūtānaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīnaṃ palikhaṇanato.
tika-s0403t0:55_12: Ettha ca yasmā suparisuddhasīlassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjantassa sappāyadhammassavanaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:55_16: paripuṇṇā vipassanā maggasammādiṭṭhiṃ brūhetīti evametesaṃ aṅgānaṃ paramparāya sammukhā anuggaṇhanato ayamānupubbī kathitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:58_1: Chaṭṭhe vimuttiyā vaṭṭadukkhato vimuccanassa āyatanāni kāraṇāni vimuttāyatanānīti āha –
tika-s0403t0:58_6: Pāḷiṃ jānantassāti tadatthabodhiniṃ pāḷiṃ yāthāvato upadhārentassa.
tika-s0403t0:58_9: Yathādesitaṃ dhammaṃ upadhārentassa tadanucchavikameva attano kāyavācāmanosamācāraṃ pariggaṇhantassa
tika-s0403t0:58_11: Tuṭṭhākārabhūtā balavapītīti purimuppannāya pītiyā vasena laddhāsevanattā ativiya tuṭṭhākārabhūtā kāyacittadarathassa
tika-s0403t0:58_12: passambhanasamatthatāya passaddhiyā paccayo bhavituṃ samatthā balappattā pīti jāyati.
tika-s0403t0:58_13: Yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopi passaddho eva hoti,
tika-s0403t0:59_0: Sukhaṃ paṭilabhatīti vakkhamānassa cittasamādhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ cetasikaṃ nirāmisasukhaṃ paṭilabhati vindati.
tika-s0403t0:59_1: Samādhiyatīti ettha pana na yo koci samādhi adhippeto,
tika-s0403t0:59_4: “Ayaṃ hī”tiādi tassaṃ desanāyaṃ tādisassa puggalassa yathāvuttasamādhipaṭilābhassa kāraṇabhāvavibhāvanaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:59_7: Samādhiyeva samādhinimittanti kammaṭṭhānapāḷiyā āruḷho samādhi eva parato uppajjanakabhāvanāsamādhissa kāraṇabhāvato samādhinimittaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:62_1: Sattame sabbaso kilesadukkhadarathapariḷāhānaṃ vigatattā sātisayamettha sukhanti vuttaṃ “appitappitakkhaṇe sukhattā paccuppannasukho”ti.
tika-s0403t0:62_2: Purimassa purimassa vasena pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ laddhāsevanatāya santapaṇītatarabhāvappattaṃ hotīti āha “purimo…pe…
tika-s0403t0:62_9: Imassa pana arahattasamādhissa paṭippassaddhasabbakilesattā na niggahetabbaṃ vāretabbañca atthīti maggānantaraṃ
tika-s0403t0:62_10: samāpattikkhaṇe ca appayogena adhigatattā appitattā ca aparihānivasena vā appitattā na sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato.
tika-s0403t0:62_11: Sativepullappattattāti etena appavattamānāyapi satiyā satibahulatāya sato eva nāmāti dasseti.
tika-s0403t0:65_1: Aṭṭhame karo vuccati pupphasambhavaṃ “gabbhāsaye kirīyatī”ti katvā.
tika-s0403t0:65_5: “abhisandetī”tiādivacanato pana rūpakāyo idha adhippetoti āha “imaṃ karajakāya”nti.
tika-s0403t0:65_7: Taṃ pana abhisandanaṃ jhānamayena pītisukhena karajakāyassa tintabhāvāpādanaṃ sabbatthakameva lūkhabhāvāpanayananti āha “temetī”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:65_8: Tayidaṃ abhisandanaṃ atthato yathāvuttapītisukhasamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi kāyassa parippharaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:65_12: Avayavāvayavisambandhe avayavini sāmivacananti avayavavisayo sabba- saddo,
tika-s0403t0:65_14: Aphuṭaṃ nāma na hoti yattha yattha kammajarūpaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:66_1: Taṃ panassa kosallaṃ nahānīyacuṇṇānaṃ karaṇe piṇḍikaraṇe ca samatthatāvasena veditabbanti āha “paṭibalo”tiādi. Kaṃsa-
tika-s0403t0:66_2: saddo “mahatiyā kaṃsapātiyā”tiādīsu suvaṇṇe āgato.“Kaṃso upahato yathā”tiādīsu kittimalohe.
tika-s0403t0:66_5: Idha pana yattha katthaci loheti āha “yena kenaci lohena katabhājane”ti.
tika-s0403t0:66_7: Snehaparetāti udakasinehena parito gatā samantato phuṭā.
tika-s0403t0:66_10: Na ca pagghariṇīti etena tintassapi tassa ghanathaddhabhāvaṃ vadati.
tika-s0403t0:68_9: Yāva aggā yāva ca mūlā udakena abhisandanādisambhavadassanatthaṃ udakānuggataggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:69_3: Yasmā pana pārisuddhiyā eva paccayavisesena pavattiviseso pariyodātatā sudhantasuvaṇṇassa nighaṃsanena pabhassaratā viya,
tika-s0403t0:69_10: Vatthaṃ viya karajakāyoti yogino karajakāyo vatthaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo utupharaṇasadisena catutthajjhānasukhena pharitabbattā.
tika-s0403t0:69_11: Purisassa sarīraṃ viya catutthajjhānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ utupharaṇaṭṭhāniyassa sukhassa nissayabhāvato.
tika-s0403t0:69_13: Tattha ca “parisuddhena cetasā”ti cetogahaṇena jhānasukhaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:70_0: Tassa tassa samādhissa sarūpadassanassa paccayattā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇanimittaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:71_1: Yattha salilasiñcanena vināva sassāni ṭhitāni sampajjanti.
tika-s0403t0:71_4: Tesaṃ sikkhāpanato hatthiādayopi “yoggā”ti vuccantīti āha pāḷiyaṃ “assadammasārathī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:71_5: Yena yenāti catūsu maggesu yena yena maggena.
tika-s0403t0:71_6: Yaṃ yaṃ gatinti javasamajavādibhedāsu gatīsu yaṃ yaṃ gatiṃ.
tika-s0403t0:74_1: Dasame uccāsaddamahāsaddāti uddhaṃ uggatattā ucco patthaṭo mahanto vinibbhijjitvā gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyo saddo etesanti uccāsaddamahāsaddā.
tika-s0403t0:74_2: Vacīghosopi hi bahūhi ekajjhaṃ pavattito atthato saddato ca duravabodho kevalaṃ mahānigghoso eva hutvā sotapathamāgacchati.
tika-s0403t0:74_5: Kevaṭṭānañhi macchapacchiṭhapitaṭṭhāne mahājano sannipatitvā “idha aññaṃ ekaṃ macchaṃ dehi,
tika-s0403t0:74_8: mayhaṃ khuddako”ti evaṃ uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karonti.
tika-s0403t0:74_9: Macchaggahaṇatthaṃ jāle pakkhittepi tasmiṃ ṭhāne kevaṭṭā ceva aññe ca “paviṭṭho gahito”ti mahāsaddaṃ karonti.
tika-s0403t0:74_13: Pavivekasukhassāti gaṇasaṅgaṇikato kilesasaṅgaṇikato ca vigatassa sukhassa.
tika-s0403t0:79_6: “ito cito ca uṭṭhitena valāhakakūṭasatena samannāgatoti attho”ti.
tika-s0403t0:79_10: disvā pana kattabbakiccassa kilesappahānassa akaraṇato na taṃ “dassana”nti vuccati.
tika-s0403t0:79_14: tasmā dhammacakkhuṃ punappunaṃ nibbattanena bhāvanaṃ appattaṃ dassanaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:79_15: dhammacakkhuñca pariññādikiccakaraṇena catusaccadhammadassanaṃ tadabhisamayoti natthettha gotrabhussa dassanabhāvāpatti.
tika-s0403t0:82_1: Dutiye “ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato”tiādīsu ariyakantānīti pañcasīlāni āgatāni.
tika-s0403t0:82_2: Ariyakantāni hi pañcasīlāni ariyānaṃ kantāni piyāni,
tika-s0403t0:82_7: agge te paripūrakārino”ti vuttattā maggaphalāni sīlāni adhippetānīti āha “ariyakantāni sīlānīti maggaphalasampayuttāni sīlānī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:85_1: Tatiye sabbapaṭhamaṃ uṭṭhānasīlāti rattiyā vibhāyanavelāya sāmike parijane seyyāya avuṭṭhite sabbapaṭhamaṃ uṭṭhānasīlā.
tika-s0403t0:85_2: Sāmikaṃ disvā nisinnāsanato aggidaḍḍhā viya paṭhamameva vuṭṭhahantīti vā pubbuṭṭhāyiniyo.
tika-s0403t0:86_4: Tenāha “alaṃ kātuṃ alaṃ saṃvidhātunti attanā kātumpi parehi kārāpetumpī”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:89_3: Na saddhāmattakeneva tiṭṭhatīti “dānaṃ nāma sādhu sundaraṃ,
tika-s0403t0:89_4: buddhādīhi paṇḍitehi pasattha”nti evaṃ saddhāmattakeneva na tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0403t0:89_5: Yaṃ dānaṃ detīti yaṃ deyyadhammaṃ parassa deti.
tika-s0403t0:89_6: Tassa pati hutvāti tabbisayaṃ lobhaṃ suṭṭhu abhibhavanto tassa adhipati hutvā deti.
tika-s0403t0:89_7: Tena anadhibhavanīyattā na dāso na sahāyoti.
tika-s0403t0:89_8: Tattha tadubhayaṃ anvayato byatirekato ca dassetuṃ “yo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:89_11: Sāmī hutvā deti tattha taṇhādāsabyato attānaṃ mocetvā abhibhuyya pavattanato.
tika-s0403t0:89_12: Atha vā yo dānasīlatāya dāyako puggalo,
tika-s0403t0:89_16: Tadassa tippakārataṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “yo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:90_1: taṇhādhipannatāya tassa vasena vattanato dāso viya hoti.
tika-s0403t0:90_3: tatthāpi annapānasāmaññena idaṃ vuttaṃ “dānasaṅkhātassa deyyadhammassa dāso hutvā”ti.

tika-s0403t0:94_3: Bhāsitaññūti bhikkhū gharadvāre ṭhitā kiñcāpi tuṇhī honti,
tika-s0403t0:94_4: atthato pana “bhikkhaṃ dethā”ti vadanti nāma ariyāya yācanāya.

tika-s0403t0:97_1: Aṭṭhame anukampantīti “sabbe sattā sukhī hontu averā abyāpajjā”ti evaṃ hitapharaṇena anuggaṇhanti.
tika-s0403t0:97_2: Apica upaṭṭhākānaṃ gehaṃ aññe sīlavante sabrahmacārino gahetvā pavisantāpi anuggaṇhanti nāma.
tika-s0403t0:97_4: Kodhamānathaddhatāya rahitanti kodhamānavasena uppanno yo thaddhabhāvo cittassa uddhumātalakkhaṇo,
tika-s0403t0:97_11: Sabbopi sīlasaṃvaro soracca”nti evamāgatena sīlasaṃvarasaṅkhātena soratabhāvena.
tika-s0403t0:97_13: Yā sā vācā thaddhakā kakkasā pharusā kaṭukā abhisajjanī kodhasāmantā asamādhisaṃvattanikā,
tika-s0403t0:97_14: tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ pahāya yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā,
tika-s0403t0:97_17: idaṃ vuccati sākhalya”nti evaṃ vuttena sammodakamudubhāvena samannāgataṃ.
tika-s0403t0:100_2: Taṃ pana bharaṇaṃ jātakālato paṭṭhāya sukhapaccayūpaharaṇena dukkhapaccayāpaharaṇena ca pavattitanti dassetuṃ “amhehī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:100_5: Mātāpitūnaṃ santakaṃ khettādiṃ avināsetvā rakkhitaṃ tesaṃ paramparāya ṭhitiyā kāraṇaṃ hotīti āha “amhākaṃ santakaṃ…pe…
tika-s0403t0:100_8: Yasmā dāyajjappaṭilābhassa yogyabhāvena vattamānoyeva dāyassa paṭipajjissati,
tika-s0403t0:100_10: Attanā dāyajjārahaṃ karontoti attānaṃ dāyajjārahaṃ karonto.
tika-s0403t0:100_11: Mātāpitaro hi attano ovāde avattamāne micchāpaṭipanne dārake vinicchayaṃ gantvā aputte karonti,
tika-s0403t0:100_13: Ovāde vattamāne pana kulasantakassa sāmike karonti.
tika-s0403t0:105_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatehīti vā uṭṭhānena ca vīriyena ca adhigatehi.
tika-s0403t0:108_1: Tatiye appamādaṃ pasaṃsantīti “etāni āyuādīni patthayantena appamādo kātabbo”ti appamādameva pasaṃsanti paṇḍitā.
tika-s0403t0:108_2: Yasmā vā puññakiriyāsu paṇḍitā appamādaṃ pasaṃsanti,
tika-s0403t0:108_3: tasmā āyuādīni patthayantena appamādova kātabboti attho.
tika-s0403t0:108_6: yasmā ca puññakiriyāsu appamatto ubho atthe adhigato hoti,
tika-s0403t0:108_8: Dutiyasmiṃ atthavikappe paṇḍitā appamādaṃ pasaṃsanti. Katthāti?
tika-s0403t0:108_11: Yasmā appamatto ubho atthe adhiggaṇhāti paṇḍito,
tika-s0403t0:111_1: Catutthe jhānamanena nibbattaṃ manomayanti āha “suddhāvāsesu ekaṃ jhānamanena nibbattaṃ devakāya”nti.
tika-s0403t0:111_2: Satipi hi sabbasattānaṃ abhisaṅkhāramanasā nibbattabhāve bāhirapaccayehi vinā manasāva nibbattattā “manomayā”ti vuccanti rūpāvacarasattā.
tika-s0403t0:111_3: Yadi evaṃ kāmabhave opapātikasattānampi manomayabhāvo āpajjatīti ce? Na,
tika-s0403t0:111_4: tattha bāhirapaccayehi nibbattetabbatāsaṅkāya eva abhāvato “manasāva nibbattā”ti avadhāraṇāsambhavato.
tika-s0403t0:114_2: Yojanavasena panassa saṅkhā atthi heṭṭhā mahāpathaviyā upari ākāsena parisamantato cakkavāḷapabbatena
tika-s0403t0:114_3: majjhe tattha tattha ṭhitakehi dīpapabbatapariyantehi paricchinnattā jānantena yojanato saṅkhātuṃ sakkāti katvā.
tika-s0403t0:114_4: Mahāsarīramacchakumbhīlayakkharakkhasamahānāgadānavādīnaṃ saviññāṇakānaṃ balavāmukhapātālādīnaṃ aviññāṇakānaṃ bheravārammaṇānaṃ vasena bahubheravaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:117_2: Sīlañca yassa kalyāṇanti kalyāṇasīlaṃ nāma ariyasāvakassa ariyakantaṃ sīlaṃ vuccati.
tika-s0403t0:117_3: Tattha kiñcāpi ariyasāvakassa ekasīlampi akantaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-s0403t0:117_4: imasmiṃ panatthe bhavantarepi appahīnaṃ pañcasīlaṃ adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:120_1: Navame patitakkhandhoti sammukhā kiñci oloketuṃ asamatthatāya adhomukho.

tika-s0403t0:130_3: Ettha ca āvarantīti kusaladhammuppattiṃ ādito parivārenti.
tika-s0403t0:130_6: Nīvaraṇavasenāti niravasesato vāraṇavasenāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0403t0:130_7: Yasmā pañca nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na denti,
tika-s0403t0:130_8: uppannāpi aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca vā abhiññā upacchinditvā pātenti,
tika-s0403t0:130_10: Upacchindanaṃ pātanañcettha tāsaṃ paññānaṃ anuppannānaṃ uppajjituṃ appadānameva.
tika-s0403t0:130_11: Iti mahaggatānuttarapaññānaṃ ekaccāya ca parittapaññāya anuppattihetubhūtā nīvaraṇadhammā itarāsaṃ samatthataṃ
tika-s0403t0:130_13: Bhāvanāmanasikārena vinā pakatiyā manussehi nibbattetabbo dhammoti manussadhammo,
tika-s0403t0:130_22: alamariyo ca so ñāṇadassanaviseso cāti alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso.
tika-s0403t0:131_0: Ñāṇadassananti ca dibbacakkhupi vipassanāpi maggopi phalampi paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi sabbaññutaññāṇampi vuccati.
tika-s0403t0:131_1: “Appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṃ ārādhetī”ti hi ettha dibbacakkhu ñāṇadassanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0403t0:131_3: “Abhabbā te ñāṇāya dassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāyā”ti ettha maggo.
tika-s0403t0:131_4: “Ayamañño uttarimanussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti ettha phalaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:131_9: “Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi ‘sattāhakālakato āḷāro kālāmo”’ti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:131_11: Ettha ca rūpāyatanaṃ jānāti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viya passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:131_13: Sammasanūpacāre ca dhammalakkhaṇattayañca tathā jānāti passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:131_15: Nibbānaṃ cattāri vā saccāni asammohappaṭivedhato jānāti passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṃ, maggo.
tika-s0403t0:131_17: Paccavekkhaṇā maggādhigatassa atthassa sabbaso jotanaṭṭhena ñāṇadassanaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:134_7: “Abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya āgatattā”ti vuttattā paccekabodhisattasāvakabodhisattānampi paṇidhānato pabhuti āgatasaddhā āgamanasaddā eva,
tika-s0403t0:134_9: Adhigamato samudāgatattā aggamaggaphalasampayuttā cāpi adhigamasaddhā nāma,
tika-s0403t0:134_15: Yathā tena paṭividdhena sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ hatthagataṃ ahosi,
tika-s0403t0:134_18: tassa dhammasudhammatāya saṅghasuppaṭipannatāya tena paṭivedhena saddhā na tathāti aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso.
tika-s0403t0:134_21: buddhe pasanno dhamme pasanno saṅghe pasanno”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:134_22: Padhānavīriyaṃ ijjhati “addhā imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇato muccissāmī”ti sakkaccaṃ padahanato.
tika-s0403t0:135_4: Daḷhaṃ katvā pacantī hi gahaṇī ghorabhāvena pittavikārādivasena rogaṃ janeti,
tika-s0403t0:135_5: sithilaṃ katvā pacantī mandabhāvena vātavikārādivasena tenāha “nātisītāya nāccuṇhāyā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:135_6: Gahaṇitejassa mandapaṭutāvasena sattānaṃ yathākkamaṃ sītuṇhasahatāti āha “atisītalaggahaṇiko”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:135_7: Yāthāvato accayadesanā attano āvikaraṇaṃ nāmāti āha “yathābhūtaṃ attano aguṇaṃ pakāsetā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:135_8: Udayatthagāminiyāti saṅkhārānaṃ udayañca vayañca paṭivijjhantiyāti ayamettha atthoti āha “udayañcā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:135_10: Nibbijjhituṃ samatthāyāti tadaṅgavasena savisesaṃ pajahituṃ samatthāya.
tika-s0403t0:135_11: Tassa dukkhassa khayagāminiyāti yaṃ dukkhaṃ imasmiṃ ñāṇe anadhigate pavattirahaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:142_5: Tenāha “catasso disā ca anudisā ca mayhaṃ na upaṭṭhahantī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:145_8: Taṃ pana dāyajjaṃ kāraṇūpacārena vadanto “kammaṃ mayhaṃ dāyajjaṃ santakanti attho”ti āha yathā “kusalānaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:145_12: Yonīhi phalaṃ sabhāvato bhinnampi abhinnaṃ viya missitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:145_16: kammaṃ pana ekantasambandhavāti āha “kammaṃ mayhaṃ bandhū”ti.

tika-s0403t0:146_8: tadubhayaṃ anoloketvā pabandhaṭṭhitiṃ paccayasulabhatañca nissāya “ciraṃ jīviṃ,
tika-s0403t0:147_6: Kāmāpi “yaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:147_7: ayaṃ kāmānaṃ assādo”ti evaṃ vuttassa sukhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato “upadhiyati ettha sukha”nti iminā vacanatthena “upadhī”ti vuccati,

tika-s0403t0:151_0: Anvāya upanissāya jīvanasīlā anujīvinoti āha “ye ca etaṃ upanissāya jīvantī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:151_1: Ekaṃ mahākulaṃ nissāya paṇṇāsampi saṭṭhipi kulāni jīvanti,
tika-s0403t0:156_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame “mahapphalā mahānisaṃsā”ti ubhayampetaṃ atthato ekaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:156_5: Mahato lokuttarassa sukhassa paccayā hontīti mahānisaṃsā.
tika-s0403t0:156_11: Āhāre paṭikūlasaññāti āhāraṃ gamanādivasena paṭikūlato pariggaṇhantassa uppannasaññā.
tika-s0403t0:164_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame avijjāpalighanti ettha avijjāti vaṭṭamūlikā avijjā,

tika-s0403t0:164_7: Jātisaṃsāroti jāyanavasena ceva saṃsaraṇavasena ca evaṃladdhanāmānaṃ punabbhavakkhandhānaṃ paccayo kammābhisaṅkhāro.
tika-s0403t0:164_9: Tañhi punappunaṃ uppattikāraṇavasena parikkhipitvā ṭhitattā “parikhā”ti vuccati santānassa parikkhipanato.
tika-s0403t0:164_10: Tenesa tassa saṃkiṇṇattā vikiṇṇattā sabbaso khittattā vināsitattā “saṃkiṇṇaparikho”ti vutto.
tika-s0403t0:165_4: Etāni hi kavāṭaṃ viya nagaradvāraṃ cittaṃ pidahitvā ṭhitattā “aggaḷā”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0403t0:165_6: Aggamaggena panno apacito mānaddhajo etassāti pannaddhajo.
tika-s0403t0:165_8: Visaṃyuttoti catūhi yogehi sabbakilesehi ca visaṃyutto.
tika-s0403t0:165_9: Asmimānoti rūpe asmīti māno, vedanāya, saññāya,
tika-s0403t0:165_12: Ettha hi pañcapi khandhe avisesato “asmī”ti gahetvā pavattamāno asmimānoti adhippeto.
tika-s0403t0:166_0: Nagaradvārassa parissayapaṭibāhanatthañceva sodhanatthañca ubhosu passesu esikāthambhe nikhaṇitvā ṭhapetīti āha “nagaradvāre ussāpite esikāthambhe”ti.
tika-s0403t0:166_1: Pākāraviddhaṃsaneneva parikhābhūmisamakaraṇaṃ hotīti āha “pākāraṃ bhinditvā parikhaṃ vikiritvā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:169_9: Mā pamajjitthāti “jhāyathā”ti vuttasamathavipassanānaṃ ananuyuñjanena aññena vā kenaci pamādakāraṇena mā pamādaṃ āpajjittha.
tika-s0403t0:169_12: Sabbepi sāsane guṇā idheva saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti āha “jhāyatha mā pamādattha…pe…
tika-s0403t0:172_4: Santhambhitvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkotīti baddho dhitisampanno ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0403t0:173_0: Rajaggasminti paccatte bhummavacananti āha “kiṃ tassa puggalassa rajaggaṃ nāmā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:176_1: Chaṭṭhe cammanti iminā cammamayaṃ cammamiti sibbitaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:176_3: Dhanukalāpaṃ sannayhitvāti dhanuñceva tūṇirañca sannayhitvā sajjetvā.
tika-s0403t0:176_6: Yuddhasannivesena ṭhitanti dvinnaṃ senānaṃ byūhanasaṃvidhānanayena kato yo sanniveso,
tika-s0403t0:176_9: Ussāhañca vāyāmañca karotīti yujjhanavasena ussāhaṃ vāyāmañca karoti.
tika-s0403t0:176_12: jīvitaṃ pariyāpādayanti maraṇaṃ paṭipajjāpentīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:177_0: Arakkhiteneva kāyenātiādīsu hatthapāde kīḷāpento gīvaṃ viparivattento kāyaṃ na rakkhati nāma.
tika-s0403t0:177_1: Nānappakāraṃ duṭṭhullaṃ karonto vācaṃ na rakkhati nāma.
tika-s0403t0:177_2: Kāmavitakkādayo vitakkento cittaṃ na rakkhati nāma.
tika-s0403t0:177_5: Rāgaparetoti vā rāgena phuṭṭho phuṭṭhavisena viya sappena.
tika-s0403t0:178_6: Avaṇe vaṇaṃ uppādetvā anto anupavisanasabhāvatāya vinivijjhanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0403t0:181_3: Taṃ pana caṅkamanavasena karaṇe “kāyika”ntipi vattabbataṃ labhatīti āha –
tika-s0403t0:181_5: Satthakavātāti sandhibandhanāni kattariyā chindantā viya pavattavātā. Tenāha –
tika-s0403t0:181_8: Te kira katakammā yaṃ nesaṃ devataṃ āyācitvā kammaṃ nipphannaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:181_9: tassa upakāratthāya manusse māretvā galalohitāni gaṇhanti.
tika-s0403t0:181_11: pabbajitaṃ pariyesanto nāma natthī”ti maññamānā bhikkhū gahetvā mārenti.
tika-s0403t0:181_13: Akatakammehīti aṭavito gāmaṃ āgamanakāle kammanipphattatthaṃ puretaraṃ balikammaṃ kātukāmehi.
tika-s0403t0:184_1: Navame pāḷigambhīrāti pāḷivasena gambhīrā agādhā dukkhogāhā sallasuttasadisā.
tika-s0403t0:184_4: Tathā hi tattha tā tā gāthā duviññeyyarūpā tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0403t0:184_11: so atthabhūto etesaṃ atthīti lokuttarā. Tenāha –
tika-s0403t0:184_15: Uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbanti ca liṅgavacanavipallāsena vuttanti āha “uggahetabbe ceva vaḷañjetabbe cā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:184_18: taṃ tena katanti vuccatīti āha “kavitāti kavīhi katā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:184_26: Sussūsissantīti akkharacittatāya ceva sarasampattiyā ca attamanā hutvā sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhumātugāmamahāgahapatikādayo
tika-s0403t0:187_11: Tesu parehi vā kathiyamānaṃ rūpādisampattiṃ attanā vā sitalapitagītasaddaṃ suṇantassa sotaviññāṇavīthivasena uppanno rāgo savanasaṃsaggo nāma.
tika-s0403t0:187_12: Visabhāgarūpaṃ olokentassa pana cakkhuviññāṇavīthivasena uppanno rāgo dassanasaṃsaggo nāma.
tika-s0403t0:187_15: bhikkhuniyā bhikkhussa santakaṃ gahetvā paribhogakaraṇavasena uppannarāgo sambhogasaṃsaggo nāma.
tika-s0403t0:188_4: Yathā vā “ācayaṃ gāmino”ti vattabbe anunāsikalopena “ācayagāmino”ti niddeso kato,
tika-s0403t0:189_0: “Sannidhikatassa paribhoga”nti ettha pana duvidhā kathā vinayavasena sallekhavasena ca.
tika-s0403t0:189_1: Vinayavasena tāva yaṃ kiñci annaṃ ajja paṭiggahitaṃ aparajju sannidhikāraṃ hoti,
tika-s0403t0:189_3: Attanā laddhaṃ pana sāmaṇerānaṃ datvā tehi laddhaṃ vā pāpetvā dutiyadivase bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-s0403t0:189_11: Sace yassa kassaci dātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0403t0:189_13: so uddesatthāya vā paripucchatthāya vā gato,
tika-s0403t0:189_17: satiyā vā paccāsāya anuññātakālaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0403t0:189_18: Sūcisuttacīvarakārakānaṃ alābhe tatopi vinayakammaṃ katvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati “imasmiṃ jiṇṇe puna īdisaṃ kuto labhissāmī”ti pana ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-s0403t0:190_0: Yānasannidhimhi yānaṃ nāma vayhaṃ ratho sakaṭaṃ sandamānikā pāṭaṅkīti.
tika-s0403t0:190_4: eko dhotapādakatthāyāti ukkaṃsato dve upāhanasaṅghāṭakā vaṭṭanti,
tika-s0403t0:190_6: “Imasmiṃ jiṇṇe aññaṃ kuto labhissāmī”ti ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-s0403t0:190_11: eko divāṭṭhāneti ukkaṃsato dve mañcā vaṭṭanti.
tika-s0403t0:190_17: Gandhasannidhimhi bhikkhuno kaṇḍukacchuchavidosādiābādhe sati gandhā vaṭṭanti.
tika-s0403t0:190_18: Gandhatthikena gandhañca āharāpetvā tasmiṃ roge vūpasante aññesaṃ vā ābādhikānaṃ dātabbaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:190_20: “Puna roge sati bhavissatī”ti ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-s0403t0:191_2: idhekacco bhikkhu “tathārūpe kāle upakārāya bhavissantī”ti tilataṇḍulamuggamāsanāḷikeraloṇamacchasappitelakulālabhājanādīni āharāpetvā ṭhapeti.
tika-s0403t0:191_3: So vassakāle kālasseva sāmaṇerehi yāguṃ pacāpetvā paribhuñjitvā “sāmaṇera udakakaddame dukkhaṃ gāmaṃ pavisituṃ,
tika-s0403t0:191_4: gaccha asukakulaṃ gantvā mayhaṃ vihāre nisinnabhāvaṃ ārocehi,
tika-s0403t0:191_11: Atha sāmaṇero dadhiādīni āharitvā bhattañca byañjanañca sampādetvā upaneti,
tika-s0403t0:191_20: Bhikkhuno pana vasanaṭṭhāne ekā taṇḍulanāḷi eko guḷapiṇḍo kuḍuvamattaṃ sappīti ettakaṃ nidhetuṃ vaṭṭati akāle sampattacorānaṃ atthāya.
tika-s0403t0:191_21: Te hi ettakaṃ āmisapaṭisanthāraṃ alabhantā jīvitā voropeyyuṃ,
tika-s0403t0:191_26: Kappiyakuṭiyaṃ pana bahuṃ ṭhapentassapi sannidhi nāma natthi.
tika-s0403t0:196_2: Dutiye guṇamakkhanāya pavattopi attano kārakaṃ gūthena paharantaṃ gūtho viya paṭhamataraṃ makkhetīti makkho,
tika-s0403t0:196_5: parassa guṇe ḍaṃsitvā viya apanetīti attho.
tika-s0403t0:196_7: Paḷāsī puggalo hi dutiyassa dhuraṃ na deti,
tika-s0403t0:199_2: Tividhena kuhanavatthunā lokaṃ kuhayati vimhāpayati “aho acchariyapuriso”ti attani paresaṃ vimhayaṃ uppādetīti kuhako.
tika-s0403t0:199_3: Lābhasakkāratthiko hutvā lapati attānaṃ dāyakaṃ vā ukkhipitvā yathā so kiñci dadāti,
tika-s0403t0:199_8: Nimittanti ca paresaṃ paccayadānasaññuppādakaṃ kāyavacīkammaṃ vuccati.
tika-s0403t0:199_12: Nippesoti ca saṭhapuriso viya lābhasakkāratthaṃ akkosanuppaṇḍanaparapiṭṭhimaṃsikatādi.
tika-s0403t0:202_6: Tattha uccakammāni nāma cīvarassa karaṇaṃ, rajanaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:202_11: tatra tatra mahante khuddake ca kamme sādhanavasena upagacchantiyāti attho.
tika-s0403t0:202_12: Tassa tassa kammassa nipphādane samatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:202_13: Tatrupāyāyāti vā tatra tatra kamme sādhetabbe upāyabhūtāya.
tika-s0403t0:205_1: Aṭṭhame thirabhāvappattoti sāsane thirabhāvaṃ anivattibhāvaṃ pattho.
tika-s0403t0:205_2: Pabbajito hutvā bahū rattiyo jānātīti rattaññū.
tika-s0403t0:205_4: Pākaṭoti ayathābhūtaguṇehi ceva yathābhūtaguṇehi ca samuggato.
tika-s0403t0:205_9: asantā vā asundarā gārayhā lāmakā dhammāti asaddhammā.
tika-s0403t0:208_1: Navame āramitabbaṭṭhena kammaṃ ārāmo etassāti kammārāmo,
tika-s0403t0:208_6: Ekacco hi etāni karonto sakaladivasaṃ etāneva karoti,
tika-s0403t0:208_8: Yo pana etesaṃ karaṇavelāyameva tāni karoti,
tika-s0403t0:208_14: Bhassārāmatāti ettha yo itthivaṇṇapurisavaṇṇādivasena ālāpasallāpaṃ karontoyeva divasañca rattiñca vītināmeti,
tika-s0403t0:208_17: Yo pana rattimpi divasampi dhammaṃ katheti,
tika-s0403t0:209_0: Niddārāmatāti ettha yo gacchantopi nisinnopi nipannopi thinamiddhābhibhūto niddāyatiyeva,
tika-s0403t0:209_2: Yassa pana karajakāye gelaññena cittaṃ bhavaṅge otarati,
tika-s0403t0:209_7: gimhānaṃ pacchime māse pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno niddaṃ okkamitā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:209_13: Yo pana catūsu iriyāpathesu ekakova assādaṃ labhati,
tika-s0403t0:212_1: Dasame atipātovāti sabbarattiṃ niddāyitvā balavapaccūse koṭisammuñjaniyā thokaṃ sammajjitvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā yāgubhikkhatthāya pātova pavisati.
tika-s0403t0:212_2: Taṃ atikkamitvāti gihisaṃsaggavasena kālaṃ vītināmento majjhanhikasamayaṃ atikkamitvā pakkamati.
tika-s0403t0:212_3: Pātoyeva hi gāmaṃ pavisitvā yāguṃ ādāya āsanasālaṃ gantvā pivitvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nipanno niddāyitvā manussānaṃ
tika-s0403t0:212_4: bhojanavelāya “paṇītabhikkhaṃ labhissāmī”ti upakaṭṭhe majjhanhike uṭṭhāya dhammakaraṇena udakaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0403t0:212_5: akkhīni puñchitvā piṇḍāya caritvā yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā gihisaṃsaṭṭho kālaṃ vītināmetvā majjhanhe vītivatte
tika-s0403t0:213_1: atricchatā pāpicchatāti ime dhammā pahātabbā”ti tesu ādīnavaṃ dassetvā “evarūpaṃ appicchataṃ samādāya vattitabba”ntiādinayappavattā kathā.
tika-s0403t0:213_24: Vimuttikathāti vā ariyaphalaṃ ārabbha pavattā kathā.
tika-s0403t0:218_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame dutiye ca natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:218_4: Tassā pana phalabhāvato maggaphalapaññā taṃsahagatā sammāsaṅkappādayo ca idha “aññā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0403t0:218_8: anadhigate adhigatasaññī hutvā adhigataṃ mayāti mānena.
tika-s0403t0:225_6: tā mittasanthavavasena na upasaṅkamitabbā samaṇabhāvassa antarāyakarattā,
tika-s0403t0:225_17: Aññamaññaṃ visabhāgavatthubhāvato santhavavasena upasaṅkamane katipāheneva brahmacariyantarāyo siyā,
tika-s0403t0:228_5: Pakāsabhāvo cettha yaṃ uddissa taṃ kāyakammaṃ karīyati,
tika-s0403t0:228_8: Appakāsatā ca yaṃ uddissa taṃ kāyakammaṃ karīyati,
tika-s0403t0:228_10: Imāni mettakāyakammādīni bhikkhūnaṃ vasena āgatāni tesaṃ seṭṭhaparisabhāvato,
tika-s0403t0:228_12: Bhikkhūnañhi mettacittena ābhisamācārikapūraṇaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0403t0:228_13: Gihīnaṃ cetiyavandanatthāya bodhivandanatthāya saṅghanimantanatthāya gamanaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhe bhikkhū
tika-s0403t0:228_14: disvā paccuggamanaṃ pattappaṭiggahaṇaṃ āsanapaññāpanaṃ anugamananti evamādikaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0403t0:228_15: Bhikkhūnaṃ mettacittena ācārapaññattisikkhāpanaṃ kammaṭṭhānakathanaṃ dhammadesanā tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0403t0:228_29: chandajātā ussāhajātā veyyāvaccaṃ karothā”tiādikathanakāle mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0403t0:228_30: Bhikkhūnaṃ pātova uṭṭhāya sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ katvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā vattādīni katvā vivittasenāsane
tika-s0403t0:228_31: nisīditvā “imasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū sukhī hontu averā abyāpajjā”ti cintanaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma,
tika-s0403t0:228_32: gihīnaṃ “ayyā sukhī hontu averā abyāpajjā”ti cintanaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0403t0:229_0: Tattha navakānaṃ cīvarakammādīsu sahāyabhāvagamanaṃ sammukhā kāyakammaṃ nāma,
tika-s0403t0:229_1: therānaṃ pana pādadhovanasiñcanabījanadānādibhedampi sabbaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ sammukhā kāyakammaṃ nāma,
tika-s0403t0:229_2: ubhayehipi dunnikkhittānaṃ dārubhaṇḍādīnaṃ tesu avaññaṃ akatvā attanā dunnikkhittānaṃ viya paṭisāmanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0403t0:229_3: “Devatthero tissatthero”ti vuttaṃ evaṃ paggayhavacanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma,
tika-s0403t0:229_4: vihāre asantaṃ pana paṭipucchantassa “kuhiṃ amhākaṃ devatthero,
tika-s0403t0:229_6: kadā nu kho āgamissatī”ti evaṃ piyavacanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0403t0:229_7: Mettāsinehasiniddhāni pana nayanāni ummīletvā pasannena mukhena olokanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma,
tika-s0403t0:229_8: “devatthero tissatthero arogo hotu abyāpajjo”ti samannāharaṇaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0403t0:229_11: Yassa pana cittassa vasena nayanānaṃ mettāsinehasiniddhatā,
tika-s0403t0:230_0: Samānasīlataṃ gatoti tesu tesu disābhāgesu viharantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ samānasīlataṃ gato.
tika-s0403t0:230_1: Yāyanti yā ayaṃ mayhañceva tumhākañca paccakkhabhūtā.
tika-s0403t0:230_5: Sayaṃ niyyantīyeva hi taṃsamaṅgipuggalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhato niyyāpetīti vuccati.
tika-s0403t0:233_2: sīlanimittaṃ na upavadati na nindatīti attho.
tika-s0403t0:233_3: Attani kamme ca anu anu pekkhati sīlenāti attānupekkhī.
tika-s0403t0:238_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame asanthavesu kulesu vissāso etassāti asanthavavissāsī.
tika-s0403t0:238_2: Anissaro hutvā vikappeti saṃvidahati sīlenāti anissaravikappī.
tika-s0403t0:238_3: Vissaṭṭhāni visuṃ khittāni bhedena avatthitāni kulāni ghaṭanatthāya upasevati sīlenāti vissaṭṭhupasevī.
tika-s0403t0:241_1: Pañcame āvāsamacchariyādīni pañca idha bhikkhuniyā vasena āgatāni,
tika-s0403t0:241_3: Āvāsamacchariyena hi samannāgato bhikkhu āgantukaṃ disvā “ettha cetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā parikkhāro ṭhapito”tiādīni vatvā saṅghikaāvāsaṃ na deti.
tika-s0403t0:241_4: Kulamacchariyena samannāgato bhikkhu tehi tehi kāraṇehi ādīnavaṃ dassetvā attano upaṭṭhāke kule aññesaṃ pavesampi nivāreti.
tika-s0403t0:241_5: Lābhamacchariyena samannāgato saṅghikampi lābhaṃ maccharāyanto yathā aññe na labhanti,
tika-s0403t0:241_6: evaṃ karoti attanā visamanissitatāya balavanissitatāya ca.
tika-s0403t0:241_8: paresaṃ vaṇṇe “kiṃ vaṇṇo eso”ti taṃ taṃ dosaṃ vadati.
tika-s0403t0:242_1: “imaṃ dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā eso maṃ abhibhavissatī”ti aññassa na deti. Yo pana –
tika-s0403t0:242_2: “ayaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ uggahetvā aññathā atthaṃ viparivattetvā nāsessatī”ti dhammanuggahena vā –
tika-s0403t0:242_3: “ayaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ uggahetvā uddhato unnaḷo avūpasantacitto apuññaṃ pasavissatī”ti puggalānuggahena vā na deti,
tika-s0403t0:242_7: te ca naṃ na maccharāyanti macchariyassa sabbaso pahīnattāti tassa asambhavo eva.
tika-s0403t0:242_9: yakkho vā peto vā hutvā tasseva āvāsassa saṅkāraṃ sīsena ukkhipitvā carati.
tika-s0403t0:242_12: saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā lābhaṃ maccharāyitvā puggalikaparibhogena vā paribhuñjitvā yakkho vā peto vā mahāajagaro vā hutvā nibbattati.
tika-s0403t0:242_13: Vaṇṇamacchariyena bhavesu nibbattassa vaṇṇo nāma na hoti.
tika-s0403t0:249_4: Yasmā cesa paresaṃ hitaṃ jānanto te attani rañjeti,
tika-s0403t0:249_14: Paṭiggahaṇaparibhogamattaññutāya eva pariyesanavissajjanamattaññutāpi bodhitā hontīti “paṭiggahaṇaparibhogamattaṃ jānāti”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:250_4: appaṭibhāgaṃ vā anekāsu devamanussaparisāsu anekasatakkhattuṃ tesaṃ ariyasaccappaṭivedhasampādanavasena pavattā bhagavato dhammadesanā dhammacakkaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:250_5: Apica sabbapaṭhamaṃ aññātakoṇḍaññappamukhāya aṭṭhārasaparisagaṇāya brahmakoṭiyā catusaccassa paṭivedhavidhāyinī yā dhammadesanā,
tika-s0403t0:250_7: Tattha satipaṭṭhānātidhammo eva pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:250_14: Appaṭivattiyanti dhammissarassa bhagavato sammāsambuddhassa dhammacakkassa anuttarabhāvato appaṭisedhanīyaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:253_3: Tattha antojanasmiṃ balakāye dhammikāyeva rakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā saṃvidhānaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:253_12: samaṇabrāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā pañhapucchananti idaṃ dasavidhaṃ cakkavattivattaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:253_13: Idameva ca gahapatike pakkhijāte ca visuṃ katvā gahaṇavasena dvādasavidhaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:253_14: Pitarā pavattitameva anuppavattetīti dasavidhaṃ vā dvādasavidhaṃ vā cakkavattivattaṃ pūretvā nisinnassa puttassa aññaṃ pātubhavati,
tika-s0403t0:253_16: Ratanamayattā pana sadisaṭṭhena tadevetanti katvā “pitarā pavattita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:253_20: Tasmā pitarā pavattitaṃ āṇācakkaṃ anuppavatteti nāmāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0403t0:253_25: paṭhamanayo ca taṃsadise tabbohāravasena vuttoti taṃ anādiyitvā dutiyanayo vutto.
tika-s0403t0:256_1: Catutthe “ubhato sujāto”ti ettake vutte yehi kehici dvīhi bhāgehi sujātatā paññāpeyya, sujāta-
tika-s0403t0:256_2: saddo ca “sujāto cārudassano”tiādīsu ārohasampattipariyāyoti jātivasena sujātataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “mātito ca pitito cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:256_4: idha pana sā orasaputtavasena icchitāti dassetuṃ “saṃsuddhaggahaṇiko”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:256_8: Yathābhuttassa āhārassa vipācanavasena gaṇhanato achaḍḍanato gahaṇī,
tika-s0403t0:256_15: Evañhi pitāmahaggahaṇeneva mātāmahopi gahitoti so aṭṭhakathāyaṃ visuṃ na uddhato. Yuga-
tika-s0403t0:256_16: saddo cettha ekasesanayena daṭṭhabbo “yugo ca yugo ca yugo”ti.
tika-s0403t0:256_17: Evañhi tattha tattha dvinnaṃ gahitameva hoti.
tika-s0403t0:256_18: Tenāha “tato uddhaṃ sabbepi pubbapurisā pitāmahaggahaṇeneva gahitā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:257_1: Anavakkhittoti sampattavivādādīsu na avakkhitto na chaḍḍito.
tika-s0403t0:257_2: Jātivādenāti hetumhi karaṇavacananti dassetuṃ “kena kāraṇenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:257_4: pitāmahayugā”ti etena khattiyassa yonidosābhāvo dassito saṃsuddhaggahaṇikabhāvakittanato.
tika-s0403t0:258_1: sā taṃ taṃ upādāyupādāya vuccatīti āha “yo koci attano santakena vibhavena aḍḍho hotī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:258_2: Tathā mahaddhanatāpīti taṃ ukkaṃsagataṃ dassetuṃ “mahatā aparimāṇasaṅkhena dhanena samannāgato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:258_3: Bhuñjitabbato paribhuñjitabbato visesato kāmā bhogā nāmāti āha “pañcakāmaguṇavasenā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:258_8: dhaññapariṭṭhapanaṭṭhānañca koṭṭhāgāranti dassetvā idāni tato aññathā taṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:258_9: Tattha yathā asino tikkhabhāvaparihārako paṭicchado “koso”ti vuccati.
tika-s0403t0:258_10: Evaṃ rañño tikkhabhāvaparihāraṃ katvā caturaṅginī senā kosoti āha “catubbidho koso hatthī assā rathā pattī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:258_11: Vatthakoṭṭhāgāraggahaṇeneva sabbassapi bhaṇḍaṭṭhapanaṭṭhānassa gahitattā “tividhaṃ koṭṭhāgāra”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:259_5: Ṭhāne ṭhāne uppatti etissā atthīti ṭhānuppatti,
tika-s0403t0:262_2: Hatthīti hi hatthivisayattā hatthisannissitattā ca hatthisippaṃ gahitaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:262_5: sobhanesu katthaci apakkhalanto avitthāyanto tāni sandhāretuṃ sakkotīti attho.
tika-s0403t0:262_7: tāni atthato saddato ca sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0403t0:262_9: Dve paṭisedhā pakatiṃ gamentīti āha “anavayoti samattho”ti.
tika-s0403t0:265_6: na tā manaṃ appāyanti vaḍḍhentīti amanāpā.
tika-s0403t0:270_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame datvā avajānātīti ettha eko bhikkhu mahāpuñño catupaccayalābhī hoti,
tika-s0403t0:270_2: so cīvarādīni labhitvā aññaṃ appapuññaṃ āpucchati.
tika-s0403t0:270_4: Athassa itaro thokaṃ kupito hutvā maṅkubhāvaṃ uppādetukāmo vadati “ayaṃ attano dhammatāya cīvarādīni na labhati,
tika-s0403t0:270_7: Eko pana ekena saddhiṃ dve tīṇi vassāni vasanto pubbe taṃ puggalaṃ garuṃ katvā gacchante gacchante kāle cittīkāraṃ na karoti,
tika-s0403t0:270_13: eko puggalo sāruppaṃyeva bhikkhuṃ “asāruppo eso”ti katheti.
tika-s0403t0:270_15: puna aññena sabhāgena bhikkhunā “sāruppo aya”nti vuttepi tassa vacanaṃ na gaṇhāti.
tika-s0403t0:270_16: Asukena nāma “asāruppo aya”nti amhākaṃ kathitanti purimabhikkhunova kathaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0403t0:270_18: Tassa vacanaṃ saddahitvā puna aññena “asāruppo eso bhikkhu,
tika-s0403t0:270_19: nāyaṃ tumhākaṃ santikaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ yutto”ti vuttepi tassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā purimaṃyeva kathaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0403t0:271_0: Loloti saddhādīnaṃ ittarakālappatitattā assaddhiyādīhi lulitabhāvena lolo.
tika-s0403t0:271_4: Evaṃ puggalo lolo hotīti evaṃ ittarasaddhāditāya puggalo lolo nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t0:271_7: assapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍaṃ viya ca anibaddhaṭṭhāne muhuttena kuppati.
tika-s0403t0:274_11: “Ārabhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī”ti ayaṃ pana āpattivītikkame āgato,
tika-s0403t0:274_13: tappaccayā ca vippaṭisārī hotīti ayamettha attho.
tika-s0403t0:274_14: Yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātīti anadhigatattā yathāsabhāvato na jānāti.
tika-s0403t0:274_16: yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā etassa puggalassa uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantīti attho.
tika-s0403t0:274_20: Evaṃ santepi idha maggakiccavasena pana phalameva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:275_0: Ārabhatī na vippaṭisārī hotīti āpattiṃ āpajjati,
tika-s0403t0:275_3: Na ārabhati vippaṭisārī hotīti āpattiṃ na āpajjati,
tika-s0403t0:275_4: vinayapaññattiyaṃ pana akovidattā anāpattiyā āpattisaññī hutvā vippaṭisārī hotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0403t0:275_5: “Na ārabhati na vippaṭisārī hotī”ti yo vutto,
tika-s0403t0:275_8: So hi “kiṃ me imasmiṃ kāle parinibbānena,
tika-s0403t0:275_9: anāgate metteyyasammāsambuddhakāle parinibbāyissāmī”ti visuddhasīlopi paṭipattiṃ na pūreti.
tika-s0403t0:276_6: āvikātabbayuttakassa āvikiriyāya ārambhaje āsave pahāya suddhante ṭhitabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena vippaṭisāraje
tika-s0403t0:276_7: āsave paṭivinodetvā nīharitvā vipassanācittañceva vipassanāpaññañca vaḍḍhetūti.
tika-s0403t0:276_8: Amunā pañcamena puggalenāti etena pañcamena khīṇāsavapuggalena.
tika-s0403t0:276_9: Samasamo bhavissatīti lokuttaraguṇehi samabhāveneva samo bhavissatīti evaṃ khīṇāsavena ovaditabboti attho.
tika-s0403t0:279_6: Mettāya vā pharatīti mettaṃ hitesitaṃ upasaṃharanto sabbatthakameva vā tattha pharati.
tika-s0403t0:279_7: Dhātuto vā upasaṃharatīti dhammasabhāvacintanena dhātuto paccavekkhaṇāya dhātumanasikāraṃ vā tattha pavatteti.
tika-s0403t0:279_8: Tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvāti sabhāvato ānubhāvato ca upatiṭṭhantaṃ ārammaṇe paṭikūlabhāvaṃ appaṭikūlabhāvañcāti taṃ ubhayaṃ pahāya aggahetvā,
tika-s0403t0:279_9: sabbasmiṃ pana tasmiṃ majjhatto hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:279_10: Majjhatto hutvā viharitukāmo pana kiṃ karotīti?
tika-s0403t0:279_11: Iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu āpāthaṃ gatesu neva somanassito hoti,
tika-s0403t0:279_13: Upekkhako vihareyyāti iṭṭhe arajjanto aniṭṭhe adussanto yathā aññe asamapekkhanena mohaṃ uppādenti,
tika-s0403t0:279_14: evaṃ anuppādento chasu ārammaṇesu chaḷaṅgupekkhāya upekkhako vihareyya.
tika-s0403t0:279_17: laddhanāmāya tatramajjhattupekkhāya vasena pañcamo vāro vuttoti attho.
tika-s0403t0:282_2: Deyyadhammassa asakkaccakaraṇaṃ nāma asampannaṃ karotīti āha “na sakkaritvā suciṃ katvā detī”ti,
tika-s0403t0:282_3: uttaṇḍulādidosavirahitaṃ sucisampannaṃ katvā na detīti attho.
tika-s0403t0:282_8: Cittaṃ vā acchariyaṃ katvā paṭipattivikaraṇaṃ sambhāvanakiriyā,
tika-s0403t0:282_10: Agāravena detīti puggale agaruṃ karonto nisīdanaṭṭhāne asammajjitvā yattha vā tattha vā nisīdāpetvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā ādhārakaṃ ṭhapetvā dānaṃ deti.
tika-s0403t0:282_13: Apaviddhaṃ detīti antarā apaviddhaṃ vicchedaṃ katvā deti.
tika-s0403t0:282_15: Atha vā apaviddhaṃ detīti ucchiṭṭhādichaḍḍanīyadhammaṃ viya avakkhittakaṃ katvā deti.
tika-s0403t0:282_17: “Addhā imassa dānassa phalameva āgacchatī”ti evaṃ yassa kammassakatādiṭṭhi atthi,
tika-s0403t0:293_1: Udakapappaṭakenāti nīlamaṇḍūkapiṭṭhivaṇṇena udakapiṭṭhiṃ chādetvā nibbattena udakapiṭṭhikena.
tika-s0403t0:294_0: Visabhāgavedanuppattiyā kakaceneva iriyāpathapavattinivāraṇena chindanto ābādhati pīḷetīti ābādho,
tika-s0403t0:295_0: Pasannabhāvena udakassa acchabhāvo veditabboti āha “acchodakāti pasannodakā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:298_4: Akkharacintakā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu anokappanāmarisanatthavasena atthisadde upapade vattamānakālepi anāgatavacanaṃ karonti.
tika-s0403t0:301_12: Ayasaṃ āropetīti “ime maṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhantā ayasaṃ byasanaṃ uppādentī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ ayasaṃ uppādeti.
tika-s0403t0:304_1: Dasame abhibhavitvā ṭhito ime satteti adhippāyo.
tika-s0403t0:304_2: Yasmā pana so “pāsaṃsabhāvena uttamabhāvena ca te satte abhibhavitvā ṭhito”ti attānaṃ maññati,
tika-s0403t0:304_4: Aññadatthu dasoti dassane antarāyābhāvavacanena ñeyyavisesapariggāhikabhāvena ca anāvaraṇadassāvitaṃ paṭijānātīti āha “sabbaṃ passatīti adhippāyo”ti.
tika-s0403t0:309_3: “Iminā diṭṭhādinā idaṃ nāma maṅgalaṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ bālajanaparikappitakotūhalasaṅkhātena diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalena samannāgato kotūhalamaṅgaliko.
tika-s0403t0:309_10: Ettha dakkhiṇapariyesanapubbakāre ekaṃ katvā pañca dhammā veditabbā.
tika-s0403t0:312_1: Sattame satthavaṇijjāti āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ katvā vā kāretvā vā kataṃ vā paṭilabhitvā tassa vikkayo.
tika-s0403t0:312_2: Āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ kāretvā tassa vikkayoti idaṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:312_3: Sūkaramigādayo posetvā tesaṃ vikkayoti sūkaramigādayo posetvā tesaṃ maṃsaṃ sampādetvā vikkayo.
tika-s0403t0:312_4: Ettha ca satthavaṇijjā paroparādhanimittatāya akaraṇīyā vuttā,
tika-s0403t0:315_1: Navame ābhicetasikānanti abhicetoti abhikkantaṃ visuddhacittaṃ vuccati adhicittaṃ vā,
tika-s0403t0:315_9: Tāni hi appetvā nisinnā jhāyino imasmiṃyeva attabhāve asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ nekkhammasukhaṃ vindanti,
tika-s0403t0:316_9: Yasmā panesa puññena atthiko nāma hoti,
tika-s0403t0:319_1: Dasame sukāraṇanti bodhiparipācanassa ekantikaṃ sundaraṃ kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:320_0: Idāni iminā pasaṅgena hāsasamuṭṭhānaṃ vibhāgato dassetuṃ “hasitañca nāmeta”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:320_3: Nanu ca keci kodhavasenapi hasantīti? Na,
tika-s0403t0:320_4: te sampiyanti kodhavatthuṃ tattha “mayaṃ dāni yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjissāmā”ti duviññeyyantarena somanassacitteneva hāsassa uppajjanato.
tika-s0403t0:321_1: uppādetī”ti idaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ tathā āgatattā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:321_2: na sahetukasomanassasahagatacittehi bhagavato sitaṃ na hotīti dassanattaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:321_3: Abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ pana “atītaṃsādīsu appaṭihataṃ ñāṇaṃ vatvā ‘imehi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa
tika-s0403t0:321_4: bhagavato sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivattī’tiādivacanato ‘bhagavato idaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī’ti
tika-s0403t0:321_6: Tattha iminā hasituppādacittena pavattiyamānampi bhagavato sitakaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsaanāgataṃsasabbaññutaññāṇānaṃ
tika-s0403t0:321_7: anuvattakattā ñāṇānuparivattiyevāti evaṃ pana ñāṇānuparivattibhāve sati na koci pāḷiaṭṭhakathānaṃ virodho.
tika-s0403t0:321_8: Tathā hi abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ciṇṇapariyante idaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:321_10: aññathā āvajjanacittassapi bhagavato tathārūpe kāle na yujjeyya.
tika-s0403t0:321_12: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “evañca katvā manodvārāvajjanassapi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakattaṃ upapannaṃ hotī”ti na ca
tika-s0403t0:322_3: Sā hi itaravijjulatā viya khaṇaṭṭhitiyā sīghanirodhā ca na hoti,
tika-s0403t0:322_6: Dīdhiti pāvakamahāmeghato vā cātuddīpikamahāmeghato vā niccharati.
tika-s0403t0:322_9: yadidaṃ tikkhattuṃ sīsaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dāṭhaggesuyeva antaradhānaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:327_1: Catutthassa paṭhame appīcchataṃyeva nissāyātiādīsu “iti appiccho bhavissāmī”ti idaṃ me āraññikaṅgaṃ appicchatāya saṃvattissati,
tika-s0403t0:327_2: “iti santuṭṭho bhavissāmī”ti idaṃ me āraññikaṅgaṃ santuṭṭhiyā saṃvattissati,
tika-s0403t0:327_3: “iti kilese sallikhissāmī”ti idaṃ me āraññikaṅgaṃ kilesasallikhanatthāya saṃvattissatīti āraññiko hoti.
tika-s0403t0:328_0: Gavā khīranti gāvito khīraṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0403t0:328_3: Evamevanti yathā etesu pañcasu gorasesu sappimaṇḍo aggo,
tika-s0403t0:328_4: evamevaṃ imesu pañcasu āraññikesu yo ayaṃ appicchatādīni nissāya āraññiko hoti,
tika-s0403t0:328_5: ayaṃ aggo ceva seṭṭho ca mokkho ca pavaro ca.
tika-s0403t0:333_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame sampiyenevāti aññamaññapemeneva kāyena ca cittena ca missībhūtā saṅghaṭṭitā saṃsaṭṭhā hutvā saṃvāsaṃ vattenti,
tika-s0403t0:333_2: na appiyena niggahena vāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:336_4: Sudde bahi katvā rahobhāsitabbaṭṭhena mantā eva taṃtaṃatthappaṭipattihetutāya mantapadaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:336_7: Taṃ pana udattānudattādīnaṃ sarānaṃ sampadāvaseneva icchitanti āha “sarasampattivasenā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:336_14: Dibbena cakkhunā oloketvāti dibbacakkhuparibhaṇḍena yathākammūpagañāṇena sattānaṃ kammassakatādiṃ,
tika-s0403t0:336_15: paccakkhato dassanaṭṭhena dibbacakkhusadisena pubbenivāsañāṇena atītakappe brāhmaṇānaṃ mantajjhenavidhiñca oloketvā.
tika-s0403t0:336_16: Pāvacanena saha saṃsandetvāti kassapasammāsambuddhassa yaṃ vacanaṃ vaṭṭasannissitaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:336_18: Na hi tesaṃ vivaṭṭasannissito attho paccakkho hoti.
tika-s0403t0:336_19: Aparāpareti aṭṭhakādīhi aparāpare pacchimā okkākarājakālādīsu uppannā.
tika-s0403t0:336_20: Pakkhipitvāti aṭṭhakādīhi ganthitamantapadesu kilesasannissitapadānaṃ tattha tattha pade pakkhipanaṃ katvā.
tika-s0403t0:336_21: Viruddhe akaṃsūti brāhmaṇadhammikasuttādīsu āgatanayena saṃkilesatthadīpanato paccanīkabhūte akaṃsu.
tika-s0403t0:337_5: Rājaporisaṃ nāma vinā āvudhena poroheccāmaccakammādirājakammaṃ katvā rājupaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:338_0: Udakaṃ pātetvā dentīti dvāre ṭhitasseva brāhmaṇassa hatthe udakaṃ āsiñcantā “idaṃ te, brāhmaṇa,
tika-s0403t0:338_2: Kasmā pana te evaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritvāpi dāraṃ pariyesanti,
tika-s0403t0:338_5: Tesañhī evaṃ diṭṭhi hoti “yo puttaṃ na uppādeti,
tika-s0403t0:338_8: Cattāro kira abhāyitabbaṃ bhāyanti gaṇḍuppādako, kikī, kontinī,
tika-s0403t0:338_10: Gaṇḍuppādā kira mahāpathaviyā khayanabhayena mattabhojanā honti,
tika-s0403t0:338_12: Kikī sakuṇikā ākāsapatanabhayena aṇḍassa upari uttānā seti.
tika-s0403t0:338_13: Kontinī sakuṇī pathavīkampanabhayena pādehi bhūmiṃ na suṭṭhu akkamati.
tika-s0403t0:340_0: Ete abhayaṃ bhāyanti, sammūḷhā caturo janā”ti. ;
tika-s0403t0:344_2: asajjhāyakatānaṃ mantānaṃ appaṭibhānaṃ pageva paṭhamaṃyeva siddhaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:344_4: Pariyuṭṭhānaṃ nāma abhibhavo gahaṇanti āha “kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhitenāti kāmarāgaggahitenā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:345_0: “Aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”tiādīsu byāpādādīnaṃ anāgatattā byāpādavāre tadaṅganissaraṇaṃ na gahitaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:345_2: paṭisaṅkhānavasena tassa vinodetabbatāya tadaṅganissaraṇampi labbhatevāti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0403t0:346_1: Ussūrakajātoti tasseva kudhitabhāvassa ussūrakaṃ accuṇhataṃ patto.
tika-s0403t0:349_1: Catutthe paṇḍito maññeti ettha maññeti idaṃ “maññatī”ti iminā samānatthaṃ nipātapadaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:349_3: saddaṃ ānetvā atthaṃ dassento “paṇḍitoti maññatī”ti āha.
tika-s0403t0:349_6: “Taṃ kiṃ maññati bhavaṃ piṅgiyānī samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiya”nti vuttamevatthaṃ puna gaṇhanto “paṇḍito maññe”ti āha,
tika-s0403t0:349_7: tasmā vuttaṃ “bhavaṃ piṅgiyānī samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ paṇḍitoti maññati udāhu no”ti,
tika-s0403t0:349_12: Ko cāti hetunissakke paccattavacananti āha “kuto cā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:349_14: yena kāraṇena samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jāneyyaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:349_16: Buddhoyeva bhaveyya abuddhassa sabbathā buddhañāṇānubhāvaṃ jānituṃ asakkuṇeyyattāti.
tika-s0403t0:349_21: yena puthujjano tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno vadeyya. Atthi,
tika-s0403t0:349_24: yehi tathāgatassa yathābhūtaṃ vaṇṇaṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyyā”ti ca.
tika-s0403t0:350_0: Pasatthappasatthoti pasatthehi pāsaṃsehi attano guṇeheva so pasattho,
tika-s0403t0:351_0: Sadevake pāsaṃsānampi pāsaṃsoti dassetuṃ “pasatthehi vā”ti dutiyavikappo gahito.
tika-s0403t0:351_3: Tassa tassa payogassa ānisaṃsabhūtaṃ phalanti āha “atthavasanti atthānisaṃsa”nti.
tika-s0403t0:351_4: Attho vā phalaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya vaso etassāti atthavaso, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:352_0: Khuddakamadhūti khuddakamakkhikāhi katadaṇḍakamadhu. Aneḷakanti niddosaṃ apagatamakkhikaṇḍakaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:353_3: Yathā pana taṃ vacanaṃ udānanti vuccati,
tika-s0403t0:356_1: Pañcame sabbasaṅgāhikanti sarīragatassa ceva vatthālaṅkāragatassa cāti sabbassa nīlabhāvassa saṅgāhakavacanaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:356_4: Yathā te licchavirājāno apītādivaṇṇā eva keci keci vilepanavasena pītādivaṇṇā khāyiṃsu,
tika-s0403t0:356_5: evaṃ anīlādivaṇṇā eva keci vilepanavasena nīlādivaṇṇā khāyiṃsu.
tika-s0403t0:356_6: Te kira suvaṇṇavicittehi maṇiobhāsehi ekanīlā viya khāyanti.
tika-s0403t0:357_1: Taṃ kira bahupattaṃ vaṇṇasampannaṃ ativiya sugandhañca hoti.
tika-s0403t0:357_3: yathā kokanadasaṅkhātaṃ padumaṃ pāto sūriyuggamanavelāya phullaṃ vikasitaṃ avītagandhaṃ siyā virocamānaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:357_5: saradakāle antalikkhe ādiccamiva attano tejasā tapantaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:360_2: Atthakāmatāya vā anatthakāmatāya vāti pasannā atthakāmatāya,
tika-s0403t0:360_4: Atthāya vā anatthāya vāti sabhāvato bhavitabbāya atthāya vā anatthāya vā.
tika-s0403t0:360_6: Bodhisattamātā viya puttapaṭilābhanimittanti tadā kira pure puṇṇamāya sattamadivasato paṭṭhāya vigatasurāpānaṃ
tika-s0403t0:360_7: mālāgandhādivibhūtisampannaṃ nakkhattakīḷaṃ anubhavamānā bodhisattamātā sattame divase pātova uṭṭhāya
tika-s0403t0:360_8: gandhodakena nahāyitvā sabbālaṅkārabhūsitā varabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya sirigabbhaṃ
tika-s0403t0:360_9: pavisitvā sirisayane nipannā niddaṃ okkamamānā imaṃ supinaṃ addasa –
tika-s0403t0:360_10: cattāro kira naṃ mahārājāno sayaneneva saddhiṃ ukkhipitvā anotattadahaṃ netvā nahāpetvā dibbavatthaṃ
tika-s0403t0:360_11: nivāsetvā dibbagandhehi vilimpetvā dibbapupphāni piḷandhetvā tato avidūre rajatapabbato,
tika-s0403t0:360_14: Atha bodhisatto setavaravāraṇo hutvā tato avidūre eko suvaṇṇapabbato,
tika-s0403t0:360_15: tattha caritvā tato oruyha rajatapabbataṃ āruhitvā kanakavimānaṃ pavisitvā mātaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
tika-s0403t0:360_17: Imaṃ supinaṃ sandhāya etaṃ vuttaṃ “bodhisattamātā viya puttapaṭilābhanimitta”nti.
tika-s0403t0:369_0: Ime soḷasa supine passanto kosalarājā viya.
tika-s0403t0:370_1: Ekadivasaṃ kira kosalamahārājā rattiṃ niddūpagato pacchimayāme soḷasa mahāsupine passi.
tika-s0403t0:370_2: Tattha cattāro añjanavaṇṇā kāḷausabhā “yujjhissāmā”ti catūhi disāhi rājaṅgaṇaṃ āgantvā “usabhayuddhaṃ
tika-s0403t0:370_3: passissāmā”ti mahājane sannipatite yujjhanākāraṃ dassetvā naditvā gajjitvā ayujjhitvāva paṭikkantā.
tika-s0403t0:371_1: Khuddakā rukkhā ceva gacchā ca pathaviṃ bhinditvā vidatthimattampi ratanamattampi anuggantvāva pupphanti ceva phalanti ca.
tika-s0403t0:372_0: 3. Gāviyo tadahujātānaṃ vacchānaṃ khīraṃ pivantiyo addasa. Ayaṃ tatiyo supino.
tika-s0403t0:373_1: Dhuravāhe ārohapariṇāhasampanne mahāgoṇe yugaparamparāya ayojetvā taruṇe godamme dhure yojente addasa.
tika-s0403t0:373_2: Te dhuraṃ vahituṃ asakkontā chaḍḍetvā aṭṭhaṃsu,
tika-s0403t0:375_1: Mahājano satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ sammajjitvā “idha passāvaṃ karohī”ti ekassa jarasiṅgālassa upanāmesi.
tika-s0403t0:376_1: Eko puriso rajjuṃ vaṭṭetvā pādamūle nikkhipati.
tika-s0403t0:376_2: Tena nisinnapīṭhassa heṭṭhā sayitā chātasiṅgālī tassa ajānantasseva taṃ khādati.
tika-s0403t0:377_1: Rājadvāre bahūhi tucchakumbhehi parivāretvā ṭhapitaṃ ekaṃ mahantaṃ pūritakumbhaṃ addasa.
tika-s0403t0:377_2: Cattāropi pana vaṇṇā catūhi disāhi catūhi anudisāhi ca ghaṭehi udakaṃ ānetvā pūritakumbhameva pūrenti,
tika-s0403t0:378_1: Ekaṃ pañcapadumasañchannaṃ gambhīraṃ sabbatotitthaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ addasa.
tika-s0403t0:378_2: Samantato dvipadacatuppadā otaritvā tattha pānīyaṃ pivanti.
tika-s0403t0:379_1: Ekissāyeva kumbhiyā paccamānaṃ odanaṃ apākaṃ addasa.
tika-s0403t0:379_2: “Apāka”nti vicāretvā vibhajitvā ṭhapitaṃ viya tīhākārehi paccamānaṃ ekasmiṃ passe atikilinno hoti,
tika-s0403t0:380_0: 11. Satasahassagghanakaṃ candanasāraṃ pūtitakkena vikkiṇante addasa. Ayaṃ ekādasamo supino.
tika-s0403t0:381_0: 12. Tucchalābūni udake sīdantāni addasa. Ayaṃ dvādasamo supino.
tika-s0403t0:382_0: 13. Mahantamahantā kūṭāgārappamāṇā ghanasilā nāvā viya udake plavamānā addasa. Ayaṃ terasamo supino.
tika-s0403t0:383_1: Khuddakamadhukapupphappamāṇā maṇḍūkiyo mahante kaṇhasappe vegena anubandhitvā uppalanāḷe viya chinditvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā gilantiyo addasa.
tika-s0403t0:384_1: Dasahi asaddhammehi samannāgataṃ gāmagocaraṃ kākaṃ kañcanavaṇṇavaṇṇatāya “suvaṇṇā”ti laddhanāme suvaṇṇarājahaṃse parivārente addasa.
tika-s0403t0:385_2: Te pana eḷake dīpino anubandhitvā muramurāti khādante addasa.
tika-s0403t0:385_3: Athaññe tasā vakā eḷake dūratova disvā tasitā tāsappattā hutvā eḷakānaṃ bhayā palāyitvā gumbagahanāni pavisitvā nilīyiṃsu.
tika-s0403t0:386_2: adhammikānañca manussānaṃ kāle loke viparivattamāne kusale osanne akusale ussanne lokassa parihānakāle devo na sammā vasissati,
tika-s0403t0:386_6: vassitukāmā viya catūhi disāhi meghā uṭṭhahitvā itthikāhi ātape patthaṭānaṃ vīhiādīnaṃ temanabhayena
tika-s0403t0:386_7: antopavesitakāle purisesu kudālapiṭake ādāya āḷibandhanatthāya nikkhantesu vassanākāraṃ dassetvā gajjitvā
tika-s0403t0:386_8: vijjulatā nicchāretvā usabhā viya ayujjhitvā avassitvāva palāyissanti.
tika-s0403t0:387_1: Lokassa parihīnakāle manussānaṃ parittāyukakāle sattā tibbarāgā bhavissanti,
tika-s0403t0:387_2: asampattavayāva kumāriyo purisantaraṃ gantvā utuniyo ceva gabbhiniyo ca hutvā puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhissanti.
tika-s0403t0:387_3: Khuddakarukkhānaṃ pupphaṃ viya hi tāsaṃ utunibhāvo,
tika-s0403t0:388_1: Manussānaṃ jeṭṭhāpacāyikakammassa naṭṭhakāle sattā mātāpitūsu vā sassusasuresu vā lajjaṃ anupaṭṭhapetvā
tika-s0403t0:388_2: sayameva kuṭumbaṃ saṃvidahantāva ghāsacchādanamattampi mahallakānaṃ dātukāmā dassanti,
tika-s0403t0:388_4: Mahallakā anāthā hutvā asayaṃvasī dārake ārādhetvā jīvissanti tadahujātānaṃ vacchakānaṃ khīraṃ pivantiyo mahāgāviyo viya.
tika-s0403t0:389_1: Adhammikarājūnaṃ kāle adhammikarājāno paṇḍitānaṃ paveṇikusalānaṃ kammanittharaṇasamatthānaṃ mahāmattānaṃ yasaṃ na dassanti,
tika-s0403t0:389_2: dhammasabhāyaṃ vinicchayaṭṭhānepi paṇḍite vohārakusale mahallake amacce na ṭhapessanti,
tika-s0403t0:389_5: Te rājakammāni ceva yuttāyuttañca ajānantā neva taṃ yasaṃ ukkhipituṃ sakkhissanti,
tika-s0403t0:389_8: mahallakāpi paṇḍitāmaccā yasaṃ alabhantā kiccāni nittharituṃ samatthāpi “kiṃ amhākaṃ etehi,
tika-s0403t0:389_10: abbhantarikā taruṇadārakā jānissantī”ti uppannāni kammāni na karissanti.
tika-s0403t0:389_11: Evaṃ sabbathāpi tesaṃ rājūnaṃ hāniyeva bhavissati,
tika-s0403t0:389_12: dhuraṃ vahituṃ asamatthānaṃ vacchadammānaṃ dhure yojitakālo viya dūravāhānañca mahāgoṇānaṃ yugaparamparāya ayojitakālo viya bhavissati.
tika-s0403t0:390_1: Adhammikarājakāleyeva adhammikabālarājāno adhammike lolamanusse vinicchaye ṭhapessanti,
tika-s0403t0:390_2: te pāpapuññesu anādarā bālā sabhāyaṃ nisīditvā vinicchayaṃ dentā ubhinnampi atthapaccatthikānaṃ hatthato
tika-s0403t0:390_3: lañjaṃ gahetvā khādissanti asso viya dvīhi mukhehi yavasaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:391_1: Adhammikāyeva vijātirājāno jātisampannānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ āsaṅkāya yasaṃ na dassanti,
tika-s0403t0:391_5: Te ca kulīnapurisā jīvituṃ asakkontā “ime nissāya jīvissāmā”ti akulīnānaṃ dhītaro dassanti,
tika-s0403t0:391_6: iti tāsaṃ kuladhītānaṃ akulīnehi saddhiṃ saṃvāso jarasiṅgālassa suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ passāvakaraṇasadiso bhavissati.
tika-s0403t0:392_1: Gacchante gacchante kāle itthiyo purisalolā surālolā alaṅkāralolā visikhālolā āmisalolā bhavissanti dussīlā durācārā.
tika-s0403t0:392_2: Tā sāmikehi kasigorakkhādīni kammāni katvā kicchena kasirena sambhataṃ dhanaṃ jārehi saddhiṃ suraṃ pivantiyo
tika-s0403t0:392_3: mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhārayamānā antogehe accāyikampi kiccaṃ anoloketvā gehaparikkhepassa uparibhāgenapi
tika-s0403t0:392_4: chiddaṭṭhānehipi jāre upadhārayamānā sve vapitabbayuttakaṃ bījampi koṭṭetvā yāgubhattakhajjakāni pacitvā
tika-s0403t0:392_5: khādamānā vilumpissanti heṭṭhāpīṭhake nipannachātasiṅgālī viya vaṭṭetvā vaṭṭetvā pādamūle nikkhittarajjuṃ.
tika-s0403t0:393_6: Te evaṃduggatā sabbe jānapade attanova kammaṃ kāressanti,
tika-s0403t0:393_7: upaddutā manussā sake kammante chaḍḍetvā rājūnaṃyeva atthāya pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇāni vapantā rakkhantā lāyantā
tika-s0403t0:393_8: maddantā pavesentā ucchukkhettāni karontā yantāni vāhentā phāṇitādīni pacantā pupphārāme phalārāme ca
tika-s0403t0:393_9: karontā tattha tattha nipphannāni pubbaṇṇādīni āharitvā rañño koṭṭhāgārameva pūressanti.
tika-s0403t0:393_10: Attano gehesu tucchakoṭṭhe olokentāpi na bhavissanti,
tika-s0403t0:394_1: Gacchante gacchante kāle rājāno adhammikā bhavissanti,
tika-s0403t0:394_3: dhammena vinicchayaṃ nāma na dassanti lañjavittakā bhavissanti dhanalolā,
tika-s0403t0:394_4: raṭṭhavāsikesu tesaṃ khantimettānuddayā nāma na bhavissanti,
tika-s0403t0:394_5: kakkhaḷā pharusā ucchuyante ucchubhaṇḍikā viya manusse pīḷentā nānappakāraṃ baliṃ uppādetvā dhanaṃ gaṇhissanti.
tika-s0403t0:394_6: Manussā balipīḷitā kiñci dātuṃ asakkontā gāmanigamādayo chaḍḍetvā paccantaṃ gantvā vāsaṃ kappessanti.
tika-s0403t0:394_8: paccanto ghanavāso seyyathāpi pokkharaṇiyā majjhe udakaṃ āvilaṃ pariyante vippasannaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:395_1: Gacchante gacchante kāle rājāno adhammikā bhavissanti,
tika-s0403t0:395_2: tesu adhammikesu rājayuttāpi brāhmaṇagahapatikāpi negamajānapadāpīti samaṇabrāhmaṇe upādāya sabbe manussā adhammikā bhavissanti.
tika-s0403t0:395_7: Adhammikarājūnaṃ rajje vātā visamā kharā vāyissanti,
tika-s0403t0:395_9: Tesu kampitesu devatā kupitā devaṃ vassituṃ na dassanti.
tika-s0403t0:395_11: vassamānopi sabbattha kasikammassa vā vappakammassa vā upakāro hutvā na vassissati.
tika-s0403t0:395_13: evaṃ janapadepi gāmepi ekataḷākasarepi ekappahārena na vassissati,
tika-s0403t0:395_14: taḷākassa uparibhāge vassanto heṭṭhābhāge na vassissati,
tika-s0403t0:395_19: Evaṃ ekassa rañño rajje vuttasassā vipāko.
tika-s0403t0:396_1: Gacchante gacchanteyeva kāle sāsane parihāyante paccayalolā alajjikā bahū bhikkhū bhavissanti.
tika-s0403t0:396_2: Te bhagavatā paccayaloluppaṃ nimmathetvā kathitadhammadesanaṃ cīvarādicatupaccayahetu paresaṃ desessanti.
tika-s0403t0:396_3: Paccayehi mucchitvā nittharaṇapakkhe ṭhitā nibbānābhimukhaṃ katvā desetuṃ na sakkhissanti.
tika-s0403t0:396_4: Kevalaṃ “padabyañjanasampattiñceva madhurasaddañca sutvā mahagghāni cīvarādīni dassanti”iccevaṃ desessanti.
tika-s0403t0:396_5: Apare antaravīthicatukkarājadvārādīsu nisīditvā kahāpaṇaaḍḍhakahāpaṇapādamāsakarūpādīnipi nissāya desessanti.
tika-s0403t0:396_6: Iti bhagavatā nibbānagghanakaṃ katvā desitaṃ dhammaṃ catupaccayatthāya ceva kahāpaṇādiatthāya ca vikkiṇitvā
tika-s0403t0:396_7: desentā satasahassagghanakaṃ candanasāraṃ pūtitakkena vikkiṇantā viya bhavissanti.
tika-s0403t0:397_1: Adhammikarājakāle loke viparivattanteyeva rājāno jātisampannānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ yasaṃ na dassanti,
tika-s0403t0:397_5: Rājasammukhepi rājadvārepi amaccasammukhepi vinicchayaṭṭhānepi tucchalābusadisānaṃ akulīnānaṃyeva kathā
tika-s0403t0:397_6: osīditvā ṭhitā viya niccalā suppatiṭṭhitā bhavissati.
tika-s0403t0:397_7: Saṅghasannipātepi saṅghakammagaṇakammaṭṭhānesu ceva pattacīvarapariveṇādivinicchayaṭṭhānesu ca dussīlānaṃ
tika-s0403t0:397_9: na lajjibhikkhūnanti evaṃ sabbatthāpi tucchalābūnaṃ sīdanakālo viya bhavissati.
tika-s0403t0:398_1: Tādiseyeva kāle adhammikarājāno akulīnānaṃ yasaṃ dassanti.
tika-s0403t0:398_6: Rājasammukhe vā amaccasammukhe vā vinicchayaṭṭhāne vā vinicchayakusalānaṃ ghanasilāsadisānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ kathā na ogāhitvā patiṭṭhahissati.
tika-s0403t0:398_7: Tesu kathentesu “kiṃ ime kathentī”ti itare parihāsameva karissanti.
tika-s0403t0:398_8: Bhikkhusannipātepi vuttappakāresu ṭhānesu neva pesale bhikkhū garukātabbe maññissanti,
tika-s0403t0:399_1: Loke parihāyanteyeva manussā tibbarāgādijātikā kilesānuvattakā hutvā taruṇānaṃ attano bhariyānaṃ vase vattissanti.
tika-s0403t0:399_2: Gehe dāsakammakārādayopi gomahiṃsādayopi hiraññasuvaṇṇampi sabbaṃ tāsaṃyeva āyattaṃ bhavissati.
tika-s0403t0:399_3: “Asukaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ vā paricchadādijātaṃ vā kaha”nti vutte “yattha vā tattha vā hotu,
tika-s0403t0:399_5: tvaṃ mayhaṃ ghare santaṃ vā asantaṃ vā jānitukāmo jāto”ti vatvā nānappakārehi akkositvā mukhasattīhi
tika-s0403t0:399_6: koṭṭetvā dāsaceṭake viya vase katvā attano issariyaṃ pavattessanti.
tika-s0403t0:399_7: Evaṃ madhukapupphappamāṇānaṃ maṇḍūkīnaṃ āsivise kaṇhasappe gilanakālo viya bhavissati.
tika-s0403t0:400_1: Dubbalarājakāle pana rājāno hatthisippādīsu akusalā yuddhesu avisāradā bhavissanti.
tika-s0403t0:400_2: Te attano rājādhipaccaṃ āsaṅkamānā samānajātikānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ issariyaṃ adatvā attano pādamūlikanahāpanakappakādīnaṃ dassanti.
tika-s0403t0:400_3: Jātigottasampannā kulaputtā rājakule patiṭṭhaṃ alabhamānā jīvikaṃ kappetuṃ asamatthā hutvā issariye ṭhite
tika-s0403t0:401_1: Adhammikarājakāleyeva ca akulīnāva rājavallabhā issarā bhavissanti,
tika-s0403t0:401_3: Te rājānaṃ attano kathaṃ gāhāpetvā vinicchayaṭṭhānādīsu balavanto hutvā dubbalānaṃ paveṇiāgatāni khettavatthādīni
tika-s0403t0:401_5: amhāka”nti āgantvā vinicchayaṭṭhānādīsu vivadante vettalatādīhi paharāpetvā gīvāyaṃ gahetvā apakaḍḍhāpetvā “attano pamāṇaṃ na jānātha,
tika-s0403t0:401_7: idāni vo paharāpetvā rañño kathetvā hatthapādacchedādīni kāressāmā”ti santajjessanti.
tika-s0403t0:401_8: Te tesaṃ bhayena attano santakāni vatthūni “tumhākaṃyeva tāni,
tika-s0403t0:401_9: gaṇhathā”ti niyyātetvā attano gehāni pavisitvā bhītā nipajjissanti.
tika-s0403t0:401_11: Pesalā bhikkhū paṭisaraṇaṃ alabhamānā araññaṃ pavisitvā gahanaṭṭhānesu nilīyissanti.
tika-s0403t0:401_12: Evaṃ hīnajaccehi ceva pāpabhikkhūhi ca upaddutānaṃ jātimantakulaputtānañceva pesalabhikkhūnañca eḷakānaṃ
tika-s0403t0:401_15: Evaṃ tassa tassa anatthassa pubbanimittabhūte soḷasa mahāsupine passi.
tika-s0403t0:401_17: Ettha ca pubbanimittato attano atthānatthanimittaṃ supinaṃ passanto attano kammānubhāvena passati.
tika-s0403t0:401_18: Kosalarājā viya lokassa atthānatthanimittaṃ supinaṃ passanto pana sabbasattasādhāraṇakammānubhāvena passatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:402_0: Kuddhā hi devatāti mahānāgavihāre mahātherassa kuddhā devatā viya.
tika-s0403t0:402_1: Rohaṇe kira mahānāgavihāre mahāthero bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anapaloketvāva ekaṃ nāgarukkhaṃ chindāpesi.
tika-s0403t0:402_2: Rukkhe adhivatthā devatā therassa kuddhā paṭhamameva naṃ saccasupinena palobhetvā pacchā “ito te sattadivasamatthake
tika-s0403t0:402_4: Thero taṃ kathaṃ āharitvā rājorodhānaṃ ācikkhi.
tika-s0403t0:402_8: Rājā divasaṃ gaṇāpetvā sattāhe vītivatte therassa hatthapāde chindāpesi.
tika-s0403t0:402_9: Ekantaṃ saccameva hotīti phalassa saccabhāvato vuttaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:402_11: Teneva pahīnavipallāsā pubbanimittabhūtampi supinaṃ na passanti.
tika-s0403t0:402_12: Dvīhi tīhipi kāraṇehi kadāci supinaṃ passatīti āha “saṃsaggabhedato”ti.
tika-s0403t0:402_13: “Asekhā na passanti pahīnavipallāsattā”ti vacanato catunnampi kāraṇānaṃ vipallāsā eva mūlakāraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:403_1: Rūpanimittādiārammaṇanti kammakammanimittagatinimittato aññaṃ rūpanimittādiārammaṇaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0403t0:403_2: Īdisānīti paccakkhato anubhūtapubbaparikappitarūpādiārammaṇāni ceva rāgādisampayuttāni ca.
tika-s0403t0:404_0: Dvīhi antehi muttoti kusalākusalasaṅkhātehi dvīhi antehi mutto.
tika-s0403t0:404_4: sutaṃ viya meti kathanakāle pana abyākatoyeva āvajjanamattasseva uppajjanato”ti vadanti.
tika-s0403t0:404_5: Evaṃ vadantehi pañcadvāre dutiyamoghavāre viya manodvārepi āvajjanaṃ dvattikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā javanaṭṭhāne
tika-s0403t0:404_6: ṭhatvā bhavaṅgaṃ otaratīti adhippetanti daṭṭhabbaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikassa āvajjanassa uppattiyaṃ “diṭṭhaṃ viya me,
tika-s0403t0:404_8: Ettha ca “supinantepi tadārammaṇavacanato paccuppannavasena atītavasena vā sabhāvadhammā supinante ārammaṇaṃ hontī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0403t0:404_9: “Yadipi supinante vibhūtaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhite rūpādivatthumhi tadārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:404_10: tathāpi supinante upaṭṭhitanimittassa parikappavasena gahetabbatāya dubbalabhāvato dubbalavatthukattāti vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-s0403t0:404_11: Keci pana “karajakāyassa nirussāhasantabhāvappattito tannissitahadayavatthu na suppasannaṃ hoti,
tika-s0403t0:404_12: tato tannissitāpi cittappavatti na suppasannā asuppasannavaṭṭinissitadīpappabhā viya,
tika-s0403t0:404_13: tasmā dubbalavatthukattāti ettha dubbalahadayavatthukattā”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0403t0:405_5: Niddāyantassa hi mahāvaṭṭiṃ jāletvā dīpe cakkhusamīpaṃ upanīte paṭhamaṃ cakkhudvārikaṃ āvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ na āvaṭṭeti,
tika-s0403t0:405_11: Tatiyavāre manodvārikaāvajjanena bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite manodvārikajavanaṃ javati.
tika-s0403t0:405_12: Tena cittena “kiṃ ayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne āloko”ti jānāti.
tika-s0403t0:405_14: ghānasamīpe sugandhesu vā duggandhesu vā pupphesu upanītesu,
tika-s0403t0:405_15: mukhe sappimhi vā phāṇite vā pakkhitte,
tika-s0403t0:405_16: piṭṭhiyaṃ pāṇinā pahāre dinne paṭhamaṃ sotadvārikādīni āvajjanāni bhavaṅgaṃ na āvaṭṭenti,
tika-s0403t0:405_22: Tatiyavāre manodvārikaāvajjanena bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite manodvārikajavanaṃ javati,
tika-s0403t0:405_23: tena cittena ñatvā “kiṃ ayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne saddo,
tika-s0403t0:405_24: saṅkhasaddo bherisaddo”ti vā “kiṃ ayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne gandho,
tika-s0403t0:405_25: mūlagandho”ti vā “kiṃ idaṃ mayhaṃ mukhaṃ pakkhittaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:405_26: sappīti vā phāṇita”nti vā “kenamhi piṭṭhiyaṃ pahaṭo,
tika-s0403t0:405_27: atibaddho me pahāro”ti vā vattā hoti.
tika-s0403t0:408_1: Sattame utusamuṭṭhānanti vassike cattāro māse uppannaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:408_3: Vassavalāhakadevaputtānañhi attano ratiyā kīḷitukāmatācitte uppanne akālepi devo vassati.
tika-s0403t0:408_5: eko kira vassavalāhakadevaputto vākarakuṭakavāsikhīṇāsavattherassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0403t0:408_8: Tumhākaṃ kira cittena devo vassatīti. Āma, bhanteti.
tika-s0403t0:408_11: Meghasīsaṃ vā gajjitaṃ vā na paññāyati,
tika-s0403t0:408_16: Devaputto tasmiṃ pavisanteyeva ekaṃ gītaṃ gāyitvā hatthaṃ ukkhipi,
tika-s0403t0:411_9: Yā pana “vācāya ce kataṃ kamma”nti evaṃ viññatti ca,
tika-s0403t0:411_11: ayaṃ vuccati sammāvācā”ti evaṃ virati ca,
tika-s0403t0:411_14: āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkatā nirayasaṃvattanikā hotī”ti evaṃ cetanā ca vācāti āgatā,
tika-s0403t0:411_23: Rāgadosādivimuttañhi yaṃ bhāsato anurodhavivajjanato agatigamanaṃ durasamussitamevāti.
tika-s0403t0:412_0: Imehi khotiādīni tāni aṅgāni paccakkhato dassento taṃ vācaṃ nigameti.
tika-s0403t0:412_3: liṅgavacanavibhattikālakārakasampattīhi ca samannāgataṃ musāvādādivācampi subhāsitanti maññanti,
tika-s0403t0:412_5: Avayavādisamannāgatāpi hi tathārūpī vācā dubbhāsitāva hoti attano ca paresañca anatthāvahattā.
tika-s0403t0:412_6: Imehi pana pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatā sacepi milakkhubhāsāpariyāpannā ghaṭaceṭikāgītikapariyāpannāpi hoti,
tika-s0403t0:412_8: Tathā hi maggapasse sassaṃ rakkhantiyā sīhaḷaceṭikāya sīhaḷakeneva jātijarāmaraṇayuttaṃ gītikaṃ gāyantiyā
tika-s0403t0:412_9: saddaṃ sutvā maggaṃ gacchantā saṭṭhimattā vipassakabhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
tika-s0403t0:413_0: Tathā tisso nāma āraddhavipassako bhikkhu padumassarasamīpena gacchanto padumassare padumāni bhañjitvā –
tika-s0403t0:418_0: Imaṃ gītiṃ gāyantiyā ceṭikāya sutvā arahattaṃ patto.
tika-s0403t0:419_0: Buddhantarepi aññataro puriso sattahi puttehi saddhiṃ aṭavito āgamma aññatarāya itthiyā musalena taṇḍule koṭṭentiyā –
tika-s0403t0:424_0: Imaṃ gītaṃ sutvā paccavekkhanto saha puttehi paccekabodhiṃ patto.
tika-s0403t0:424_1: Evaṃ imehi pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā sacepi milakkhubhāsāya pariyāpannā ghaṭaceṭikāgītikapariyāpannā vācā hoti,
tika-s0403t0:424_3: Subhāsitā eva anavajjā ananuvajjā ca viññūnaṃ atthatthikānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ atthappaṭisaraṇānaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:427_1: Dasame nissarantīti nissaraṇīyāti vattabbe dīghaṃ katvā niddeso.
tika-s0403t0:427_9: Tādisassa bhikkhuno kilesavasena kāmesu manasikāro natthīti āha “vīmaṃsanattha”nti,
tika-s0403t0:427_11: kiṃ nu kho kāmavitakkopi uppajjissatī”ti vīmaṃsantassāti attho.
tika-s0403t0:427_18: Evaṃbhūtaṃ panassa cittaṃ tassa kathaṃ tiṭṭhatīti āha “yathā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:428_2: Cittaṃ pakkhandatīti parikammacittena saddhiṃ jhānacittaṃ ekattavasena ekajjhaṃ katvā vadati.
tika-s0403t0:428_3: Gocare gatattāti attano ārammaṇe eva pavattattā.
tika-s0403t0:428_6: Cittassa ca kāyassa ca vihananato vighāto.
tika-s0403t0:428_13: tadaggena jhānampi kāmato nissaṭanti vattabbataṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ “kāmehi nissaṭattā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:428_14: Evaṃ vikkhambhanavasena kāmanissaraṇaṃ vatvā idāni samucchedavasena accantato nissaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “yo panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:429_0: Ayaṃ pana visesoti visesaṃ vadantena taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvātiādiko avisesoti katvā dutiyatatiyavāresu sabbaso anāmaṭṭho,
tika-s0403t0:429_1: catutthavāre pana ayampi visesoti dassetuṃ “accantanissaraṇañcettha arahattaphalaṃ yojetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:429_2: Yasmā arūpajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā aggamaggaṃ adhigantvā arahatte ṭhitassa cittaṃ sabbaso rūpehi nissaṭaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t0:429_3: Tassa hi phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya vīmaṃsanatthaṃ rūpābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ pesentassa.
tika-s0403t0:429_4: Idamakkhātanti samathayānikānaṃ vasena heṭṭhā cattāro vārā gahitā.
tika-s0403t0:429_6: “Puna sakkāyo natthī”ti uppannanti “idāni me sakkāyappabandho natthī”ti vīmaṃsantassa uppannaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:436_3: paresaṃ dukkaṭaṃ duruttañca paṭivirodhākaraṇena attano upari āropetvā vāsanaṃ adhivāsanaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:436_6: suṭṭhu vā pāpato orato virato sorato,
tika-s0403t0:439_1: Pañcame cetokhilā nāma atthato vicikicchā kodho ca.
tika-s0403t0:439_5: Yathā lakkhaṇapāripūriyā gahitāya sabbā satthu rūpakāyasirī gahitā eva nāma hoti evaṃ sabbaññutāya sabbadhammakāyasirī
tika-s0403t0:439_6: gahitā eva nāma hotīti tadubhayavatthukameva kaṅkhaṃ dassento “sarīre kaṅkhamāno”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t0:439_9: Vinicchetuṃ na sakkotīti sanniṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0403t0:440_0: Paṭivedhadhamme kaṅkhamānoti ettha kathaṃ lokuttaradhamme kaṅkhā pavattīti?
tika-s0403t0:440_2: anussutākāraparivitakkaladdhe parikappitarūpe kaṅkhā pavattatīti dassento āha “vipassanā…pe… vadanti,
tika-s0403t0:440_3: taṃ atthi nu kho natthīti kaṅkhatī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:440_5: Kāmañcettha visesuppattiyā mahāsāvajjatāya ceva saṃvāsanimittaṃ ghaṭanāhetu abhiṇhuppattikatāya ca sabrahmacārīsūti kopassa visayo visesetvā vutto,
tika-s0403t0:440_6: aññatthāpi kopo na cetokhiloti na sakkā viññātunti keci.
tika-s0403t0:440_7: Yadi evaṃ vicikicchāyapi ayaṃ nayo āpajjati,
tika-s0403t0:443_1: Chaṭṭhe pavattituṃ appadānavasena kusalacittaṃ vinibandhantīti cetasovinibandhā.
tika-s0403t0:443_2: Taṃ pana vinibandhantā muṭṭhiggāhaṃ gaṇhantā viya hontīti āha “cittaṃ vinibandhitvā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:443_3: Kāmagiddho puggalo vatthukāmepi kilesakāmepi assādeti abhinandatīti vuttaṃ “vatthukāmepi kilesakāmepī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:443_11: Iti pañcavidhopi lobhaviseso eva “cetovinibandho”ti vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-s0403t0:446_1: Navame āyatako nāma gītassaro taṃ taṃ vattaṃ bhinditvā akkharāni vināsetvā pavattoti āha “āyatakenā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:446_4: taṃ vināsetvā atidīghaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-s0403t0:446_5: Dhammañhi bhāsantena caturassena vattena parimaṇḍalāni padabyañjanāni dassetabbāni.
tika-s0403t0:446_8: sarabhañña”nti ca vacanato sarena dhammaṃ bhaṇituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0403t0:451_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosakoti “bālosi, mūḷhosi, oṭṭhosi, goṇosi,
tika-s0403t0:451_5: idāni te rājakulaṃ gantvā daṇḍaṃ āropessāmī”tiādīni vadanto paribhāsako nāmāti āha “bhayadassanena paribhāsako”ti.
tika-s0403t0:451_6: Lokuttaradhammā apāyamaggassa paripanthabhāvato paripantho nāmāti āha “lokuttaraparipanthassa chinnattā”ti,
tika-s0403t0:454_4: Bhinnasaṃvaroti ettha samādinnasīlo kenaci kāraṇena sīlabhedaṃ patto,
tika-s0403t0:454_6: Yo pana sabbena sabbaṃ asamādinnasīlo ācārahīno,
tika-s0403t0:454_8: Sopi sādhusamācārassa pariharaṇīyassa bheditattā bhinnasaṃvaro eva nāma.
tika-s0403t0:454_11: Māghātakāleti “mā ghātetha pāṇīna”nti evaṃ māghātaghosanaṃ ghositadivase.
tika-s0403t0:455_3: Ummīletvā idhalokanti ummīlanakāle attano puttadārādivasena idhalokaṃ passati.
tika-s0403t0:455_4: Nimīletvā paralokanti nimīlanakāle gatinimittupaṭṭhānavasena paralokaṃ passati.
tika-s0403t0:455_7: Vuttavipariyāyenāti vuttatthāya ādīnavakathāya vipariyāyena “appamatto taṃ taṃ kasivaṇijjādiṃ yathākālaṃ sampādetuṃ sakkotī”tiādinā.
tika-s0403t0:455_9: Sīlasampannoti sīlena samannāgato sampannasīloti evamādikaṃ pana atthavacanaṃ sukaranti anāmaṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:460_2: Pañcame raho nisajjāya āpajjatīti “yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappeyya,
tika-s0403t0:460_3: pācittiya”nti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade vuttaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
tika-s0403t0:460_4: Paṭicchanne āsane āpajjatīti “yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappeyya,
tika-s0403t0:460_6: Mātugāmassa uttari chappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ desento āpajjatīti ‘yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmassa uttari chappañcavācāhi
tika-s0403t0:460_7: dhammaṃ deseyya aññatra viññunā purisaviggahenā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
tika-s0403t0:470_1: Chakkanipātassa paṭhame cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti nissayavohārena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:470_4: Tenāyamattho “cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe āpāthagate taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇena disvā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:470_5: Neva sumano hotīti javanakkhaṇe iṭṭhe ārammaṇe rāgaṃ anuppādento neva sumano hoti gehassitapemavasenapi maggena sabbaso rāgassa samucchinnattā.
tika-s0403t0:470_6: Na dummanoti aniṭṭhe adussanto na dummano.
tika-s0403t0:470_7: Pasādaññathattavasenapi iṭṭhepi aniṭṭhepi majjhattepi ārammaṇe na samaṃ sammā ayoniso gahaṇaṃ asamapekkhanaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:470_8: Ayañcassa paṭipatti sativepullappattiyā paññāvepullappattiyā cāti āha “sato sampajāno hutvā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:470_13: Ṭhapetvā hi samāpattivelaṃ bhavaṅgavelañca khīṇāsavā imināva chaḷaṅgupekkhāvihārena viharanti.
tika-s0403t0:471_0: Ettha ca “chasu dvāresupi upekkhako viharatī”ti iminā chaḷaṅgupekkhā kathitā.
tika-s0403t0:471_1: “Sampajāno”ti vacanato pana cattāri ñāṇasampayuttacittāni labbhanti tehi vinā sampajānatāya asambhavato.
tika-s0403t0:471_3: “Neva sumano na dummano”ti vacanato aṭṭha mahākiriyacittāni,
tika-s0403t0:471_6: Rāgadosasahajātānaṃ somanassadomanassānaṃ abhāvo tesampi sādhāraṇoti chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena āgatānaṃ imesaṃ
tika-s0403t0:471_9: Kiñcāpi khīṇāsavo iṭṭhāniṭṭhepi ārammaṇe majjhatto viya bahulaṃ upekkhako viharati attano parisuddhapakatibhāvāvijahanato,
tika-s0403t0:471_10: kadāci pana tathā cetobhisaṅkhārābhāve yaṃ taṃ sabhāvato iṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ,
