tika-s0403t0:471_11: tassa yāthāvasabhāvaggahaṇavasenapi arahato cittaṃ pubbāsevanavasena somanassasahagataṃ hutvā pavattateva.
tika-s0403t0:474_6: Tattha “ekopi hutvā”ti iminā karaṇato pubbeva pakatiyā ekopi hutvā.
tika-s0403t0:474_7: Bahudhā hotīti bahūnaṃ santike caṅkamitukāmo vā sajjhāyaṃ kātukāmo vā pañhaṃ pucchitukāmo vā hutvā satampi sahassampi hoti.
tika-s0403t0:474_12: tirobhāvanti kenaci āvuṭaṃ hoti paṭicchannaṃ pihitaṃ paṭikujjita”nti.
tika-s0403t0:474_13: Tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchati seyyathāpi ākāseti ettha tirokuṭṭanti parakuṭṭaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:475_3: Udakepi abhijjamāneti ettha yaṃ udakaṃ akkamitvā saṃsīdati,
tika-s0403t0:475_8: Imepi candimasūriye evaṃmahiddhike evaṃmahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasatīti ettha candimasūriyānaṃ dvācattālīsayojanasahassassa
tika-s0403t0:475_10: tīsu dīpesu ekakkhaṇe ālokakaraṇena mahānubhāvatā veditabbā.
tika-s0403t0:475_16: Kāyena vasaṃ vattetīti tatra brahmaloke kāyena attano vasaṃ vatteti.
tika-s0403t0:476_1: Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattā pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhā upakkilesavimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇasampaṭicchanasamatthā
tika-s0403t0:476_3: Ayañcāpi imassa bhikkhuno vīriyabhāvanābalena nibbattā ñāṇasotadhātu tādisāyevāti dibbasadisattā dibbā.
tika-s0403t0:476_4: Apica dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attanā ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbā.
tika-s0403t0:476_9: Atikkantamānusikāyāti manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā saddasavane mānusikaṃ maṃsasotadhātuṃ atikkantāya vītivattetvā ṭhitāya.
tika-s0403t0:476_10: Ubho sadde suṇātīti dve sadde suṇāti.
tika-s0403t0:476_15: Ye dūre santike cāti ye saddā dūre paracakkavāḷepi,
tika-s0403t0:477_2: Veneyyavasena pana desanāvilāsena ca byañjananānattaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0403t0:477_3: Cetasā cetoti attano cittena tesaṃ cittaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:477_6: Sarāgaṃ vā cittantiādīsu pana aṭṭhalobhasahagatacittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:477_9: dve vicikicchuddhaccacittānīti imāni pana cattāri cittāni imasmiṃ duke saṅgahaṃ na gacchanti.
tika-s0403t0:477_11: Duvidhaṃ pana domanassacittaṃ sadosaṃ cittaṃ nāma.
tika-s0403t0:477_13: Sesāni dasa akusalacittāni imasmiṃ duke saṅgahaṃ na gacchanti.
tika-s0403t0:477_15: Samohaṃ vītamohanti ettha pana pāṭipuggalikanayena vicikicchuddhaccasahagatadvayameva samohaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:477_16: Mohassa pana sabbākusalesu sambhavato dvādasavidhampi akusalacittaṃ samohaṃ cittanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:478_1: anekehi vā pakārehi pavattitaṃ saṃvaṇṇitanti attho.
tika-s0403t0:478_2: Pubbenivāsanti samanantarātītabhavaṃ ādiṃ katvā tattha tattha nivutthasantānaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:478_8: Tattha ekampi jātinti ekampi paṭisandhimūlaṃ cutipariyosānaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ khandhasantānaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:478_10: Anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappetiādīsu pana parihāyamāno kappo saṃvaṭṭakappo,
tika-s0403t0:478_12: Tattha saṃvaṭṭena saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī gahito hoti taṃmūlakattā,
tika-s0403t0:479_0: Amutrāsinti amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappe ahaṃ amumhi bhave vā yoniyā vā gahiyā vā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā vā sattāvāse vā sattanikāye vā āsiṃ.
tika-s0403t0:479_2: Evaṃgottoti gotamo vā kaccāyano vā kassapo vā.
tika-s0403t0:479_4: Sace pana tasmiṃ kāle attano vaṇṇasampattilūkhapaṇītajīvikabhāvaṃ sukhadukkhabahulataṃ appāyukadīghāyukabhāvaṃ vā anussaritukāmo hoti,
tika-s0403t0:479_8: Tattha evaṃvaṇṇoti odāto vā sāmo vā.
tika-s0403t0:479_10: Evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedīti anena pakārena kāyikacetasikānaṃ sāmisanirāmisādippabhedānaṃ sukhadukkhānaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
tika-s0403t0:479_11: Evamāyupariyantoti evaṃ vassasataparimāṇāyupariyanto vā caturāsītikappasahassāyupariyanto vā.
tika-s0403t0:479_12: So tato cuto amutra udapādinti so ahaṃ tato bhavato yonito gahito viññāṇaṭṭhitito sattāvāsato sattanikāyato
tika-s0403t0:479_13: vā cuto punaamukasmiṃ nāma bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sakkanikāye vā udapādiṃ.
tika-s0403t0:479_14: Tatrāpāsinti tatrāpi bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sattanikāye vā puna ahosiṃ.
tika-s0403t0:480_0: Apica amutrāsinti idaṃ anupubbena ārohantassa yāvadicchakaṃ anussaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:480_2: tasmā “idhūpapanno”ti imissā idhūpapattiyā anantarameva uppattiṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya “amutra udapādi”nti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:480_3: Tatrāpāsinti evamādi panassa tatrāpi imissā upapattiyā antare upapattiṭṭhāne nāmagottādīnaṃ anussaraṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:480_4: So tato cuto idhūpapannoti svāhaṃ tato anantaruppattiṭṭhānato cuto idha amukasmiṃ nāma khattiyakule vā brāhmaṇakule vā nibbattoti.
tika-s0403t0:481_1: Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattaṃ pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhaṃ upakkilesavimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇasampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ
tika-s0403t0:481_3: Idañcāpi vīriyabhāvanābalena nibbattaṃ ñāṇacakkhu tādisamevāti dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:481_4: Dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attano ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:481_17: so yasmā duvidhampi taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ ativattati,
tika-s0403t0:481_22: mānusaṃ vā maṃsacakkhuṃ atikkantattā atikkantamānusakanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:482_0: Satte passatīti manussānaṃ maṃsacakkhunā viya satte oloketi.
tika-s0403t0:482_1: Cavamāne upapajjamāneti ettha cutikkhaṇe vā upapattikkhaṇe vā dibbacakkhunā daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā.
tika-s0403t0:482_6: Te evarūpe cavamāne upapajjamāne ca passatīti dasseti.
tika-s0403t0:482_7: Hīneti mohanissandayuttattā hīnānaṃ jātikulabhogādīnaṃ vasena hīḷite uññāte.
tika-s0403t0:483_7: Ariyānaṃ upavādakāti buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ ariyānaṃ antamaso gihisotāpannānampi anatthakāmā hutvā
tika-s0403t0:484_5: Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasammatā ayā apetattā,
tika-s0403t0:484_8: dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammena nibbattā gatīti duggati.
tika-s0403t0:484_10: vinassantā vā ettha patanti sambhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgāti vinipāto.
tika-s0403t0:485_4: So hi apāyo ceva duggati ca sugatito apetattā dukkhassa ca gatibhūtattā,
tika-s0403t0:485_7: So hi yathāvuttena atthena apāyo ceva duggati ca sabbasamussayehi vinipatitattā vinipātoti vuccati.
tika-s0403t0:485_17: So sabbopi lujjanappalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
tika-s0403t0:488_1: Aṭṭhame natthi etesaṃ uttarāni visiṭṭhānīti anuttarāni,
tika-s0403t0:488_2: anuttarāni eva anuttariyāni yathā “anantameva anantariya”nti āha “niruttarānī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:488_6: Sikkhāttayassa pūraṇanti adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ pūraṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:488_7: Tattha pūraṇaṃ nippariyāyato asekkhānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:488_8: Kalyāṇaputhujjanato paṭṭhāya hi satta sekhā tisso sikkhā pūrenti nāma,
tika-s0403t0:491_1: Navame anussatiyo eva diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādihitasukhānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato ṭhānānīti anussatiṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0403t0:491_2: Buddhaguṇārammaṇā satīti yathā buddhānussati visesādhigamassa ṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0403t0:491_3: evaṃ “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā buddhaguṇe ārabbhe uppannā sati.
tika-s0403t0:491_5: so taṃ pītiṃ khayato vayato paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0403t0:491_7: Upacārakammaṭṭhānanti ca paccakkhato upacārajjhānāvahaṃ kammaṭṭhānaparamparāya sammasanaṃ yāva arahattā lokiyalokuttaravisesāvahaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:494_4: rāgena vā saṃhitaṃ cittaṃ araññamiva corehi tena pariyuṭṭhitanti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:494_6: Byañjanaṃ pana anādiyitvā atthamattaṃ dassento “uppajjamānena rāgena uṭṭhahitvā gahita”nti āha.
tika-s0403t0:494_7: Ujukamevāti pageva kāyavaṅkādīnaṃ apanītattā cittassa ca anujubhāvakarānaṃ mānādīnaṃ abhāvato,
tika-s0403t0:494_9: Atha vā ujukamevāti kammaṭṭhānassa thinaṃ middhaṃ otiṇṇatāya līnuddhaccavigamato majjhimasamathanimittappaṭipattiyā ujubhāvameva gataṃ.
tika-s0403t0:494_10: Aṭṭhakathaṃ nissāyāti bhavajātiādīnaṃ padānaṃ atthaṃ nissāya.
tika-s0403t0:494_11: Atthavedanti vā hetuphalaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ tuṭṭhimāha.
tika-s0403t0:494_13: “Ārakattā araha”nti anussarantassa hi yadidaṃ bhagavato kilesehi ārakattaṃ, so hetu.
tika-s0403t0:494_17: Iminā nayena sesapadesupi hetuso phalavipāko veditabbo.
tika-s0403t0:494_18: Dhammānussatiādīsupi hi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇatādayo suppaṭipattiādayo ca tattha tattha hetubhāvena niddiṭṭhāyeva.
tika-s0403t0:499_12: evaṃ gihīsupi labbhanti catuparisasādhāraṇattāti taṃ dassento “bhikkhūnañhī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t0:499_13: Bhikkhuno sabbampi anavajjakāyakammaṃ ābhisamācārikakammantogadhamevāti āha “mettena cittena…pe…
tika-s0403t0:499_15: Bhattivasena pavattiyamānā cetiyabodhīnaṃ vandanā mettāsiddhāti katvā tadatthāya gamanaṃ “mettaṃ kāyakamma”nti vuttaṃ. Ādi-
tika-s0403t0:499_16: saddena cetiyabodhibhikkhūsu vuttāvasesāpacāyanādivasena pavattamettāvasena pavattaṃ kāyikaṃ kiriyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0403t0:500_1: Tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ paripucchanaatthakathanavasena pavattiyamānameva mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma hitajjhāsayena pavattitabbato.
tika-s0403t0:501_1: Pakāsabhāvo cettha yaṃ uddissa taṃ kāyakammaṃ karīyati,
tika-s0403t0:501_4: Appakāsatā ca yaṃ uddissa taṃ kāyakammaṃ karīyati,
tika-s0403t0:501_7: Tesu karontesuyeva hi sahāyabhāvagamanaṃ sammukhā kāyakammaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t0:501_9: Paggayhāti paggaṇhitvā uddhaṃ katvā kevalaṃ “devo”ti avatvā guṇehi thirabhāvajotanaṃ “devatthero”ti vacanaṃ paggayha vacanaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:501_11: Ekantaparammukhassa manokammassa sammukhatā nāma viññattisamuṭṭhāpanavasena hoti,
tika-s0403t0:501_12: tañca kho loke kāyakammanti pākaṭaṃ paññātaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:501_14: Kāmaṃ mettāsinehasiniddhānaṃ nayanānaṃ ummīlanā pasannena mukhena olokanañca mettaṃ kāyakammameva,
tika-s0403t0:501_15: yassa pana cittassa vasena nayanānaṃ mettāsinehasiniddhatā mukhassa ca pasannatā,
tika-s0403t0:502_3: So cettha “dhammaladdhā”ti vacanato atītakālikoti āha “cīvarādayo laddhapaccayā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:502_8: Na sammā gayhamānā hi dhammaladdhā nāma na hontīti tappaṭisedhanatthaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “dhammaladdhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:502_9: Deyyaṃ dakkhiṇeyyañca appaṭivibhattaṃ katvā bhuñjatīti appaṭivibhattabhogī nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t0:502_11: Cittena vibhajananti etena cittuppādamattenapi vibhajanaṃ paṭivibhattaṃ nāma,
tika-s0403t0:502_13: Cittena vibhajanapubbakaṃ vā kāyena vibhajananti mūlameva dassetuṃ “evaṃ cittena vibhajana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:502_17: Taṃ neva gihīnaṃ deti attano ājīvasodhanatthaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:502_18: Na attanā paribhuñjati “mayhaṃ asādhāraṇabhogitā mā hotū”ti.
tika-s0403t0:502_20: passatīti iminā āgamanato paṭṭhāya sādhāraṇabuddhiṃ upaṭṭhāpeti.
tika-s0403t0:503_1: passatīti iminā tassa lābhassa tīsu kālesu sādhāraṇato ṭhapanaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:503_2: Paṭiggaṇhanto ca saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti iminā paṭiggahaṇakālo dassito.
tika-s0403t0:503_5: Tadubhayaṃ pana tādisena pubbabhāgena vinā na hotīti atthasiddho purimakālo.
tika-s0403t0:503_6: Tayidaṃ paṭiggahaṇato pubbevassa hoti “saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti paṭiggaṇhissāmī”ti,
tika-s0403t0:503_8: paṭiggahetvā hoti “saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti hi paṭiggahitaṃ mayā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:503_9: Evaṃ tilakkhaṇasampannaṃ katvā laddhaṃ lābhaṃ osāraṇalakkhaṇaṃ avikopetvā paribhuñjanto sādhāraṇabhogī appaṭivibhattabhogī ca hoti.
tika-s0403t0:504_0: Imaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhammanti imaṃ catutthaṃ saritabbayuttadhamaṃ. Na hi…pe… gaṇhanti,
tika-s0403t0:504_1: tasmā sādhāraṇabhogitā dussīlassa natthīti ārambhopi tāva na sambhavati,
tika-s0403t0:504_4: Vattaṃ akhaṇḍentoti iminā appaṭivibhattabhogitaṃ sādhāraṇabhogitañca dasseti.
tika-s0403t0:504_5: Sati pana tadubhaye sāraṇīyadhammo pūrito eva hotīti āha “pūretī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:504_6: Odissakaṃ katvāti etena anodissakaṃ katvā pituno,
tika-s0403t0:504_7: ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ vā therāsanato paṭṭhāya dentassa sāraṇīyadhammoyeva hotīti dasseti.
tika-s0403t0:504_9: Sāraṇīyadhammo panassa na hoti paṭijaggaṭṭhāne odissakaṃ katvā dinnattā.
tika-s0403t0:504_12: Yadi evaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ sāraṇīyadhammaṃ pūrentassa odissakadānaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-s0403t0:504_14: No na vaṭṭati yuttaṭṭhāneti dassento “tena panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t0:504_15: Iminā odissakadānaṃ panassa na sabbattha vāritanti dasseti.
tika-s0403t0:504_16: Gilānādīnañhi odissakaṃ katvā dānaṃ appaṭivibhāgapakkhikaṃ “asukassa na dassāmī”ti paṭikkhepassa abhāvato.
tika-s0403t0:504_23: tasmā dussīlassapi atthikassa sati sambhave dātabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:505_2: Idāni tassa kosallaṃ dassetuṃ “susikkhitāya hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:505_4: na tato oranti iminā tassa duppūrataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0403t0:505_5: Tathā hi so mahapphalo mahānisaṃso diṭṭhadhammikehipi tāvagarutarehi phalānisaṃsehi anugatoti taṃsamaṅgī
tika-s0403t0:505_6: ca puggalo visesalābhī ariyapuggalo viya loke acchariyabbhutadhammasamannāgato hoti.
tika-s0403t0:505_7: Tathā hi so duppajahadānamayassa sīlamayassa puññassa paṭipakkhadhammaṃ sudūre vikkhambhitaṃ katvā visuddhena
tika-s0403t0:505_8: cetasā loke pākaṭo paññāto hutvā viharati.
tika-s0403t0:505_9: Tassimamatthaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca vibhāvetuṃ “sace hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:506_0: Idānissa samparāyike diṭṭhadhammike ca ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “evaṃ pūritasāraṇīyadhammassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:506_1: Neva issā na macchariyaṃ hoti cirakālabhāvanāya vidhutabhāvato.
tika-s0403t0:506_3: Tenāha “dadaṃ piyo hoti bhajanti naṃ bahū”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:506_4: Sulabhapaccayo hoti dānavasena uḷārajjhāsayānaṃ paccayalābhassa idhānisaṃsasabhāvato dānassa.
tika-s0403t0:506_5: Pattagatamassa diyyamānaṃ na khīyati pattagatasseva dvādasavassikassa mahāvattassa avicchedena pūritattā.
tika-s0403t0:506_6: Aggabhaṇḍaṃ labhati devasikaṃ dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ aggato paṭṭhāya dānassa dinnattā.
tika-s0403t0:506_8: āpajjanti deyyappaṭiggāhakavikappaṃ akatvā attani nirapekkhacittena cirakālaṃ dānassa pūritatāya pasāritacittattā.
tika-s0403t0:507_7: Tathā hi dutiyavatthusmimpi therena attā pakāsito.
tika-s0403t0:508_0: Giribhaṇḍamahāpūjāyāti cetiyagirimhi sakalalaṅkādīpe yojanappamāṇe samudde ca nāvāsaṅghāṭādike ṭhapetvā dīpapupphagandhādīhi kariyamānāya mahāpūjāya.
tika-s0403t0:508_1: Tassā ca paṭipattiyā avañjhabhāvavibhāvanatthaṃ “ete mayhaṃ pāpuṇissantī”ti āha.
tika-s0403t0:509_3: mama pattapariyāpannenapi sabbāpimā bhikkhuniyo yāpessantīti āha “mā tumhe tesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ cintayitthā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:509_6: therassa pana sīlatejeneva devatā ussukkaṃ āpajji.
tika-s0403t0:510_1: Taṃ pana nesaṃ khaṇḍaṃ dassetuṃ “yassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:510_4: Na hi añño koci āpattikkhandhānaṃ anukkamo atthi,
tika-s0403t0:510_6: Pariyante chinnasāṭako viyāti tatrante dasante vā chinnavatthaṃ viya.
tika-s0403t0:510_20: tasmā taṇhādāsabyato mocanavacanena tesaṃ sīlānaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayatamāha.
tika-s0403t0:510_21: Bhujissabhāvakaraṇatoti iminā bhujissakarāni bhujissānīti uttarapadalopenāyaṃ niddesoti dasseti.
tika-s0403t0:510_22: Yasmā vā taṃsamaṅgipuggalo serī sayaṃvasī bhujisso nāma hoti,
tika-s0403t0:510_25: Suparisuddhabhāvena vā sampannattā viññūhi pasatthānīti viññuppasatthāni.
tika-s0403t0:511_0: Taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhattāti “imināhaṃ sīlena devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā”ti taṇhāparāmāsena,
tika-s0403t0:511_1: “imināhaṃ sīlena devo hutvā tattha nicco dhuvo sassato bhavissāmī”ti diṭṭhiparāmāsena ca aparāmaṭṭhattā.
tika-s0403t0:511_2: Parāmaṭṭhunti “ayaṃ te sīlesu doso”ti catūsu vipattīsu yāya kāyaci vipattiyā dassanena parāmaṭṭhuṃ,
tika-s0403t0:511_4: Sīlaṃ nāma avippaṭisārādipārampariyena yāvadeva samādhisampādanatthanti āha “samādhisaṃvattanikānī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:512_1: paripuṇṇacatupārisuddhibhāvena majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇassa viya bhedābhāvato sīlena sāmaññaṃ sīlasāmaññaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:512_5: Kāmaṃ puthujjanānampi catupārisuddhisīle nānattaṃ na siyā,
tika-s0403t0:512_7: idaṃ ekantikaṃ niyatabhāvatoti āha “natthi maggasīle nānatta”nti.
tika-s0403t0:512_8: Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttanti maggasīlaṃ sandhāya taṃ “yāni tāni sīlānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:513_0: Yāyanti yā ayaṃ mayhañceva tumhākañca paccakkhabhūtā.
tika-s0403t0:513_5: Sayaṃ niyyantīyeva hi taṃsamaṅgipuggalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhato niyyāpetīti vuccati.
tika-s0403t0:516_4: Saṅgaṇhanatthāyāti saṅgahavatthuvisesabhāvato sabrahmacārīnaṃ saṅgahaṇāya saṃvattantīti sambandho.
tika-s0403t0:516_6: Sati ca avivadanahetubhūtasaṅgahakatte tesaṃ vasena sabrahmacārīnaṃ samaggabhāvo bhedābhāvo siddhoyevāti āha “sāmaggiyā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:519_2: Punappunaṃ katāti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena aparāparaṃ pavattitā.
tika-s0403t0:519_3: Yuttayānasadisā katāti yathā yuttamājaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattati,
tika-s0403t0:519_5: Vatthukatāti vā adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vatthu viya katā,
tika-s0403t0:519_6: sabbaso upakkilesavisodhanena iddhivisesatāya pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato suvisodhitaparissayavatthu viya katāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:519_11: Abhūtabyākaraṇaṃ byākarotīti “mettā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā”tiādinā attani avijjamānaguṇābhibyāhāraṃ byāharati.
tika-s0403t0:519_13: Puna byāpādo natthīti idāni mama byāpādo nāma sabbaso natthīti ñatvā.
tika-s0403t0:520_6: rāgo eva vā nimittaṃ rāganimittaṃ. Ādi-
tika-s0403t0:520_10: Tayidaṃ nimittaṃ yasmā sabbena sabbaṃ arahattaphale natthi,
tika-s0403t0:520_13: Nimittaṃ anussarati anugacchati ārabbha pavattati sīlenāti nimittānusārī.
tika-s0403t0:521_1: Ayaṃ nāma ahamasmīti rūpalakkhaṇo vedanādīsu vā aññataralakkhaṇo ayaṃ nāma attā ahaṃ asmīti.
tika-s0403t0:521_4: Puna asmimāno natthīti tassa anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ kittento samugghātattameva vibhāveti.
tika-s0403t0:524_1: Catutthe āramitabbaṭṭhena vā kammaṃ ārāmo etassāti kammārāmo.
tika-s0403t0:524_2: Kamme rato na ganthadhure vipassanādhure vāti kammarato.
tika-s0403t0:524_3: Punappunaṃ yuttoti tapparabhāvena anu anu yutto pasuto.
tika-s0403t0:527_1: Chaṭṭhe visabhāgavedanuppattiyā kakaceneva catuiriyāpathaṃ chindanto ābādhayatīti ābādho,
tika-s0403t0:528_0: Sappaṭibhayakantārasadisā soḷasavatthukā aṭṭhavatthukā ca vicikicchā tiṇṇā imāyāti tiṇṇavicikicchā.
tika-s0403t0:528_1: Vigatā samucchinnā pavattiādīsu “evaṃ nu kho na nu kho”ti evaṃ pavattikā kathaṃkathā assāti vigatakathaṃkathā.
tika-s0403t0:528_2: Sārajjakarānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pahīnattā rāgavikkhepesu sīlādiguṇesu ca tiṭṭhakattā vesārajjaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:528_4: Attanā eva paccakkhato diṭṭhattā na paraṃ pacceti,
tika-s0403t0:529_2: Gilāno hutvā vuṭṭhitoti idaṃ pana atthamattanidassanaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:532_1: Sattame paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti ettha paṭisallānanti tehi tehi saddhivihārikaantevāsikaupāsakādisattehi
tika-s0403t0:532_2: ceva rūpārammaṇādisaṅkhārehi ca paṭinivattitvā apasakkitvā nilīyanaṃ vivecanaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:532_3: Kāyacittehi tato vivitto ekībhāvo pavivekoti āha “ekībhāvāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:532_6: Vuṭṭhitoti tato duvidhavivekato bhavaṅguppattiyā sabrahmacārīhi samāgamena upeto.
tika-s0403t0:538_1: Navame evaṃnāmake gāmeti nātikānāmakaṃ gāmaṃ nissāya.
tika-s0403t0:538_8: So kira gāmo yesaṃ tadā tesaṃ pubbapurisena attano ñātīnaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvena nivasito,
tika-s0403t0:538_10: Atha pacchā dvīhi dāyādehi dvidhā vibhajitvā paribhutto.
tika-s0403t0:538_13: So hi āvāso yathā sudhāparikammena payojanaṃ natthi,
tika-s0403t0:538_14: evaṃ iṭṭhakāhi eva cinitvā chādetvā kato.
tika-s0403t0:538_15: Tasmiṃ kira padese mattikā sakkharamarumpavālukādīhi asammissā kathinā saṇhasukhumā,
tika-s0403t0:538_16: tāya katāni kulālabhājanānipi silāmayāni viya daḷhāni.
tika-s0403t0:538_17: Tasmā te upāsakā tāya mattikāya dīghaputhū iṭṭhakā kāretvā ṭhapetvā ṭhapetvā dvāravātapānakavāṭatulāyo
tika-s0403t0:538_18: sabbaṃ dabbasambhārena vinā tāhi iṭṭhakāhiyeva pāsādaṃ kāresuṃ.
tika-s0403t0:539_2: Bahu vata me kataṃ assāti bahu vata mayā attahitaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ kataṃ bhaveyya.
tika-s0403t0:540_3: bahi nikkhantavāto vā anto pavisatīti ekasseva pavesanikkhamo viya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:543_5: So mamassa antarāyoti yathāvuttā na kevalaṃ kālakiriyāva,
tika-s0403t0:543_6: mama atidullabhaṃ khaṇaṃ labhitvā tassa satthusāsanamanasikārassa ceva jīvitassa ca saggamokkhānañca antarāyo assa,
tika-s0403t0:543_10: Satthakena viya aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kantanakārakā kāye sandhibandhanacchedakavātā satthakavātā.
tika-s0403t0:548_5: Anavasesaṃ pharituṃ samatthassapi obhāsassa kenaci kāraṇena ekadesapharaṇampi siyā,
tika-s0403t0:548_6: ayaṃ pana sabbasova pharatīti dassetuṃ samantattho kappa-
tika-s0403t0:548_8: Attano obhāsena pharitvāti vatthālaṅkārasarīrasamuṭṭhitena obhāsena pharitvā,
tika-s0403t0:548_9: candimā viya ekobhāsaṃ ekapajjotaṃ karitvāti attho.
tika-s0403t0:548_20: Catunnaṃ vā khandhānaṃ apadakkhiṇaggāhitākārena pavattānaṃ etaṃ adhivacananti vadanti.
tika-s0403t0:548_21: Pāpā assaddhādayo puggalā etassa mittāti pāpamitto,
tika-s0403t0:548_24: Yāya hi cetanāya puggalo pāpamitto pāpasampavaṅko nāma hoti,
tika-s0403t0:548_26: Cattāropi vā arūpino khandhā tadākārappavattā pāpamittatā.
tika-s0403t0:551_2: upādānanti āha “jātiyā ca maraṇassa ca sambhave paccayabhūte”ti.
tika-s0403t0:551_7: Sabbadukkhaṃ upaccagunti sakalampi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ atikkantā carimacittanirodhena vaṭṭadukkhalesassapi asambhavato.
tika-s0403t0:554_4: tasmā ṭhapanakusaloti atthoti āha “samādhiṃ ṭhapetuṃ sakkotīti attho”ti.
tika-s0403t0:554_5: Tattha ṭhapetuṃ sakkotīti sattaṭṭhaaccharāmattaṃ khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ sakkoti adhiṭṭhānavasibhāvassa nipphāditattā.
tika-s0403t0:554_11: Kallaṃ kātunti samādhānassa paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ dūrīkaraṇena sahakārīkāraṇānañca samappadhānena samāpajjane cittaṃ samatthaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-s0403t0:554_12: Samādhissa gocarakusaloti samādhismiṃ nipphādetabbe tassa gocare kammaṭṭhānasaññite pavattiṭṭhāne bhikkhācāragocare satisampajaññayogato kusalo cheko.
tika-s0403t0:554_14: Paṭhamajjhānādisamādhiṃ abhinīharitunti paṭhamajjhānādisamādhiṃ visesabhāgiyatāya abhinīharituṃ upanetuṃ.
tika-s0403t0:557_1: Pañcame anussatikāraṇānīti anussatiyo eva diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādihitasukhānaṃ hetubhāvato kāraṇāni.
tika-s0403t0:560_1: Chaṭṭhe sambādheti vā taṇhāsaṃkilesādīnaṃ sampīḷe saṅkare gharāvāse.
tika-s0403t0:560_2: Okāsā vuccantīti maggaphalasukhādhigamāya okāsabhāvato okāsāti vuccanti.
tika-s0403t0:560_4: Visujjhanatthāyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkiliṭṭhacittānaṃ visuddhatthāya.
tika-s0403t0:560_5: Sā panāyaṃ cittassa visuddhi sijjhamānā yasmā sokādīnaṃ anupādāya saṃvattati,
tika-s0403t0:560_7: Tattha socanaṃ ñātibyasanādinimittaṃ cetaso santāpo antotāpo antonijjhānaṃ soko,
tika-s0403t0:560_12: Dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāyāti kāyikadukkhassa ca cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamāya,
tika-s0403t0:560_15: taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhati etenāti ñāyo,
tika-s0403t0:560_17: Idha pana saha pubbabhāgena ariyamaggo gahitoti āha “sahavipassanakassa maggassa adhigamanatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:563_1: Sattame vaḍḍhetīti manaso vivaṭṭanissitaṃ vaḍḍhiṃ āvahati.
tika-s0403t0:563_3: Yañca āvajjato manasi karoto cittaṃ vinīvaraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:563_4: Imasmiṃ pakkhe kammasādhano sambhāvanattho bhāvanīya- saddo.
tika-s0403t0:563_7: saddena idha avuttānaṃ atibhojane nimittaggāhādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0403t0:563_8: Vuttañhetaṃ “cha dhammā thinamiddhassa pahānāya saṃvattanti atibhojane nimittaggāho,
tika-s0403t0:566_1: Aṭṭhame maṇḍalasaṇṭhānamāḷasaṅkhepena katā bhojanasālā maṇḍalamāḷāti adhippetāti āha “bhojanasālāyā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:569_1: Navame diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho attabhāvoti āha “imasmiṃyeva attabhāve”ti.
tika-s0403t0:569_3: Ālokasaññaṃ manasi karotīti sūriyacandapajjotamaṇiukkāvijjuādīnaṃ āloko divā rattiñca upaladdho,
tika-s0403t0:569_7: yathāssa subhāvitālokakasiṇassa viya kasiṇāloko yathicchakaṃ yāvadicchakañca so āloko rattiyaṃ upatiṭṭhati.
tika-s0403t0:569_11: Divāti saññaṃ ṭhapetīti vuttanayena manasi katvā divāriva saññaṃ uppādeti.
tika-s0403t0:569_13: tatheva taṃ manasi karotīti yathānena divā upaladdho sūriyāloko,
tika-s0403t0:569_14: evaṃ rattimpi divā diṭṭhākāreneva taṃ ālokaṃ manasi karoti.
tika-s0403t0:569_16: manasi karotīti yathā rattiyaṃ candāloko upaladdho,
tika-s0403t0:569_17: evaṃ divāpi rattiṃ diṭṭhākāreneva taṃ ālokaṃ manasi karoti,
tika-s0403t0:569_22: Dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ rūpagatassa dibbassa itarassa ca dassanaṭṭhena idha ñāṇadassananti adhippetanti āha “dibbacakkhusaṅkhātassā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:570_0: Uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānāti jīvitakkhayato upari maraṇato paraṃ.
tika-s0403t0:570_8: Kucchitaṃ vinīlaṃ vinīlakanti kucchanattho vā ayaṃ ka-
tika-s0403t0:570_9: kāroti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ yathā “pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:571_0: So bhikkhūti yo “passeyya sarīraṃ sīvathikāya chaḍḍita”nti vutto,
tika-s0403t0:571_7: Evaṃpūtikasabhāvoti evaṃ ativiya pūtisabhāvo āyuādivigame viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0403t0:571_8: Ediso bhavissatīti evaṃbhāvīti āha “evamevaṃ uddhumātādibhedo bhavissatī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:572_1: Sesāvasesamaṃsalohitayuttanti sabbaso akkhāditattā tahaṃ tahaṃ sesena appāvasesena maṃsalohitena yuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:572_2: Aññena hatthaṭṭhikanti avisesena hatthaṭṭhikānaṃ vippakiṇṇatā jotitāti anavasesato tesaṃ vippakiṇṇataṃ dassento “catusaṭṭhibhedampī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t0:572_4: Tāni pana saṃvaccharaṃ vītivattāni hontīti āha “atikkantasaṃvaccharānī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:572_10: Satiyā ca ñāṇassa ca atthāyāti “abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotī”tiādinā vuttāya sattaṭṭhānikāya satiyā ceva taṃsampayuttañāṇassa ca atthāya.
tika-s0403t0:575_6: puthujjanehi sevitabbattā tesaṃ santakanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:575_12: Tādisañca atthasannissitaṃ na hotīti āha “na atthasannissita”nti.
tika-s0403t0:575_14: Asati pana vaṭṭe nibbidāya virāgādīnaṃ asambhavoyevāti āha “na virāgāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:576_2: Hatthivisayattā hatthisannissitattā ca hatthisippaṃ “hatthī”ti gahetvā “hatthismimpi sikkhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:576_3: Tasmā hatthisippe sikkhatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0403t0:577_0: Liṅgabyattayena vibhattibyattayena pāricariyeti vuttanti āha “pāricariyāya paccupaṭṭhitā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:582_1: Catutthassa paṭhame sekhānaṃ paṭiladdhaguṇassa parihāni nāma natthīti āha “uparūpariguṇaparihānāyā”ti,
tika-s0403t0:585_3: Atha vā vijjābhāge vijjākoṭṭhāse vattanti vijjāsabhāgatāya tadekadese vijjākoṭṭhāse pavattantīti vijjābhāgiyā.
tika-s0403t0:585_8: Pacchimena atthena tāsu yā kāci ekāva vijjā vijjā,
tika-s0403t0:585_11: Idha pana vipassanāñāṇasampayuttā saññāva vijjābhāgiyāti āgatā,
tika-s0403t0:588_2: Yasmā so appahīnakodhatāya adhigatakodho nāma hoti,
tika-s0403t0:588_6: Vivādo nāma uppajjamāno yebhuyyena paṭhamaṃ dvinnaṃ vasena uppajjatīti vuttaṃ “dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vivādo”ti.
tika-s0403t0:588_7: So pana yathā bahūnaṃ anatthāvaho hoti,
tika-s0403t0:589_0: Guṇamakkhanāya pavattopi attano kārakaṃ gūthena paharantiṃ gūtho viya paṭhamataraṃ makkhetīti makkho,
tika-s0403t0:589_3: parassa guṇe ḍaṃsitvā viya apanetīti attho.
tika-s0403t0:589_5: Paḷāsī puggalo hi dutiyassa dhuraṃ na deti,
tika-s0403t0:589_11: Saṭhayati na sammā bhāsatīti saṭho aññathā santaṃ attānaṃ aññathā pavedanato.
tika-s0403t0:589_13: Micchā pāpikā viññugarahitā etassa diṭṭhīti micchādiṭṭhi,
tika-s0403t0:589_14: kammapathapariyāpannāya “natthi dinna”ntiādivatthukāya micchattapariyāpannāya aniyyānikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgatoti attho.
tika-s0403t0:590_6: Yuttaṃ kāraṇaṃ disvāva laddhiṃ paṭinissajjatīti paṭinissaggī,
tika-s0403t0:590_7: dukkhena kicchena kasirena bahumpi kāraṇaṃ dassetvā na sakkā paṭinissaggaṃ kātunti duppaṭinissaggī.
tika-s0403t0:590_8: Yo attano uppannadiṭṭhiṃ “idameva sacca”nti daḷhaṃ gaṇhitvā api buddhādīhi kāraṇaṃ dassetvā vuccamāno na paṭinissajjati.
tika-s0403t0:590_10: Tādiso hi puggalo yaṃ yadeva dhammaṃ vā adhammaṃ vā suṇāti,
tika-s0403t0:590_12: evaṃ amhehi suta”nti kummova aṅgāni sake kapāle antoyeva samodahati.
tika-s0403t0:590_13: Yathā hi kacchapo attano hatthapādādike aṅge kenaci ghaṭite sabbāni aṅgāni attano kapāleyeva samodahati,
tika-s0403t0:590_16: chaḍḍehi na”nti vutto taṃ na vissajjati,
tika-s0403t0:590_17: antoyeva attano hadaye eva ṭhapetvā vicarati,
tika-s0403t0:594_0: “Pubbeva dānā sumano”tiādigāthāya pubbeva dānā muñcacetanāya pubbe dānūpakaraṇasambharaṇato paṭṭhāya
tika-s0403t0:594_1: sumano “sampattīnaṃ nidānaṃ anugāmikadānaṃ dassāmī”ti somanassito bhaveyya.
tika-s0403t0:594_2: Dadaṃ cittaṃ pasādayeti dadanto deyyadhammaṃ dakkhiṇeyyahatthe patiṭṭhāpento “asārato dhanato sārādānaṃ karomī”ti attano cittaṃ pasādeyya.
tika-s0403t0:594_3: Datvā attamano hotīti dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ deyyadhammaṃ pariccajitvā “paṇḍitapaññattaṃ nāma mayā anuṭṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:594_4: aho sādhu suṭṭhū”ti attamano pamudito pītisomanassajāto hoti.
tika-s0403t0:594_5: Esāti yā ayaṃ pubbacetanā muñcacetanā aparacetanāti imāsaṃ kammaphalānaṃ saddhānugatānaṃ somanassapariggahitānaṃ tividhānaṃ cetanānaṃ pāripūrī, esā.
tika-s0403t0:598_1: Aṭṭhame kusalakiriyāya ādiārambhabhāvena pavattavīriyaṃ ṭhitasabhāvatāya sabhāvadhāraṇaṭṭhena dhātūti vuttanti āha –
tika-s0403t0:598_3: Laddhāsevanaṃ vīriyaṃ balappattaṃ hutvā paṭipakkhe vidhamatīti āha “nikkamadhātūti kosajjato nikkhamanasabhāvaṃ vīriya”nti.
tika-s0403t0:598_4: Parakkamanasabhāvoti adhimattatarānaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vidhamanasamatthatāya paṭupaṭutarabhāvena paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanasabhāvo.
tika-s0403t0:601_1: Dvādasame māhaṃ nāgita yasena samāgamanti mā ahaṃ yasena samāgamanaṃ patthemi.
tika-s0403t0:601_2: Mā ca mayā yasoti yaso ca mayā mā samāgacchatūti attho.
tika-s0403t0:606_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame parisiñcitunti yo cuṇṇamattikādīhi gattāni ubbaṭṭento mallakamuṭṭhādīhi vā ghaṃsanto nahāyati,
tika-s0403t0:606_5: Bhagavato ca sarīre tathā haritabbaṃ rajojallaṃ nāma nupalimpati acchachavibhāvato,
tika-s0403t0:606_6: utuggahaṇatthaṃ pana bhagavā kevalaṃ udake otarati.
tika-s0403t0:607_3: Tathā hi so vipassissa bhagavato kāle yojaniko ahosi,
tika-s0403t0:607_10: Tampi nagaraṃ tassa vihārassa kadāci pācīnato hoti,
tika-s0403t0:607_14: Jetavanagandhakuṭiyaṃ pana catunnaṃ mañcapādānaṃ patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ acalameva.
tika-s0403t0:607_19: Ayaṃ pana pubbakoṭṭhako kassapadasabalassa vīsatiusabhavihārakāle pācīnadvārakoṭṭhako ahosi.
tika-s0403t0:608_0: Kassapadasabalassa kāle aciravatī nagaraṃ parikkhipitvā sandamānā pubbakoṭṭhakaṃ patvā udakena bhinditvā
tika-s0403t0:608_5: ekaṃ buddhānanti evaṃ pāṭiekkāni nhānatitthāni honti ramaṇīyānivippakiṇṇarajatapaṭṭasadisavālukāni.
tika-s0403t0:608_6: Iti bhagavatā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṃ yena ayaṃ evarūpo pubbakoṭṭhako,
tika-s0403t0:608_10: Thero dupaṭṭena saddhiṃ mahācīvaraṃ attano hatthagataṃ akāsi.
tika-s0403t0:608_12: sahotaraṇenevassa udake macchakacchapā sabbe suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ahesuṃ,
tika-s0403t0:608_13: yantanāḷikāhi suvaṇṇarasadhārāni siñcanakālo viya suvaṇṇapaṭappasāraṇakālo viya ca ahosi.
tika-s0403t0:608_14: Atha bhagavato nahānavattaṃ dassetvā paccuttiṇṇassa thero surattadupaṭṭaṃ upanāmesi.
tika-s0403t0:608_15: Bhagavā taṃ nivāsetvā vijjullatāsadisaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā mahācīvaraṃ antantena saṃharitvā padumagabbhasadisaṃ
tika-s0403t0:608_16: katvā upanītaṃ dvīsu kaṇṇesu gahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0403t0:608_17: Tena vuttaṃ “pubbakoṭṭhake gattāni parisiñcitvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:609_0: Evaṃ ṭhitassa pana bhagavato sarīraṃ vikasitapadumapupphasadisaṃ sabbapāliphullaṃ pāricchattakaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:609_1: tārāmarīcivikasitañca gaganatalaṃ siriyā avahasamānaṃ viya virocittha,
tika-s0403t0:609_2: byāmappabhāparikkhepavilāsinī cassa dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇamālā ganthitvā ṭhapitā dvattiṃsa candimā viya,
tika-s0403t0:609_8: tasmā tahaṃ tahaṃ viniggatasujātajātihiṅgulakarasūpasobhitaṃ upari satamegharatanāvalisucchāditaṃ jaṅgamamiva kanakagirisikharaṃ virocittha.
tika-s0403t0:609_9: Tasmiñca samaye dasabalassa sarīrato nikkhamitvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo samantato asītihatthappamāṇe padese
tika-s0403t0:609_15: Evarūpesu ṭhānesu buddhānaṃ sarīravaṇṇaṃ vā guṇavaṇṇaṃ vā cuṇṇiyapadehi vā gāthāhi vā atthañca upamāyo
tika-s0403t0:609_16: ca kāraṇāni ca āharitvā paṭibalena dhammakathikena pūretvā kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0403t0:609_17: Evarūpesu hi ṭhānesu dhammakathikassa thāmo veditabbo.
tika-s0403t0:609_20: Sodake gatte cīvaraṃ pārupantassa hi cīvare kaṇṇikāni uṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0403t0:609_22: buddhānaṃ pana sarīre rajojallaṃ na upalimpati,
tika-s0403t0:609_23: padumapatte ukkhittaudakabindu viya udakaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā gacchati.
tika-s0403t0:609_24: Evaṃ santepi sikkhāgāravatāya bhagavā “pabbajitavattaṃ nāmeta”nti mahācīvaraṃ ubhosu kaṇṇesu gahetvā purato kāyaṃ paṭicchādetvā aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0403t0:610_4: Atha vā bherimudiṅgapaṇavāditūriyānaṃ tāḷitaṃ vīṇāveḷugomukhiādīnaṃ vāditañca tūriyatāḷitavāditanti vā evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0403t0:611_2: So hi bhagavā sabbadhamme abhijānanto gatoti abhiññāpāragū.
tika-s0403t0:611_8: Subrahmadevaputtādayoti ettha so kira devaputto accharāsaṅghaparivuto nandanakīḷitaṃ katvā pāricchattakamūle paññattāsane nisīdi.
tika-s0403t0:611_10: pañcasatā rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā madhurassarena gāyitvā pupphāni pātenti.
tika-s0403t0:611_12: Atha rukkhaṃ abhiruḷhā upacchedakavasena ekappahāreneva kālaṃ katvā avīcimhi nibbattā mahādukkhaṃ anubhavanti.
tika-s0403t0:611_13: Atha kāle gacchante devaputto “imāsaṃ neva saddo suyyati,
tika-s0403t0:611_15: kahaṃ nu kho gatā”ti āvajjento niraye nibbattabhāvaṃ disvā piyavatthukasokena ruppamāno cintesi –
tika-s0403t0:611_18: So “sattame divase mayāpi avasesāhi pañcasatāhi saddhiṃ kālaṃ katvā tattheva nibbattitabba”nti disvā balavatarena sokena samappito.
tika-s0403t0:611_19: “Imaṃ mayhaṃ sokaṃ sadevake loke aññatra tathāgatā nibbāpetuṃ samattho natthī”ti cintetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito –
tika-s0403t0:614_0: Sace atthi anutrastaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti. –
tika-s0403t0:618_1: So desanāpariyosāne vigatasoko pañcahi accharāsatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya bhagavantaṃ namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0403t0:620_5: sabbāpi sīlasaṃvaro soracca”nti vacanato sucisīlaṃ “soracca”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:621_3: Na lippatīti na allīyati anusayato ārammaṇakaraṇato vā taṇhādiṭṭhiabhinivesābhāvato.
tika-s0403t0:624_4: Bhavissantīti atītatthe anāgatavacanaṃ katanti āha “bhavissantīti jātā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:624_5: Purāṇassa hi isidattassa ca samagatikaṃ sandhāya sā evamāha.
tika-s0403t0:625_2: Itthīsu yadidaṃ ammakā mātugāmo jananī janikāti.
tika-s0403t0:626_0: Diṭṭhiyā paṭivijjhitabbaṃ appaṭividdhaṃ hotīti atthato kāraṇato ca paññāya paṭivijjhitabbaṃ appaṭividdhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0403t0:626_1: nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ katvā yāthāvato aviditaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:626_2: Samaye samaye kilesehi vimuccanakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ idha sāmāyikaṃ ma-
tika-s0403t0:626_4: “sāmāyikampi vimuttiṃ na labhatīti kālānukālaṃ dhammassavanaṃ nissāya pītipāmojjaṃ na labhatī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:627_0: Tadantaranti vacanavipallāsena upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ katanti āha “taṃ antaraṃ taṃ kāraṇa”nti.
tika-s0403t0:630_8: suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti kenaci akampiyabhāvena okappanaṃ ratanattayaguṇe ogāhetvā kappanaṃ okappanasaddhā nāma.
tika-s0403t0:630_10: idaṃ pana kammaṃ saka”nti evaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca kammassakatajānanapaññā kammassakatapaññā.
tika-s0403t0:630_11: Tividhañhi duccaritaṃ attanā katampi sakakammaṃ nāma na hoti atthabhañjanato.
tika-s0403t0:630_13: Iṇādānasminti paccattavacanatthe etaṃ bhummanti āha “iṇaggahaṇaṃ vadāmī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:631_0: Kaṭaggāhoti kataṃ sabbaso siddhameva katvā gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:631_10: Yo gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ vinodetvā catūsu iriyāpathesu aṭṭhaārambhavatthuvasena ekako hoti,
tika-s0403t0:631_11: tassa kāyikaṃ vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t0:631_13: Gamane uppannakilesassa ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
tika-s0403t0:631_15: nisajjāya uppannakilesassa sayanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
tika-s0403t0:631_17: Ayaṃ cetasikaṃ vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t0:631_18: Paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena seṭṭhaṭṭhena ca eko udetīti ekodi, ekaggatā.
tika-s0403t0:631_22: Aññataraṃ kāyādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sātisayāya satiyā saratīti sato.
tika-s0403t0:632_0: Akuppā me vimuttīti mayhaṃ arahattaphalavimutti akuppatāya akuppārammaṇatāya ca akuppā.
tika-s0403t0:632_1: Sā hi rāgādīhi na kuppatīti akuppatāyapi akuppā.
tika-s0403t0:632_6: Imāni hi satte bhavesu saṃyojenti upanibandhanti bhavābhavena saṃyojenti,
tika-s0403t0:632_9: Aññe hi sattā yāva na kilesā pahīyanti,
tika-s0403t0:635_3: Taṃ pana yasmā catūhi maggehi paccekaṃ catūsu saccesu kattabbattā soḷasavidhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:635_5: Khandhakilesaabhisaṅkhārasaṅkhātā tayo osīdāpanaṭṭhena bhārā viyāti bhārā.
tika-s0403t0:635_6: Te ohitā oropitā nikkhittā pātitā etenāti ohitabhāro.
tika-s0403t0:635_13: Ettha hi arahattaṃ attano yonisomanasikārāyattattā attūpanibandhaṭṭhena sasantānapariyāpannattā attānaṃ
tika-s0403t0:635_14: avijahanaṭṭhena attano uttamatthena ca attano atthattā “sakattho”ti vuccati.
tika-s0403t0:635_17: acchinnabhūtāya maggapaññāya sammā yathābhūtaṃ dukkhādīsu yo yathā jānitabbo,
tika-s0403t0:635_20: Vimuttoti ca dve vimuttiyo sabbassa cittasaṃkilesassa maggo nibbānādhimutti ca.
tika-s0403t0:638_1: Aṭṭhame upanisīdati phalaṃ etthāti kāraṇaṃ upanisā.
tika-s0403t0:638_8: maggāmagge vavatthapetvā ṭhitañāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:638_10: Balavavipassanāti bhayatupaṭṭhāne ñāṇaṃ ādīnavānupassane ñāṇaṃ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:638_13: tāva taruṇavipassanā”ti hi vacanato upakkilesavimuttaudayabbayañāṇato balavavipassanā.
tika-s0403t0:641_1: Navame therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamātiādipāḷipadesu imināva nayena attho daṭṭhabbo –
tika-s0403t0:641_4: Vācuggatadhāraṇena sammadeva garūnaṃ santike āgamitabhāvena āgato pariyattidhammasaṅkhāto āgamo etesanti āgatāgamā.
tika-s0403t0:641_9: Taṃ atthaparipucchāya paripañhati vīmaṃsati vicāreti. Idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:641_11: Āvivaṭañceva pāḷiyā atthaṃ padesantarapāḷidassanena āgamato vivaranti.
tika-s0403t0:641_13: Kaṅkhāṭṭhāniyesu dhammesu saṃsayuppattiyā hetuyā gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtesu pāḷipadesu yāthāvato vinicchayadānena kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti.
tika-s0403t0:644_3: Pathaviyā dāyatthāya vā cittaṃ abhiniveso etesanti pathavībhinivesā.
tika-s0403t0:647_1: Ekādasame jaṅgalānanti ettha yo nipicchalo na anūpo nirudakatāya thaddhalūkho bhūmippadeso,
tika-s0403t0:647_3: Tabbahulatāya pana idha sabbo bhūmippadeso jaṅgalo.
tika-s0403t0:647_4: Tasmiṃ jaṅgale jātā bhavāti vā jaṅgalā,
tika-s0403t0:647_6: Evañhi nadicarānampi hatthīnaṃ saṅgaho kato hoti samodhātabbānaṃ viya samodhāyakānampi idha jaṅgalaggahaṇena gahetabbato.
tika-s0403t0:647_7: Pathavītalacārīnanti iminā jalacārino ca nivatteti adissamānapādattā.
tika-s0403t0:647_17: Kūṭasamosaraṇāti chidde anupavisanavasena ca āhacca avatthānena ca kūṭe samodahitvā ṭhitā.
tika-s0403t0:647_18: Vaṇṭe patamāne sabbāni bhūmiyaṃ patantīti āha “vaṇṭānuvattakāni bhavantī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:650_9: Yassa pana jātadivase dasasahassī lokadhātu ekaddhajamālāvippakiṇṇakusumavāsacuṇṇagaṇasugandhā sabbapāliphullamiva
tika-s0403t0:650_10: nandanavanaṃ virocamānā paduminipaṇṇe udakabindu viya akampittha,
tika-s0403t0:650_15: Santanetvā sabbaso tanetvā pattharitvā ṭhitamūlāni mūlasantānakāni.
tika-s0403t0:650_16: Tāni pana atthato mūlāniyevāti āha “mūlasantānakānanti mūlāna”nti.
tika-s0403t0:651_1: rañño aparimitassa ca sattakāyassa anatthato paripālanasamatthatāya ca “jotipālo”ti laddhanāmattā vuttaṃ “nāmena jotipālo”ti.
tika-s0403t0:651_4: Taṃ kira tassa brāhmaṇassa kulaparamparāgataṃ ṭhānantaraṃ.
tika-s0403t0:651_8: Goti hi paññāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ “gacchati atthe bujjhatī”ti katvā.
tika-s0403t0:651_10: So kira disampatissa nāma rañño purohitassa govindabrāhmaṇassa putto hutvā attano pitussa ca rañño ca accayena tassa putto reṇu,
tika-s0403t0:651_13: dve dhataraṭṭhāti ime satta rājāno yathā aññamaññaṃ na vivadanti.
tika-s0403t0:651_14: Evaṃ rajje patiṭṭhāpetvā tesaṃ atthadhamme anusāsante jambudīpatale sabbesaṃ rājāva raññaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:651_16: devova gahapatikānaṃ sakkato garukato mānito pūjito apacito uttamagāravaṭṭhānaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0403t0:653_0: Reṇu dve ca dhataraṭṭhā, tadāsuṃ satta bhāradhā”ti. ;
tika-s0403t0:654_0: Rañño diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthānaṃ puro vidhānato pure saṃvidhānato purohito.
tika-s0403t0:654_2: Karuṇā assa atthīti karuṇanti sapubbabhāgakaruṇajjhānaṃ vuttanti āha “karuṇāya ca karuṇāpubbabhāge ca ṭhitā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:654_6: Sakadāgāmissa hi pañcindriyāni sakadāgāmibhāvaṃ paṭicca mudūni nāma honti.
tika-s0403t0:661_1: Chaṭṭhassa paṭhame nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsaneti ettha kiṃ taṃ āsanaṃ paṭhamameva paññattaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:661_4: yadidaṃ attano vasanaṭṭhāne buddhāsanaṃ paññapetvāva nisīdananti dassento āha “padhānikabhikkhū”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:661_5: Buddhakāle kira yattha yattha ekopi bhikkhu viharati,
tika-s0403t0:661_7: Bhagavā hi attano santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā phāsukaṭṭhāne viharante manasi karoti –
tika-s0403t0:661_9: asakkhi nu kho visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ, no”ti.
tika-s0403t0:661_10: Atha naṃ passati kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā akusalavitakkaṃ vitakkayamānaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:661_11: tato “kathañhi nāma mādisassa satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharantaṃ imaṃ kulaputtaṃ akusalavitakkā
tika-s0403t0:661_12: adhibhavitvā anamatagge vaṭṭadukkhe saṃsāressantī”ti tassa anuggahatthaṃ tattheva attānaṃ dassetvā taṃ
tika-s0403t0:661_13: kulaputtaṃ ovaditvā ākāsaṃ uppatitvā puna attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gacchati.
tika-s0403t0:661_14: Athevaṃ ovadiyamānā te bhikkhū cintayiṃsu “satthā amhākaṃ manaṃ jānitvā āgantvā amhākaṃ samīpe ṭhitaṃyeva attānaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0403t0:661_16: idha nisīdatha nisīdathā’ti āsanapariyesanaṃ nāma bhāro”ti.
tika-s0403t0:661_21: so mañcaṃ vā phalakaṃ vā pāsāṇaṃ vā vālikāpuñjaṃ vā paññapeti.
tika-s0403t0:661_22: Taṃ alabhamānā purāṇapaṇṇānipi saṃkaḍḍhitvā tattha paṃsukūlaṃ pattharitvā ṭhapenti.
tika-s0403t0:662_0: Satta sarāti – chajjo, usabho, gandhāro, majjhimo, pañcamo, dhevato,
tika-s0403t0:662_7: Manussaloke vīṇāvādanā ekekassa sarassa vasena tayo tayo mucchanāti katvā ekavīsati mucchanā.
tika-s0403t0:662_8: Devaloke vīṇāvādanā pana samapaññāsa mucchanāti vadanti.
tika-s0403t0:662_9: Tattha hi ekekassa sarassa vasena satta satta mucchanā,
tika-s0403t0:662_10: antarassa sarassa ca ekāti samapaññāsa mucchanā.
tika-s0403t0:662_11: Teneva sakkapañhasuttasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ “samapaññāsa mucchanā mucchetvā”ti pañcasikhassa vīṇāvādanaṃ dassentena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:662_12: Ṭhānā ekūnapaññāsāti ekekasseva sarassa satta satta ṭhānabhedā,
tika-s0403t0:662_14: Ekūnapaññāsaṭṭhānaviseso tisso duve catasso catasso tisso duve catassoti dvāvīsati sutibhedā ca icchitā.
tika-s0403t0:663_0: Atigāḷhaṃ āraddhanti thinamiddhachambhitattānaṃ vūpasamatthaṃ ativiya āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:663_5: Khayā rāgassa vītarāgattāti ettha yasmā bāhirako kāmesu vītarāgo na khayā rāgassa vītarāgo sabbaso avippahīnarāgattā.
tika-s0403t0:664_0: Lābhasakkārasilokaṃ nikāmayamānoti ettha labbhati pāpuṇīyatīti lābho,
tika-s0403t0:664_3: Paccayā eva hi paṇītapaṇītā sundarasundarā abhisaṅkharitvā katā “sakkāro”ti vuccati,
tika-s0403t0:665_0: Thūṇanti pasūnaṃ bandhanatthāya nikhātatthambhasaṅkhātaṃ thūṇaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0403t0:668_3: Vattaṃ kiretaṃ bāḷhagilānenapi vuḍḍhataraṃ disvā uṭṭhitākārena apaciti dassetabbā.
tika-s0403t0:668_4: Tena pana “mā cali mā calī”ti vattabbo,
tika-s0403t0:668_5: taṃ pana calanaṃ uṭṭhānākāradassanaṃ hotīti āha “uṭṭhānākāraṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:668_6: Santimāni āsanānīti paṭhamameva paññatthāsanaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0403t0:668_9: āsanaṃ paññattameva hotū”ti antamaso phalakamattampi paṇṇasanthāramattampi paññattameva.
tika-s0403t0:668_12: Sīsavedanāti kutoci nikkhamituṃ alabhamānehi vātehi samuṭṭhāpitā balavatiyo sīsavedanā honti.
tika-s0403t0:672_2: Rodenti kururakammantatāya sappaṭibaddhe satte assūni mocentīti ruddā,
tika-s0403t0:672_6: Iminā aññepi ye keci māgavikā nesādā vuttā,
tika-s0403t0:673_1: Te kira sacchandarāgena paribhuñjantīti adhippāyena catūsu paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādantīti “kaṇṭakavuttikā”ti vadati.
tika-s0403t0:673_3: Yasmā te paṇīte paccaye paṭisevantīti tassa micchāgāho.
tika-s0403t0:673_4: Ñāyaladdhepi paccaye bhuñjamānā ājīvakasamayassa vilomaggāhitāya paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādanti nāmāti vadatīti.
tika-s0403t0:673_5: Atha vā kaṇṭakavuttikā evaṃnāmakā eke pabbajitā,
tika-s0403t0:673_7: Tathā hi te kaṇṭake vattantā viya hontīti “kaṇṭakavuttikā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0403t0:673_8: Imameva ca atthavikappaṃ sandhāyāha “kaṇṭakavuttikāti samaṇā nāmete”ti.
tika-s0403t0:674_1: Te kira ṭhatvā bhuñjananahānappaṭikkhepādivatasamāyogena purimehi dvīhi paṇḍaratarā.
tika-s0403t0:675_1: Te kira ājīvakaladdhiyā suvisuddhacittatāya nigaṇṭhehipi paṇḍaratarā.
tika-s0403t0:675_2: Evañca katvā attano paccayadāyake nigaṇṭhehipi jeṭṭhakatare karoti.
tika-s0403t0:676_2: Nandādayo hi tathārūpaṃ ājīvakappaṭipattiṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pāpetvā ṭhitā,
tika-s0403t0:676_3: tasmā nigaṇṭhehi ājīvakasāvakehi ca paṇḍaratarāti “paramasukkābhijātī”ti vuttā.
tika-s0403t0:677_0: Bilaṃ olaggeyyunti maṃsabhāgaṃ nhārunā vā kenaci vā ganthitvā purisassa hatthe vā kese vā olambanavasena bandheyyuṃ.
tika-s0403t0:677_2: Satthavāho kira mahākantāraṃ paṭipanno antarāmagge goṇe mate maṃsaṃ gahetvā sabbesaṃ satthikānaṃ “idaṃ
tika-s0403t0:677_3: khāditvā ettakaṃ mūlaṃ dātabba”nti koṭṭhāsaṃ olambati.
tika-s0403t0:677_8: taṃ mūlaṃ satthikehi dhāraṇatthaṃ sabbesaṃ balakkārena koṭṭhāsaṃ datvā mūlaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0403t0:678_0: Kaṇhābhijātiyo samānoti kaṇhe nīcakule jāto hutvā.
tika-s0403t0:678_1: Kaṇhadhammanti paccatte upayogavacananti āha “kaṇhasabhāvo hutvā abhijāyatī”ti,
tika-s0403t0:678_4: Tasmā kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyatīti kāḷakaṃ dasadussīlyadhammaṃ uppādeti.
tika-s0403t0:678_5: Sukkaṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyatīti etthāpi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0403t0:678_6: So hi “ahaṃ pubbepi puññānaṃ akatattā nīcakule nibbatto,
tika-s0403t0:678_7: idāni puññaṃ karissāmī”ti puññasaṅkhātaṃ paṇḍaradhammaṃ karoti.
tika-s0403t0:679_0: Akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ nibbānanti sace kaṇhaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-s0403t0:679_5: Nibbānañca nāma imasmiṃ atthe arahattaṃ adhippetaṃ “abhijāyatī”ti vacanato.
tika-s0403t0:679_6: Tañhi kilesanibbānante jātattā nibbānaṃ nāma yathā “rāgādīnaṃ khayante jātattā rāgakkhayo,
tika-s0403t0:679_12: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “jāyatī”ti imassa pāpuṇātīhi atthaṃ gahetvāva “nibbānaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:679_13: Sukkābhijātiyo samānoti sukke uccakule jāto hutvā.
tika-s0403t0:682_4: aññassa tathābhāvappaṭisedhano vāti vuttaṃ “idhāti idhasmiṃ sāsane”ti.
tika-s0403t0:682_6: saddo ñāṇakoṭṭhāsapaññattigaṇanādīsu dissati “saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevatī”tiādīsu hi ñāṇe dissati.
tika-s0403t0:682_16: Nimittaggāhoti itthipurisanimittassa subhanimittādikassa vā kilesavatthubhūtassa nimittassa gāho.
tika-s0403t0:683_5: evaṃ tappaṭibaddhavuttitāya taṃ ṭhāno saṃvaro cakkhundriyasaṃvaro.
tika-s0403t0:683_7: Nanu ca cakkhundriye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā natthi.
tika-s0403t0:683_8: Na hi cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya sati vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā uppajjati.
tika-s0403t0:683_9: Apica yadā rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
tika-s0403t0:683_10: tadā bhavaṅge dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
tika-s0403t0:683_14: tato kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
tika-s0403t0:683_17: na āvajjanādīnaṃ aññatarasamaye ca saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā atthi.
tika-s0403t0:683_18: Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā akkhanti vā kosajjaṃ vā uppajjati,
tika-s0403t0:683_20: Tasmiṃ pana sīlādīsu uppannesu saṃvaro hoti,
tika-s0403t0:683_21: tasmā “cakkhundriye saṃvaro”ti kasmā vuttanti āha “javane uppajjamānopi hesa…pe…
tika-s0403t0:684_1: yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharadvārakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo susaṃvutā,
tika-s0403t0:684_2: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ arakkhitaṃ agopitameva hoti.
tika-s0403t0:684_3: Nagaradvārena hi pavisitvā corā yadicchakaṃ kareyyuṃ,
tika-s0403t0:684_4: evamevaṃ javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipi.
tika-s0403t0:684_5: Yathā pana nagaradvāresu saṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharādayo asaṃvutā,
tika-s0403t0:684_6: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ surakkhitaṃ sugopitameva hoti.
tika-s0403t0:684_7: Nagaradvāresu hi pihitesu corānaṃ paveso natthi,
tika-s0403t0:684_8: evamevaṃ javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi suguttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipi,
tika-s0403t0:685_1: Ayamevettha attho sundarataroti upari pāḷiyaṃ sandissanato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:686_0: Yanti ādesoti iminā liṅgavipallāsena saddhiṃ vacanavipallāso katoti dasseti,
tika-s0403t0:686_5: Yathā panettha āsavā aññe ca vighātakarā kilesapariḷāhā sambhavanti,
tika-s0403t0:686_13: yañca saṃvaraphalanti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0403t0:686_20: Cakkhundriyañhi saṃvaraṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ rūpārammaṇe saṃvarayatīti avuttasiddhoyamattho.
tika-s0403t0:686_23: Sabbatthevāti manodvāre pañcadvāre cāti sabbasmiṃ dvāre.
tika-s0403t0:687_0: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvarantiādīsu “sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā paccavekkhaṇameva yoniso paṭisaṅkhā.
tika-s0403t0:687_2: Bhavapatthanāya assādayatoti bhavapatthanāmukhena bhāvitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assādentassa.
tika-s0403t0:687_7: Sītassāti sītadhātukkhobhato vā utupariṇāmato vā uppannassa sītassa.
tika-s0403t0:687_15: Yasmiñhi aṅge vivaṭe hirī kuppati vinassati,
tika-s0403t0:688_1: So hi piṇḍolyena bhikkhuno patte patanato,
tika-s0403t0:688_2: tattha tattha laddhabhikkhāpiṇḍānaṃ pāto sannipātoti vā “piṇḍapāto”ti vuccati.
tika-s0403t0:688_18: Purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmīti purāṇaṃ abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanaṃ paṭihanissāmi.
tika-s0403t0:688_19: Navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti navaṃ bhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanaṃ na uppādessāmi.
tika-s0403t0:688_21: Ettha abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanā nāma yathāvuttajighacchānimittā vedanā.
tika-s0403t0:688_22: Sā hi abhuñjantassa bhiyyo bhiyyopavaḍḍhanavasena uppajjati,
tika-s0403t0:688_24: Sā hi bhuttapaccayā anuppannāva na uppajjissati.
tika-s0403t0:689_0: Yātrā ca me bhavissatīti yāpanā ca me catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ bhavissati.
tika-s0403t0:689_2: idha catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ avicchedasaṅkhātā yāpanāti ayametāsaṃ viseso.
tika-s0403t0:689_7: Yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakabhojanaparivajjanena vā seyyasukhapassasukhamiddhasukhādīnaṃ abhāvato anavajjatā.
tika-s0403t0:693_1: Yattha vihārādike seti nipajjati āsati nisīdati,
tika-s0403t0:693_7: Atha vā yathāvutto utu ca sīhabyagghādipākaṭaparissayo ca rāgadosādipaṭicchannaparissayo ca utuparissayo,
tika-s0403t0:693_9: Cīvarappaṭisevane hirīkopīnappaṭicchādanaṃ viya taṃ niyatapayojananti puna “yāvadevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:694_2: jīvitassa parivārasambhārabhāvehi parikkhāro cāti gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro, taṃ.
tika-s0403t0:694_3: Veyyābādhikānanti veyyābādhato dhātukkhobhato ca taṃnibbattakuṭṭhagaṇḍapīḷakādirogato uppannānaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:694_6: Yāva taṃ dukkhaṃ sabbaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti,
tika-s0403t0:694_9: Navavedanuppādatopīti na kevalaṃ āyatiṃ eva vipākapariḷāhā,
tika-s0403t0:694_10: atha kho atibhojanapaccayā alaṃsāṭakādīnaṃ viya navavedanuppādatopi veditabbā.
tika-s0403t0:695_0: Kammaṭṭhānikassa calanaṃ nāma kammaṭṭhānapariccāgoti āha “calati kampati kammaṭṭhānaṃ vijahatī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:695_1: “Khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassā”ti ettha ca lomasanāgattherassa vatthu kathetabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:695_2: Thero kira cetiyapabbate piyaṅguguhāya padhānaghare viharanto antaraṭṭhake himapātasamaye lokantarikanirayaṃ
tika-s0403t0:695_4: Gimhasamaye ca pacchābhattaṃ bahicaṅkame kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaroto sedāpissa kacchehi muccanti.
tika-s0403t0:695_10: Uṇhanti cettha aggisantāpova veditabbo sūriyasantāpassa parato vuccamānattā.
tika-s0403t0:696_0: Yo ca dve tayo vāre bhattaṃ vā pānīyaṃ vā alabhamānopi anamatagge saṃsāre attano pettivisayūpapattiṃ
tika-s0403t0:696_2: Ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasamphassehi phuṭṭho cepi tiracchānūpapattiṃ paccavekkhitvā avedhanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatiyeva.
tika-s0403t0:696_3: Sarīsapasamphassena phuṭṭho cāpi anamatagge saṃsāre sīhabyagghādimukhesu anekavāraṃ parivattitapubbabhāvaṃ
tika-s0403t0:696_4: paccavekkhitvā avedhanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatiyeva padhāniyatthero viya,
tika-s0403t0:696_7: Theraṃ kira khaṇḍacelavihāre kaṇikārapadhāniyaghare ariyavaṃsadhammaṃ suṇantaññeva ghoraviso sappo ḍaṃsi.
tika-s0403t0:696_8: Thero jānitvāpi pasannacitto nisinno dhammaṃyeva suṇāti,
tika-s0403t0:696_10: Thero upasampadamāḷaṃ ādiṃ katvā sīlaṃ paccavekkhitvā “visuddhasīlomhī”ti pītiṃ uppādesi,
tika-s0403t0:696_11: saha pītuppādā visaṃ nivattitvā pathaviṃ pāvisi.
tika-s0403t0:696_12: Thero tattheva cittekaggataṃ labhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-s0403t0:697_0: Yo pana akkosavasena durutte duruttattāyeva ca durāgate api antimavatthusaññite vacanapathe sutvā khantiguṇaṃyeva
tika-s0403t0:697_6: Taṃ aññataro mahāthero adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto “dīghabhāṇako ‘ariyavaṃsaṃ kathemī’ti sabbarattiṃ kolāhalaṃ karotī”tiādīhi akkosi.
tika-s0403t0:697_7: Ubhopi ca attano attano vihāraṃ gacchantā gāvutamattaṃ ekapathena agamaṃsu.
tika-s0403t0:697_9: Tato yattha dvinnaṃ vihārānaṃ maggo bhijjati,
tika-s0403t0:697_10: tattha ṭhatvā dīghabhāṇakatthero taṃ vanditvā “eso, bhante,
tika-s0403t0:697_13: Theropi vihāraṃ gantvā pāde pakkhāletvā nisīdi.
tika-s0403t0:697_15: sakalagāvutaṃ paribhāsantaṃ na kiñci avocutthā”ti āha.
tika-s0403t0:698_0: Vacanameva tadatthaṃ ñāpetukāmānañca patho upāyoti āha “vacanameva vacanapatho”ti.
tika-s0403t0:698_5: Cittalapabbate padhāniyattherassa kira rattiṃ padhānena vītināmetvā ṭhitassa udaravāto uppajjati.
tika-s0403t0:698_6: So taṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto āvattati parivattati.
tika-s0403t0:698_12: Thero vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanto muhuttena anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyi.
tika-s0403t0:698_13: Evaṃ sabbatthāti “uṇhena phuṭṭhassa sītaṃ patthayato”tiādinā sabbattha uṇhādinimittaṃ kāmāsavuppatti veditabbā.
tika-s0403t0:698_14: Natthi sugatibhave sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vāti aniṭṭhaṃ sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vā natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0403t0:698_15: Attaggāhe sati attaniyaggāhoti āha “mayhaṃ sītaṃ uṇhanti gāho diṭṭhāsavo”ti.
tika-s0403t0:699_1: kiṃ mama jīvitena vā maraṇena vā”ti evaṃ cintetvāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0403t0:699_14: Akāsi vāti tādisaṃ anācāraṃ akāsi vā.
tika-s0403t0:699_18: Tathā hi bhagavatā “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatī”ti sīlasaṃvaravibhajane ācāragocarasampattiṃ dassentena “atthi anācāro,
tika-s0403t0:699_20: “Caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjetī”ti vacanato hatthiādiparivajjanampi bhagavato vacanānuṭṭhānanti katvā ācārasīlamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:700_2: kusalappaṭipakkhatopītiādīhi kāraṇehi ayaṃ vitakko akusaloti attho.
tika-s0403t0:700_4: Ettha ca akusalotiādinā diṭṭhadhammikaṃ kāmavitakkassa ādīnavaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0403t0:700_6: Attabyābādhāya saṃvattatītiādīsupi imināva nayena ādīnavavibhāvanā veditabbā.
tika-s0403t0:700_7: Uppannassa kāmavitakkassa anadhivāsanaṃ nāma puna tādisassa anuppādanaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:700_8: Taṃ panassa pahānaṃ vinodanaṃ byantikaraṇaṃ anabhāvagamananti ca vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti pāḷiyaṃ –
tika-s0403t0:700_9: “uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”ti vatvā “pajahatī”tiādi vuttanti tamatthaṃ dassento “anadhivāsento kiṃ karotī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t0:700_11: na samucchedoti dassetuṃ “vinodetī”tiādi vuttanti vikkhambhanavaseneva attho dassito.
tika-s0403t0:700_12: Uppannuppanneti tesaṃ pāpavitakkānaṃ uppādāvatthāgahaṇaṃ vā kataṃ siyā anavasesaggahaṇaṃ vā.
tika-s0403t0:700_15: Anavasesaggahaṇaṃ byāpanicchāyaṃ hotīti dassetuṃ “satakkhattumpi uppannuppanne”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:701_0: Ñātivitakkoti “amhākaṃ ñātayo sukhajīvino sampattiyuttā”tiādinā gehassitapemavasena ñātake ārabbha uppannavitakko.
tika-s0403t0:701_1: Janapadavitakkoti “amhākaṃ janapado subhikkho sampannasasso ramaṇīyo”tiādinā gehassitapemavasena janapadaṃ ārabbha uppannavitakko.
tika-s0403t0:701_2: Ukkuṭikappadhānādīhi dukkhe nijjiṇṇe samparāye sattā sukhī honti amarāti dukkarakārikāya paṭisaṃyutto amaratthāya vitakko.
tika-s0403t0:701_3: Taṃ vā ārabbha amarāvikkhepadiṭṭhisahagato amaro ca so vitakko cāti amarāvitakko.
tika-s0403t0:701_4: Parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyuttoti paresu upaṭṭhākādīsu sahananditādivasena pavatto anuddayatāpatirūpako gehassitapemappaṭisaṃyutto vitakko.
tika-s0403t0:701_5: Lābhasakkārasilokappaṭisaṃyuttoti cīvarādilābhena ca sakkārena ca kittisaddena ca ārammaṇakaraṇavasena paṭisaṃyutto.
tika-s0403t0:701_6: Anavaññattippaṭisaṃyuttoti “aho vata maṃ pare na avajāneyyuṃ,
tika-s0403t0:702_0: Kāmavitakko kāmasaṅkappanasabhāvato kāmāsavappattiyā sātisayattā ca kāmanākāroti āha “kāmavitakko panettha kāmāsavo”ti.
tika-s0403t0:702_2: Kāmavitakkādike vinodeti attano santānato nīharati etenāti vinodanaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:703_0: “Satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiyo paripūrentī”ti vacanato vijjāvimuttīnaṃ anadhigamo
tika-s0403t0:703_2: Vuttavipariyāyena bhagavato orasaputtabhāvādivasena ca bhāvanāya ānisaṃso veditabbo.
tika-s0403t0:703_3: Thomentoti āsavapahānassa dukkarattā tāya eva dukkarakiriyāya taṃ abhitthavanto.
tika-s0403t0:706_2: Ettha puttasīsena dārapariggahaṃ puttadāresu uppilo viya.
tika-s0403t0:706_3: Tena tesaṃ rogādihetu sokābhibhavena ca cittassa saṃkiliṭṭhataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0403t0:709_3: So kira sāvatthiyaṃ hatthiācariyassa putto bhagavato santike pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā sukhumesu
tika-s0403t0:709_6: “therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhidhammakathaṃ kathentānaṃ antarantarā kathaṃ opātetī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:709_7: Tattha antarantarā kathaṃ opātetīti therehi vuccamānassa kathāpabandhassa antare antare attano kathaṃ pavesetīti attho.
tika-s0403t0:709_13: Kiṭṭhakhādakoti kiṭṭhaṭṭhāne uppannasassañhi kiṭṭhanti vuttaṃ kāraṇūpacārena.
tika-s0403t0:710_0: Gihibhāve vaṇṇaṃ kathesīti kassapasammāsambuddhassa kira sāsane dve sahāyakā ahesuṃ,
tika-s0403t0:710_2: Tesu eko anabhirato gihibhāve cittaṃ uppādetvā itarassa ārocesi.
tika-s0403t0:710_5: So taṃ sutvā abhiramitvā puna ekadivasaṃ tādise citte uppanne taṃ etadavoca – “mayhaṃ, āvuso,
tika-s0403t0:710_8: So pattacīvaralobhena tassa gihibhāve ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā pabbajjāya ādīnavaṃ kathesi.
tika-s0403t0:710_9: Tassa taṃ sutvāva gihibhāvato cittaṃ nivattetvā pabbajjāyameva abhirami.
tika-s0403t0:710_10: Evamesa tadā sīlavantassa bhikkhuno gihibhāve ānisaṃsakathāya kathitattā idāni cha vāre vibbhamitvā sattamavāre
tika-s0403t0:710_11: pabbajitvā mahāmoggallānassa mahākoṭṭhikattherassa ca abhidhammakathaṃ kathentānaṃ antarantarā kathaṃ opātesi.
tika-s0403t0:710_13: So mahāsāvakassa kathite patiṭṭhātuṃ asakkonto vibbhamitvā gihi jāto.
tika-s0403t0:710_15: tasmā vibbhamitvā dvīhatīhaccayena poṭṭhapādassa santikaṃ gato.
tika-s0403t0:710_19: ehi pabbajituṃ dāni te vaṭṭatī”ti taṃ gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
tika-s0403t0:710_21: Tena vuttaṃ “sattame vāre pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:713_5: Phassavasena nibbattattāti dvayadvayasamāpattiyaṃ aññamaññaṃ samphassavasena nibbattattā,
tika-s0403t0:713_9: bhavapaccayā jātī”ti iminā cānukkamena phassasamuṭṭhānattā imassa kāyassa phassavasena nibbattattāti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:713_15: “Kāyabandhanassa anto jīrati sā haritantaṃ vā panthantaṃ vā selantaṃ vā udakantaṃ vā”tiādīsu mariyādāyaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:713_20: Sabbapaccayasaṅkhayo hi dukkhassa abhāvo koṭītipi vuccati.
tika-s0403t0:713_22: “Iṅgha tāva suttantaṃ vā gāthāyo vā abhidhammaṃ vā pariyāpuṇassu,
tika-s0403t0:713_23: suttante okāsaṃ kārāpetvā”ti ca ādīsu padapūraṇe.
tika-s0403t0:717_1: Aṭṭhame nibbattivasena apāyasaṃvattaniyena vā kammunā apāyesu niyuttoti āpāyiko nerayikoti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0403t0:717_2: Avīcimhi uppajjitvā tattha āyukappasaññitaṃ antarakappaṃ tiṭṭhatīti kappaṭṭho.
tika-s0403t0:717_5: Bhinnakālato paṭṭhāya bījaṃ bījatthāya na upakappati.
tika-s0403t0:717_8: Avātātapahatānīti vātena ca ātapena ca na hatāni nirojataṃ na pāpitāni.
tika-s0403t0:717_9: Nirojañhi kasaṭaṃ bījaṃ bījatthāya na upakappati.
tika-s0403t0:717_11: kārassa rassattaṃ katvā pāḷiyaṃ “sāradānī”ti vuttanti āha “sārādānī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:717_15: Sukhasayitānīti cattāro māse koṭṭhe pakkhittaniyāmeneva sukhasayitāni suṭṭhu sannicitāni.
tika-s0403t0:717_23: Tasmā abhido aḍḍharattanti abhinne aḍḍharattasamayeti attho.
tika-s0403t0:717_24: Puṇṇamāsiyañhi gaganamajjhassa purato vā pacchato vā cande ṭhite aḍḍharattasamayo bhinno nāma hoti,
tika-s0403t0:717_25: majjhe eva pana ṭhite abhinno nāma.
tika-s0403t0:718_0: Suppabuddhasunakkhattādayoti ettha suppabuddho kira sākiyo “mama dhītaraṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhanto,
tika-s0403t0:718_1: mama puttaṃ pabbājetvā tassa veriṭṭhāne ṭhito cā”ti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi satthari āghātaṃ bandhitvā ekadivasaṃ
tika-s0403t0:718_2: “na dāni nimantitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhuñjituṃ dassāmī”ti gamanamaggaṃ pidahitvā antaravīthiyaṃ suraṃ pivanto nisīdi.
tika-s0403t0:718_3: Athassa satthari bhikkhusaṅghaparivute taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgate “satthā āgato”ti ārocesuṃ. So āha –
tika-s0403t0:718_8: Satthā mātulassa santikā maggaṃ alabhitvā tatova nivatti.
tika-s0403t0:718_15: Bhāriyaṃ tena kammaṃ kataṃ mādisassa buddhassa maggaṃ adentena,
tika-s0403t0:718_16: ito sattame divase heṭṭhāpāsāde pāsādamūle pathaviyā pavisissatī”ti ācikkhi.
tika-s0403t0:719_0: Sunakkhattopi pubbe bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dibbacakkhuparikammaṃ pucchi.
tika-s0403t0:719_2: So dibbacakkhuṃ nibbattetvā ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā olokento devaloke nandanavanacittalatāvanaphārusakavanamissakavanesu
tika-s0403t0:719_3: dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamāne devaputte ca devadhītaro ca disvā –
tika-s0403t0:719_4: “etesaṃ evarūpāya attabhāvasampattiyā ṭhitānaṃ kira madhuro nu kho saddo bhavissatī”ti saddaṃ sotukāmo
tika-s0403t0:719_7: “dibbasotadhātussa upanissayo natthī”ti ñatvā parikammaṃ na kathesi.
tika-s0403t0:719_8: Na hi buddhā yaṃ na bhavissati,
tika-s0403t0:719_12: so mayhaṃ ‘sampajjatu vā mā vā sampajjatū’ti kathesi.
tika-s0403t0:719_13: Ahaṃ pana paccattapurisakārena taṃ nibbattetvā dibbasotadhātuparikammaṃ pucchiṃ,
tika-s0403t0:719_15: Addhā evaṃ hoti ‘ayaṃ rājapabbajito dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ nibbattetvā,
tika-s0403t0:719_19: mayā samasamo bhavissatī’ti issāmacchariyavasena mayhaṃ na kathetī”ti bhiyyoso āghātaṃ bandhitvā kāsāyāni
tika-s0403t0:719_20: chaḍḍetvā gihibhāvaṃ patvāpi na tuṇhībhūto vihāsi.
tika-s0403t0:719_21: Dasabalaṃ pana asatā tucchena abbhācikkhitvā apāyūpago ahosi.
tika-s0403t0:719_25: sunakkhatto licchaviputto mayā vuccamāno apakkameva imasmā dhammavinayā,
tika-s0403t0:719_27: Tena vuttaṃ “aparepi suppabuddhasunakkhattādayo bhagavatā ñātāvā”ti. Ādi-
tika-s0403t0:720_0: Susīmo paribbājakoti evaṃnāmako vedaṅgesu kusalo paṇḍito paribbājako.
tika-s0403t0:720_1: Aññatitthiyā hi parihīnalābhasakkārasilokā “samaṇo gotamo na jātigottādīni ārabbha lābhaggappatto jāto,
tika-s0403t0:720_2: kaviseṭṭho panesa uttamakavitāya sāvakānaṃ bandhaṃ bandhitvā deti.
tika-s0403t0:720_3: Te taṃ uggaṇhitvā upaṭṭhākānaṃ upanisinnakathampi anumodanampi sarabhaññampīti evamādīni kathenti.
tika-s0403t0:720_5: Sace mayaṃ yaṃ samaṇo gotamā jānāti,
tika-s0403t0:720_7: attano samayaṃ tattha pakkhipitvā mayampi upaṭṭhākānaṃ katheyyāma.
tika-s0403t0:720_9: Ko nu kho samaṇassa gotamassa santike pabbajitvā khippameva uggaṇhituṃ sakkhissatī”ti evaṃ cintetvā “susimo
tika-s0403t0:720_14: taṃ mayaṃ dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā gihīnaṃ bhāsissāma,
tika-s0403t0:720_15: evaṃ mayampi sakkatā bhavissāma garukatā mānitā pūjitā lābhino cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārāna”nti.
tika-s0403t0:721_0: Atha susīmo paribbājako tesaṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā yenānando tenupasaṅkami,
tika-s0403t0:721_2: Thero ca taṃ ādāya bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
tika-s0403t0:721_3: Bhagavā pana cintesi “ayaṃ paribbājako titthiyasamaye ‘ahaṃ pāṭiekko satthā’ti paṭijānamāno carati,
tika-s0403t0:721_6: udāhu mayhaṃ vā mama sāvakānaṃ dhammakathāya pasanno”ti.
tika-s0403t0:721_7: Athassa ekaṭṭhānepi pasādābhāvaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ mama sāsane ‘dhammaṃ thenessāmī’ti pabbajati,
tika-s0403t0:721_9: nipphatti nu kho kīdisā”ti olokento “kiñcāpi ‘dhammaṃ thenessāmī’ti pabbajati,
tika-s0403t0:721_10: katipāheneva pana ghaṭetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhissatī”ti ñatvā “tenahānanda,
tika-s0403t0:721_12: Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “evaṃ bhagavatā ko ñāto?
tika-s0403t0:722_0: Santatimahāmattoti so kira ekasmiṃ kāle rañño pasenadissa paccantaṃ kupitaṃ vūpasametvā āgato.
tika-s0403t0:722_1: Athassa rājā tuṭṭho satta divasāni rajjaṃ datvā ekaṃ naccagītakusalaṃ itthiṃ adāsi.
tika-s0403t0:722_2: So satta divasāni surāmadamatto hutvā sattame divase sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍito hatthikkhandhavaragato
tika-s0403t0:722_3: nahānatitthaṃ gacchanto satthāraṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ dvārantare disvā hatthikkhandhavaragatova sīsaṃ
tika-s0403t0:722_5: Satthā sitaṃ katvā “ko nu kho, bhante,
tika-s0403t0:722_6: sitapātukaraṇe hetū”ti ānandattherena puṭṭho sitakāraṇaṃ ācikkhanto āha – “passasi, ānanda,
tika-s0403t0:722_8: ajjeva sabbābharaṇappaṭimaṇḍito mama santikaṃ āgantvā cātuppadikagāthāvasāne arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyissatī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:725_1: Navame parihāyati attano phalaṃ pariggahetvā vattati,
tika-s0403t0:725_2: tassa vā kāraṇabhāvaṃ upagacchatīti pariyāyoti idha kāraṇaṃ vuttanti āha “nibbijjhanakāraṇa”nti.
tika-s0403t0:726_2: ahatānaṃ vatthānaṃ diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭi”nti ettha hi paṭalaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho.
tika-s0403t0:726_4: vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī”ti ettha rāsaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho.
tika-s0403t0:726_7: kayirā mālāguṇe bahū”ti ettha bandhanaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho.
tika-s0403t0:726_9: Kāmarāgassa saṃyojanassa paccayabhāvena vatthukāmesupi bandhanaṭṭho rāsaṭṭho vā guṇaṭṭho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0403t0:726_18: Kāmūpasañhitāti kāmarāgena upecca sambandhanīyā sambandhā kātabbā.
tika-s0403t0:726_21: Evamettha vatthukāmaṃ paṭikkhipitvā kilesakāmo vutto tasseva vasena tesampi kāmabhāvasiddhito,
tika-s0403t0:726_22: kilesakāmassapi iṭṭhavedanā diṭṭhādisampayogabhedena pavattiākārabhedena ca atthi vicittakāti tato visesetuṃ “citravicitrārammaṇānī”ti āha,
tika-s0403t0:727_0: Athettha dhīrā vinayanti chandanti atha etesu ārammaṇesu dhitisampannā paṇḍitā chandarāgaṃ vinayanti.
tika-s0403t0:728_1: atthato pana tassa kāmassa anurūpanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:732_1: Dasame tathāgatabalānīti aññehi asādhāraṇāni tathāgatasseva balāni.
tika-s0403t0:732_5: na tādisāni tadaññesaṃ kadāci uppajjantīti aññehi asādhāraṇāni.
tika-s0403t0:732_6: Imameva hi yathāvuttaṃ lesaṃ apekkhitvā sādhāraṇabhāvato āsayānusayañāṇādīsu eva asādhāraṇasamaññā niruḷhā.
tika-s0403t0:732_7: Yathā pubbabuddhānaṃ balāni puññassa sampattiyā āgatāni,
tika-s0403t0:732_12: Paṭivedhañāṇañceva desanāñāṇañcāti ettha paññāya pabhāvitaṃ attano ariyaphalāvahaṃ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:733_0: Ṭhānañca ṭhānato pajānātīti kāraṇañca kāraṇato pajānāti.
tika-s0403t0:733_1: Yasmā tattha phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttitāya uppajjati ceva pavattati ca,
tika-s0403t0:733_3: Bhagavā “ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ hetū paccayā uppādāya,
tika-s0403t0:733_5: ye ye dhammā yeyaṃ yeyaṃ dhammānaṃ na hetū na paccayā uppādāya,
tika-s0403t0:733_6: taṃ taṃ aṭṭhāna”nti pajānanto ṭhānato aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
tika-s0403t0:734_1: tāni pana samādiyitvā katāni hontīti āha “samādiyitvā katāna”nti.
tika-s0403t0:734_2: Kammameva vā kammasamādānanti etena “samādāna”nti saddassa apubbatthābhāvaṃ dasseti muttagatasadde gatasaddassa viya.
tika-s0403t0:735_0: Catunnaṃ jhānānanti paccanīkajjhāpanaṭṭhena ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṭṭhena ca catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:735_2: Aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānanti “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:735_5: Ettha ca paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhannaṃ samādhītipi nāmaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:735_8: Hānabhāgiyaṃ dhammanti appaguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ kāmādipakkhandanaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:735_9: Visesabhāgiyaṃ dhammanti paguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ dutiyajjhānādipakkhandanaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:735_11: Tehi pana jhānānaṃ taṃsabhāvatā dhammasaddena vuttā.
tika-s0403t0:735_14: Tañhi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhahitvā dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamassa paccayattā “vuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:735_15: Ye pana “nirodhato phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānanti pāḷi natthī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0403t0:735_16: Te “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti imāya pāḷiyaṃ paṭisedhetabbā.
tika-s0403t0:746_1: Chaṭṭhe paṭippassambhanaṃ paṭippassaddhīti atthato ekanti āha “na paṭippassaddhiladdhenāti kilesappaṭippassaddhiyā aladdhenā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:746_2: Sukkapakkhe santenātiādīsu aṅgasantatāya ārammaṇasantatāya sabbakilesasantatāya ca santena,
tika-s0403t0:749_1: Sattame tasmiṃ tasmiṃ viseseti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sacchikātabbe visese.
tika-s0403t0:749_8: avasāne pana chaṭṭhābhiññāya arahattaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:749_10: Yañhi taṃ tatra tatra sakkhibhabbatāsaṅkhātaṃ iddhividhapaccanubhavanādi,
tika-s0403t0:749_14: Arahattampi “kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharissāmī”ti anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā chaṭṭhābhiññaṃ nibbattentassa kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:749_17: Atha vā sati āyataneti tassa tassa visesādhigamassa upanissayasaṅkhāte kāraṇe satīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0403t0:750_7: nibbedhabhāgiyo samādhī”ti iminā nayena sabbasamāpattiyo vitthāretvā hānabhāgiyādiattho veditabbo.
tika-s0403t0:750_8: Tattha paṭhamajjhānassa lābhinti yvāyaṃ appaguṇassa paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī, taṃ.
tika-s0403t0:750_9: Kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācarantīti tato vuṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti tudanti,
tika-s0403t0:750_10: tassa kāmānatītassa kāmānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena so paṭhamajjhānasamādhi hāyati parihāyati,
tika-s0403t0:750_13: Sati santiṭṭhatīti idaṃ micchāsatiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:750_14: Yassa hi paṭhamajjhānānurūpasabhāvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ santato paṇītato disvā assādayamānā abhinandamānā nikanti hoti,
tika-s0403t0:750_15: tassa nikantivasena so paṭhamajjhānasamādhi neva hāyati na vaḍḍhati,
tika-s0403t0:750_18: Avitakkasahagatāti avitakkaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ santato paṇītato manasikaroto ārammaṇavasena avitakkasahagatā.
tika-s0403t0:750_19: Saññāmanasikārā samudācarantīti paguṇapaṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ dutiyajjhānādhigamatthāya codenti tudanti.
tika-s0403t0:750_20: Tassa upari dutiyajjhānānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena so paṭhamajjhānasamādhi visesabhūtassa
tika-s0403t0:751_0: Nibbidāsahagatāti tameva paṭhamajjhānalābhiṃ jhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ nibbidāsaṅkhātena vipassanāñāṇena sahagatā.
tika-s0403t0:751_1: Vipassanāñāṇañhi jhānaṅgesu pabhedena upaṭṭhahantesu nibbindati ukkaṇṭhati,
tika-s0403t0:751_5: Vipassanāñāṇañhi sakkā iminā maggena virāgaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikātunti pavattito “virāgūpasaṃhita”nti vuccati.
tika-s0403t0:751_7: Tassa tesaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena paṭhamajjhānasamādhi ariyamaggappaṭivedhassa padaṭṭhānatāya “nibbedhabhāgiyo”ti vutto.
tika-s0403t0:759_1: Catutthe yathāvuttadhammādīsu tassa kilesanimittaṃ dukkhaṃ anavassananti “sukhasomanassabahulo viharatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:759_3: Yavati tena phalaṃ missitaṃ viya hotīti yoni,
tika-s0403t0:762_1: Pañcame āgacchanti etena kusalā vā akusalā vāti āgamanaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:762_4: Evaṃ dhamme manasikaroto kusalā vā akusalā vā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantīti evaṃ jānanto.
tika-s0403t0:762_5: Apagacchanti kusalā vā akusalā vā etenāti apagamanaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:762_8: Evaṃ dhamme manasikaroto kusalā vā akusalā vā dhammā nābhivaḍḍhantīti evaṃ jānanto.
tika-s0403t0:762_10: Idañca accāyikakicce vā bhaye vā uppanne tassa tikicchanatthaṃ ṭhānuppattiyā kāraṇajānanavasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:765_0: 80-81. Chaṭṭhe sampatteti kilese sampatte. Sattamaṃ uttānameva.
tika-s0403t0:773_3: Niggaṇhātīti accāraddhavīriyatādīhi uddhataṃ cittaṃ uddhaccapakkhato rakkhaṇavasena niggaṇhāti.
tika-s0403t0:773_4: Paggaṇhātīti atisithilavīriyatādīhi līnaṃ cittaṃ kosajjapātato rakkhaṇavasena paggaṇhāti.
tika-s0403t0:773_5: Sampahaṃsetīti samappavattacittaṃ tathāpavattiyaṃ paññāya toseti uttejeti vā.
tika-s0403t0:773_6: Yadā vā paññāpayogamandatāya upasamasukhānadhigamena vā nirassādaṃ cittaṃ bhāvanāya na pakkhandati,
tika-s0403t0:773_7: tadā jātiādīni saṃvegavatthūni paccavekkhitvā sampahaṃseti samuttejeti.
tika-s0403t0:773_8: Ajjhupekkhatīti yadā pana cittaṃ alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ anirassādaṃ ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ sammadeva bhāvanāvītiṃ otiṇṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0403t0:773_9: tadā paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu kiñci byāpāraṃ akatvā samappavattesu assesu sārathī viya ajjhupekkhati,
tika-s0403t0:773_11: Paṇītādhimuttikoti paṇīte uttame maggaphale adhimutto ninnapoṇapabbhāro.
tika-s0403t0:776_4: Bhavaṅgapaññāya pana paripuṇṇāyapi yassa bhavaṅgaṃ lokuttarassa paccayo na hoti,
tika-s0403t0:776_6: Abhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu dhammesu sammattaniyāmasaṅkhātaṃ ariyamaggaṃ okkamituṃ adhigantuṃ abhabbo.
tika-s0403t0:781_5: Sā pana mettāvatā mettāvasena pāricariyāti āha “mettāyuttāya pāricariyāyā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:781_7: Pariciṇṇasatthukena sāvakena nāma satthuno yāva dhammena kātabbā pāricariyā,
tika-s0403t0:793_2: ubhato ubhohi bhāgehi vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto ekadesasarūpekasesanayena.
tika-s0403t0:793_3: Dvīhi bhāgehīti karaṇe nissakke cetaṃ bahuvacanaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:793_6: maggena samucchedavimokkhena vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti evaṃ pavatto tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravādo,
tika-s0403t0:793_7: “nāmakāyato rūpakāyato ca vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti evaṃ pavatto tipiṭakamahārakkhitattheravādo,
tika-s0403t0:793_9: maggena samucchedavimokkhena ekavāraṃ vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti evaṃ pavatto tipiṭakacūḷābhayattheravādo
tika-s0403t0:793_10: cāti imesaṃ tiṇṇampi theravādānaṃ ekajjhaṃ saṅgaho katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:793_11: Ettha ca paṭhamavāde dvīhi bhāgehi vimutto ubhatobhāgavimutto vutto,
tika-s0403t0:793_13: tatiyavāde dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti ayametesaṃ visesoti.
tika-s0403t0:794_1: Kāmañcettha rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānampi arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ viya duvaṅgikaṃ āneñjappattanti vuccati.
tika-s0403t0:794_2: Taṃ pana padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma na hoti rūpakāyato avimuttattā.
tika-s0403t0:794_5: tasmā tato vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto na hotīti āha “catunnaṃ arūpa…pe…
tika-s0403t0:794_9: Na hi arahattaṃ patto anāgāmī nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t0:794_10: “Rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādike nirodhasamāpattiante aṭṭha vimokkhe vatvā –
tika-s0403t0:795_1: bhikkhu ime aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
tika-s0403t0:795_2: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
tika-s0403t0:796_2: idha pana sabbaubhatobhāgavimutte saṅgahaṇatthaṃ “pañcavidho hotī”ti vatvā “pāḷi panettha…pe…
tika-s0403t0:797_4: ekacco puggalo ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā,
tika-s0403t0:797_6: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
tika-s0403t0:798_2: Yathāvuttesu hi pañcasu purimā cattāro samāpattisīsaṃ nirodhaṃ na samāpajjantīti pariyāyena ubhatobhāgavimuttā nāma.
tika-s0403t0:798_3: Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī anāgāmī taṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattoti nippariyāyena ubhatobhāgavimuttaseṭṭho nāma.
tika-s0403t0:799_5: Aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharatīti aṭṭha samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā nāmakāyato paṭilabhitvā viharati.
tika-s0403t0:799_6: Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti vipassanāpaññāya saṅkhāragataṃ,
tika-s0403t0:799_7: maggapaññāya cattāri saccāni passitvā cattāropi āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
tika-s0403t0:799_10: dassanakāraṇā pana parikkhīṇā disvā parikkhīṇāti vuttā dassanāyattaparikkhayattā.
tika-s0403t0:799_11: Evañhi dassanaṃ āsavānaṃ khayassa purimakiriyābhāvena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:800_1: na tassa adhiṭṭhānabhūtena aṭṭhavimokkhasaṅkhātena sātisayena samādhināti paññāvimutto.
tika-s0403t0:800_2: Yo ariyo anadhigataaṭṭhavimokkho sabbaso āsavehi vimutto,
tika-s0403t0:800_4: Adhigatepi hi rūpajjhānavimokkhe na so sātisayasamādhinissitoti na tassa vasena ubhatobhāgavimuttatā hotīti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-s0403t0:800_5: Arūpajjhānesu pana ekasmimpi sati ubhatobhāgavimuttoyeva nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t0:800_6: Tena hi aṭṭhavimokkhekadesena taṃnāmadānasamatthena aṭṭhavimokkhalābhītveva vuccati.
tika-s0403t0:800_7: Samudāye hi pavatto vohāro avayavepi dissati yathā taṃ “sattisayo”ti anavasesato āsavānaṃ parikkhīṇattā.
tika-s0403t0:800_9: Evañhi arūpajjhānekadesābhāvepi aṭṭhavimokkhapaṭikkhepo na hotīti siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:800_10: Arūpāvacarajjhānesu hi ekasmimpi sati ubhatobhāgavimuttoyeva nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t0:801_3: Taṃ phuṭṭhānantarakālameva sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikato sacchikaraṇūpāyenāti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-s0403t0:801_5: Yo hi arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato nāmakāyekadesato ca vikkhambhanavimokkhena vimutto,
tika-s0403t0:801_6: tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito viya hoti,
tika-s0403t0:801_8: Nirodhaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu tena so sacchikato hoti,
tika-s0403t0:801_9: tasmā so sacchikātabbaṃ nirodhaṃ yathāālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchi karotīti “kāyasakkhī”ti vuccati,
tika-s0403t0:801_13: Ayaṃ catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnaṃ ekekato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā kāyasakkhibhāvaṃ pattānaṃ catunnaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:801_14: nirodhā vuṭṭhāya aggamaggappattaanāgāmino ca vasena ubhatobhāgavimutto viya pañcavidho nāma hotīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0403t0:802_0: Diṭṭhantaṃ pattoti dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ pattoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:802_2: Etena catusaccadassanasaṅkhātāya diṭṭhiyā nirodhassa pattataṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0403t0:802_8: evaṃ ayampi sukkhavipassako catūhi arūpajjhānehi vuṭṭhāya diṭṭhippattabhāvappattā cattāro cāti pañcavidho hotīti veditabbo.
tika-s0403t0:802_12: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhasaccanti yāthāvato pajānāti.
tika-s0403t0:802_13: Yasmā pana taṇhā dukkhaṃ janeti nibbatteti,
tika-s0403t0:802_16: Yasmā pana idaṃ dukkhañca samudayo ca nibbānaṃ patvā nirujjhati,
tika-s0403t0:802_19: Ariyo pana aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo taṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0403t0:802_20: tena taṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
tika-s0403t0:802_23: Tathāgatappaveditāti tathāgatena bodhimaṇḍe paṭividdhā viditā pākaṭā katā.
tika-s0403t0:803_1: Etena sabbathā avimuttassapi saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0403t0:803_3: Kiṃ pana nesaṃ kilesappahāne nānattaṃ atthīti? Natthi.
tika-s0403t0:803_4: Atha kasmā saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti?
tika-s0403t0:803_6: Diṭṭhippatto hi āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appadukkhena akasirena akilamantova sakkoti vikkhambhituṃ,
tika-s0403t0:803_7: saddhāvimutto pana dukkhena kasirena kilamanto sakkoti vikkhambhituṃ,
tika-s0403t0:803_10: Saddahantassāti “ekaṃsato ayaṃ paṭipadā kilesakkhayaṃ āvahati sammāsambuddhena bhāsitattā”ti evaṃ saddahantassa.
tika-s0403t0:803_11: Yasmā panassa aniccānupassanādīhi niccasaññāpahānavasena bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ passato tattha tattha paccakkhatāpi atthi,
tika-s0403t0:803_14: Ettha ca pubbabhāgamaggabhāvanāti vacanena āgamanīyanānattena diṭṭhippattasaddhāvimuttānaṃ paññānānattaṃ hotīti dassitaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:803_16: paññāya nānattaṃ atthiyevā”ti vatvā “āgamanīyanānatteneva saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:804_0: Ārammaṇaṃ yāthāvato dhāreti avadhāretīti dhammo, paññā.
tika-s0403t0:804_1: Taṃ paññāsaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ adhimattatāya pubbaṅgamaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ anussaratīti dhammānusārī.
tika-s0403t0:804_5: saddhāpubbaṅgamaṃ maggaṃ bhāvetī”ti imamatthaṃ eseva nayoti atidisati.
tika-s0403t0:804_9: Paññā vā puggalaṃ vāheti nibbānābhimukhaṃ gametīti paññāvāhī.
tika-s0403t0:804_10: Saddhāvāhīti etthāpi iminā nayeneva attho veditabbo.
tika-s0403t0:804_13: Tato eva visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva cettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0403t0:807_3: Evaṃ puggaloti iminā kāraṇena ekavāraṃ nimuggo nimuggoyeva so hoti.
tika-s0403t0:807_4: Etassa hi puna bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthīti vadanti makkhaligosālādayo viya.
tika-s0403t0:807_6: Sādhu saddhā kusalesūti kusaladhammesu saddhā nāma sāhu laddhakāti ummujjati,
tika-s0403t0:807_11: Evaṃ puggaloti “evaṃ sādhu saddhā”ti imesaṃ saddhādīnaṃ vasena ekavāraṃ ummujjitvā tesaṃ parihāniyā puna nimujjatiyeva devadattādayo viya.
tika-s0403t0:807_12: Devadatto hi aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattetvāpi puna buddhānaṃ paṭipakkhatāya tehi guṇehi
tika-s0403t0:807_13: parihīno ruhiruppādakammaṃ saṅghabhedakammañca katvā kāyassa bhedā dutiyacittavārena cuticittamanantarā
tika-s0403t0:807_15: Kokāliko dve aggasāvake upavaditvā padumaniraye nibbatto.
tika-s0403t0:808_0: Neva hāyati no vaḍḍhatīti appahonakakālepi na hāyati,
tika-s0403t0:808_3: Ekacco hi agāriko appahonakakāle pakkhikabhattaṃ vassikaṃ vā upanibandhāpesi,
tika-s0403t0:808_5: Anagārikopi ādimhi appahonakakāle uddesaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ vā gaṇhāti,
tika-s0403t0:808_6: medhāvī balavīriyasampattiyā pahonakakāle tato uttariṃ na karoti.
tika-s0403t0:808_7: Evaṃ puggaloti evaṃ imāya saddhādīnaṃ ṭhitiyā puggalo ummujjitvā ṭhito nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t0:808_8: Ummujjitvā pataratīti sakadāgāmipuggalo kilesatanutāya uṭṭhahitvā gantabbadisābhimukho tarati nāma.
tika-s0403t0:809_1: Ime pana satta puggalā udakopamena dīpitā.
tika-s0403t0:809_2: Satta kira jaṅghavāṇijā addhānamaggappaṭipannā antarāmagge ekaṃ puṇṇanadiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
tika-s0403t0:809_3: Tesu paṭhamaṃ otiṇṇo udakabhīruko puriso otiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva nimujjitvā puna saṇṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi,
tika-s0403t0:809_5: Dutiyo otiṇṇaṭṭhāne nimujjitvā sakiṃ uṭṭhahitvā puna nimuggo uṭṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi,
tika-s0403t0:809_7: Tatiyo nimujjitvā uṭṭhito majjhe nadiyā ṭhatvā neva orato āgantuṃ,
tika-s0403t0:809_11: Chaṭṭho taṃ disvā pārimatīraṃ gantvā kaṭippamāṇe udake ṭhito.
tika-s0403t0:809_12: Sattamo pārimatīraṃ gantvā gandhacuṇṇādīhi nhatvā varavatthādīni nivāsetvā surabhivilepanaṃ vilimpitvā
tika-s0403t0:809_13: nīluppalamālādīni pilandhitvā nānālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍito mahānagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādamāruhitvā uttamabhojanaṃ bhuñjati.
tika-s0403t0:810_0: Tattha jaṅghavāṇijā viya ime satta puggalā,
