tika-s0403t0:810_2: paṭhamassa udakabhīrukassa purisassa otiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva nimujjanaṃ viya micchādiṭṭhikassa vaṭṭe nimujjanaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:810_3: ummujjitvā nimujjanapuriso viya saddhādīnaṃ uppattimatthakena ummujjitvā tāsaṃ hāniyā nimuggapuggalo,
tika-s0403t0:810_4: majjhe nadiyā ṭhatvā viya saddhādīnaṃ ṭhitiyā ṭhitipuggalo,
tika-s0403t0:810_7: taritvā kaṭimatte udake ṭhitapuriso viya anāvaṭṭadhammattā anāgāmī,
tika-s0403t0:810_8: nhatvā pārimatīraṃ uttaritvā thale ṭhitapuriso viya cattāro oghe atikkamitvā nibbānathale ṭhito khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo,
tika-s0403t0:810_9: thale ṭhitapurisassa nagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādaṃ āruyha uttamabhojanabhuñjanaṃ viya khīṇāsavassa nibbānārammaṇasamāpattiṃ
tika-s0403t0:813_1: Chaṭṭhe “idha samasīsī kathito”ti vatvā evaṃ samasīsitaṃ vibhajitvā idhādhippetaṃ dassetuṃ “so catubbidho hotī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t0:813_5: Yo cakkhurogādīsu aññatarasmiṃ sati “ito anuṭṭhito arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
tika-s0403t0:813_6: athassa arahattañca rogato vuṭṭhānañca ekakālameva hoti,
tika-s0403t0:813_9: Yo ṭhānādīsu iriyāpathesu aññataraṃ adhiṭṭhāya “avikopetvāva arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
tika-s0403t0:813_10: Athassa arahattappatti ca iriyāpathavikopanañca ekappahāreneva hoti,
tika-s0403t0:813_23: saṅkhārasīsaṃ nirodho”ti paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttesu sattarasasu sīsesu pavattasīsaṃ kilesasīsanti dve sīsāni idhādhippetāni –
tika-s0403t0:813_27: Tattha avijjāpariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0403t0:813_31: Yassa cetaṃ sīsadvayaṃ samaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0403t0:814_6: arahattamagge cattārīti ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyato imāya
tika-s0403t0:814_7: vārasamatāya idaṃ ubhayasīsapariyādānampi samaṃ hotīti imāya vārasamatāya.
tika-s0403t0:814_8: Vārasamavuttidāyakena hi maggacittena attano anantaraṃ viya nipphādetabbā paccavekkhaṇavārā ca kilesapariyādānasseva vārāti vattabbataṃ arahati.
tika-s0403t0:814_9: “Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotī”ti vacanato paccavekkhaṇaparisamāpanena kilesapariyādānaṃ sampāpitaṃ
tika-s0403t0:814_10: nāma hotīti imāya vāravuttiyā samatāya kilesapariyādānajīvitapariyādānānaṃ samatā veditabbā.
tika-s0403t0:815_0: Āyuno vemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā antarāva kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyatīti antarāparinibbāyī.
tika-s0403t0:815_4: Āyuvemajjhaṃ upahacca atikkamitvā tattha parinibbāyatīti upahaccaparinibbāyī.
tika-s0403t0:815_6: Asaṅkhārena appayogena anussāhena akilamanto tikkhindriyatāya sukheneva parinibbāyatīti asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī.
tika-s0403t0:815_10: Sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto dukkhena parinibbāyatīti sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī.
tika-s0403t0:815_12: uddhaṃ vā gantvā paṭilabhitabbato uddhamassa maggasotanti uddhaṃbhoto.
tika-s0403t0:816_1: Yo hi avihato paṭṭhāya cattāro devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gantvā parinibbāyati,
tika-s0403t0:816_3: Ayañhi avihesu kappasahassaṃ vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā atappaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0403t0:816_4: tatrāpi dve kappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā sudassaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0403t0:816_5: tatrāpi cattāri kappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā sudassiṃ gacchati,
tika-s0403t0:816_6: tatrāpi aṭṭha kappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0403t0:816_8: Tattha yo avihato paṭṭhāya dutiyaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā devalokaṃ gantvā parinibbāyati,
tika-s0403t0:816_12: Yo heṭṭhā catūsu devalokesu tattha tattheva nibbattitvā parinibbāyati,
tika-s0403t0:817_0: Ete pana avihesu uppannasamanantaraāyuvemajjhaṃ appatvāva parinibbāyanavasena tayo antarāparinibbāyino,
tika-s0403t0:820_4: Puna dasavasso na hotīti tesaṃ matimattametanti dassetuṃ “so kirā”ti kirasaddaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:820_6: Tassa nibbīsādibhāvassa viya ninnavādibhāvassa ca icchitattāti dassetuṃ “na kevalañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:820_8: Na idaṃ titthiyānaṃ adhivacanaṃ tesu tannimittassa abhāvā,
tika-s0403t0:820_11: Yassa panetaṃ adhivacanaṃ yena ca kāraṇena,
tika-s0403t0:821_2: Sikkhāya vā sammadeva ādito paṭṭhāya rakkhaṇaṃ sikkhāsamādānaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:821_3: Tañca atthato pūraṇena paricchinnaṃ arakkhaṇe sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato,
tika-s0403t0:821_9: Tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccādivasena sammadeva nijjhānaṃ dhammanisāmanāti āha “vipassanāyetaṃ adhivacana”nti.
tika-s0403t0:821_13: Taṃ pana sabbaso vīriyassa paribrūhanaṃ hotīti āha “kāyikacetasikassa vīriyassa pūraṇe”ti.
tika-s0403t0:821_14: Satiyañceva nipakabhāve cāti satokāritāya ceva sampajānakāritāya ca.
tika-s0403t0:826_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame devāyatanabhāvena cittattā lokassa cittīkāraṭṭhānatāya ca cetiyaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0403t0:826_8: “Vuddhiyevā”tiādinā vuttamatthaṃ byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ “abhiṇhaṃ asannipatantā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:826_10: Bhijjitvāti vaggabandhato vibhajja visuṃ visuṃ hutvā.
tika-s0403t0:827_0: Sannipātabheriyāti sannipātārocanabheriyā. Addhabhuttā vāti sāmibhuttā vā. Osīdamāneti hāyamāne.
tika-s0403t0:828_0: Suṅkanti bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā gacchantehi pabbatakhaṇḍanādititthagāmadvārādīsu rājapurisānaṃ dātabbabhāgaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:828_4: Idāni apaññattapaññāpanādīsu tappaṭikkhepe ca ādīnavānisaṃse ca vitthārato dassetuṃ “tesa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:828_6: Porāṇaṃ vajjidhammanti ettha pubbe kira vajjirājāno “ayaṃ coro”ti ānetvā dassite “gaṇhatha naṃ cora”nti avatvā vinicchayamahāmattānaṃ denti.
tika-s0403t0:828_26: Rājā tassa kiriyaṃ tena samānetvā tadanucchavikaṃ daṇḍaṃ karoti.
tika-s0403t0:828_27: Iti etaṃ porāṇaṃ vajjidhammaṃ samādāya vattantānaṃ manussā na ujjhāyanti.
tika-s0403t0:828_28: Paramparāgatesu aṭṭakulesu jātā agatigamanaviratā aṭṭamahallakapurisā aṭṭakulikā.
tika-s0403t0:829_1: Garubhāvaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvāti “ime amhākaṃ garuno”ti tattha garubhāvaṃ paṭi paṭi upaṭṭhapetvā.
tika-s0403t0:829_3: Taṃ pana sammānanaṃ tesu nesaṃ attamanatāpubbakanti āha “manena piyāyissantī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:831_1: tassa kammassa vipāke vā anavasarova devasopasaggo.
tika-s0403t0:831_2: Tasmiṃ pana laddhokāse siyā devatopasaggassa avasaroti āha “anuppannaṃ…pe…
tika-s0403t0:831_4: Eteneva anuppannaṃ sukhanti etthāpi attho veditabbo.
tika-s0403t0:831_5: Balakāyassa diguṇatiguṇatādassanaṃ paṭibhayabhāvadassananti evamādinā devatānaṃ saṅgāmasīse sahāyatā veditabbā.
tika-s0403t0:835_3: Vajjirājānoti “vajjetabbā ime”ti ādito pavattaṃ vacanaṃ upādāya vajjīti laddhanāmā rājāno,
tika-s0403t0:835_7: So pana pabhāvo nesaṃ gaṇarājānaṃ mitho sāmaggiyā loke pākaṭo.
tika-s0403t0:835_9: Anu anu taṃsamaṅgino bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti anubhāvo,
tika-s0403t0:835_11: So pana nesaṃ patāpo hatthiassādivāhanasampattiyā tattha ca subhikkhitabhāvena loke pākaṭo jātoti “etena…pe…
tika-s0403t0:835_17: purimasarassa poṅkhapadānugatapoṅkhaṃ itaraṃ saraṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0403t0:836_6: Sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vā natthi tāya velāya.
tika-s0403t0:836_9: Bhedopi idha upāyo evāti vuttaṃ “aññatra mithubhedā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:836_11: Idanti “aññatra upalāpanāya aññatra mithubhedā”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:836_13: parihānī”ti imāya bhagavato kathāya upāyaṃ labhitvā.
tika-s0403t0:837_1: pāpesīti rājā taṃ attano santikaṃ āgataṃ “kiṃ, ācariya,
tika-s0403t0:837_3: So “yathā bho samaṇassa gotamassa vacanaṃ na sakkā vajjī kenaci gahetuṃ,
tika-s0403t0:837_4: apica upalāpanāya vā mithubhedena vā sakkā”ti āha.
tika-s0403t0:837_5: Tato naṃ rājā “upalāpanāya amhākaṃ hatthiassādayo nassissanti,
tika-s0403t0:837_7: kiṃ karomā”ti pucchi. Tena hi, mahārāja,
tika-s0403t0:837_8: tumhe vajjī ārabbha parisati kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetha,
tika-s0403t0:837_10: attano santakena kasivaṇijjādīni katvā jīvantu ete rājāno”ti vatvā pakkamissāmi.
tika-s0403t0:837_12: esa brāhmaṇo vajjī ārabbha pavattaṃ kathaṃ paṭibāhatī”ti vadeyyātha.
tika-s0403t0:837_14: tampi gāhāpetvā tumhepi mama dosaṃ āropetvā bandhanatāḷanādīni akatvāva kevalaṃ khuramuṇḍaṃ maṃ katvā nagarā nīharāpetha,
tika-s0403t0:837_15: athāhaṃ “mayā te nagare pākāro parikhā ca kāritā,
tika-s0403t0:837_17: na cirassaṃ dāni taṃ ujuṃ karissāmī”ti vakkhāmi.
tika-s0403t0:838_1: mā tassa gaṅgaṃ uttāretuṃ adatthā”ti āhaṃsu.
tika-s0403t0:838_2: Tatra ekaccehi “amhe ārabbha kathitattā kira so evaṃ karotī”ti vutte “tena hi bhaṇe etū”ti vadiṃsu.
tika-s0403t0:838_3: So gantvā licchavī disvā “kimāgatatthā”ti pucchito taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
tika-s0403t0:838_4: Licchavino “appamattakena nāma evaṃ garuṃ daṇḍaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti vatvā “kiṃ te tatra ṭhānantara”nti pucchiṃsu.
tika-s0403t0:838_9: So patiṭṭhitaguṇo hutvā ekadivasaṃ ekaṃ licchaviṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ gantvā “dārakā kasantī”ti pucchi. Āma, kasanti.
tika-s0403t0:838_13: Tato tamañño “kiṃ ācariyo āhā”ti pucchitvā tena vuttaṃ –
tika-s0403t0:838_14: asaddahanto “na meso yathābhūtaṃ kathetī”ti tena saddhiṃ bhijji.
tika-s0403t0:839_0: Brāhmaṇo aparampi ekadivasaṃ ekaṃ licchaviṃ ekamantaṃ netvā “kena byañjanena bhuttosī”ti pucchitvā nivatto.
tika-s0403t0:839_1: Tampi añño pucchitvā asaddahanto tatheva bhijji.
tika-s0403t0:839_2: Brāhmaṇo aparampi divasaṃ ekaṃ licchaviṃ ekamantaṃ netvā “atiduggatosi kirā”ti pucchi.
tika-s0403t0:839_5: Aparampi ekamantaṃ netvā “tvaṃ kira bhīrujātiko”ti pucchi.
tika-s0403t0:839_8: Evaṃ aññena akathitameva aññassa kathento tīhi saṃvaccharehi te rājāno aññamaññaṃ bhinditvā yathā dve ekamaggena na gacchanti,
tika-s0403t0:839_15: Vesālikā sutvā “rañño gaṅgaṃ uttarituṃ na dassāmā”ti bheriṃ carāpesuṃ.
tika-s0403t0:839_16: Te sutvā “gacchantu sūrarājāno”tiādīni vatvā na sannipatiṃsu.
tika-s0403t0:839_20: Yathāvivaṭehi dvārehi pavisitvā sabbe anayabyasanaṃ pāpetvā gato.
tika-s0403t0:839_22: “rājāpi tameva pesetvā sabbepi bhinditvā gantvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpesī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:842_3: Evaṃ saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassento “idhāpi cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t0:842_4: Tattha tatotiādi disāsu āgatasāsane vuttavacanaṃ vuttakathanaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:843_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ bhikkhū viya pācittiyaṃ desāpetabboti paññāpentā.
tika-s0403t0:843_2: Tathā akarontāti navaṃ katikavattaṃ vā sikkhāpadaṃ vā amaddantā dhammavinayato sāsanaṃ dīpentā khuddakampi ca sikkhāpadaṃ asamūhanantā.
tika-s0403t0:843_3: Āyasmā mahākassapo viya cāti “suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho,
tika-s0403t0:843_5: Gihinopi jānanti ‘idaṃ vo samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtikānaṃ kappati,
tika-s0403t0:843_7: Sacepi hi mayaṃ khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanissāma,
tika-s0403t0:843_8: bhavissanti vattāro ‘dhūmakālikaṃ samaṇena gotamena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:843_16: yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vatteyyā”ti imaṃ tantiṃ ṭhapento āyasmā mahākassapo viya ca.
tika-s0403t0:844_2: Bahū rattiyoti pabbajitā hutvā bahū rattiyo jānanti.
tika-s0403t0:844_3: Sīlādiguṇesu patiṭṭhāpanameva sāsane pariṇāyakatāti āha “tīsu sikkhāsu pavattentī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:844_6: Sārabhūtaṃ dhammapariyāyanti samathavipassanāmaggaphalasampāpanena sāsane sārabhūtaṃ bojjhaṅgakosallaanuttarasītibhāva-
tika-s0403t0:844_13: evaṃ te saṅghāṭipattacīvaraṃ dhāretabba”nti ovādaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0403t0:845_1: Itareti ye na paccayavasikā na āmisacakkhukā,
tika-s0403t0:846_1: Nanu yattha katthacipi taṇhā sāvajjā evāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “gāmantasenāsanesu hī”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:846_2: Tena “anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato”ti ettha vuttapihādayo piya āraññakasenāsanesu sālayatā sevitabbapakkhikā evāti dasseti.
tika-s0403t0:847_1: Tena parehi anussāhitānaṃ saraseneva anāgatānaṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgamanaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:850_9: Evaṃ saṃsaṭṭhovāti vuttanayena gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya saṃsaṭṭho eva viharati.
tika-s0403t0:850_10: Dussīlā pāpicchā nāmāti sayaṃ nissīlā asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya samannāgatattā pāpā lāmakā icchā etesanti pāpicchā.
tika-s0403t0:853_2: Tathāpavattavipassanā pana yasmā attanā sahagatasaññāya bhāvitāya bhāvitā eva hoti,
tika-s0403t0:853_5: “Etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇītaṃ yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho”ti āgatavasena panettha dve lokuttarā hontīti veditabbā.
tika-s0403t0:853_6: “Virāgo nirodho”ti hi tattha nibbānaṃ vuttanti idha virāgasaññā,
tika-s0403t0:858_1: Catutthassa pañcame attano guyhaṃ tassa āvikarotīti attano guyhaṃ nigguhituṃ yuttakathaṃ aññassa akathetvā tasseva ācikkhati.
tika-s0403t0:858_2: Tassa guyhaṃ aññesaṃ nācikkhatīti tena kathitaguyhaṃ yathā aññe na jānanti,
tika-s0403t0:861_1: Chaṭṭhe piyo ca hoti manāpo cāti kalyāṇamittalakkhaṇaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:861_2: Kalyāṇamitto hi saddhāsampanno ca hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno.
tika-s0403t0:861_3: Tattha saddhāsampattiyā saddahati tathāgatassa sambodhiṃ kammañca kammaphalañca,
tika-s0403t0:861_4: tena sambodhiyā hetubhūtaṃ sattesu hitasukhaṃ na pariccajati.
tika-s0403t0:861_5: Sīlasampattiyā sattānaṃ piyo hoti garu bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo.
tika-s0403t0:861_6: Sutasampattiyā saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ gambhīrānaṃ kathānaṃ kattā hoti.
tika-s0403t0:861_7: Cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho.
tika-s0403t0:861_12: So satiyā kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samannesamāno paññāya sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā
tika-s0403t0:861_13: samādhinā tattha ekaggacitto hutvā vīriyena satte ahite nisedhetvā hite niyojeti.
tika-s0403t0:866_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame yasmā nidassanatthe nipāto tasmā seyyathāpi manussāti yathā manussāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:866_2: Viseso hotiyeva satipi bāhirassa kāraṇassa abhede ajjhattikassa bhinnattā.
tika-s0403t0:866_8: Sukhasamussayato vinipāto etesaṃ atthīti vinipātikā satipi devabhāve dibbasampattiyā abhāvato.
tika-s0403t0:866_9: Apāyesu vā gato natthi nipāto etesanti vinipātikā.
tika-s0403t0:866_11: Piyaṅkaramātādīnaṃ viyāti piyaṅkaramātā kira yakkhinī paccūsasamaye anuruddhattherassa dhammaṃ sajjhāyato sutvā –
tika-s0403t0:868_0: Api dhammapadaṃ vijāniya, paṭipajjema hitāya no siyā.
tika-s0403t0:871_0: Evaṃ puttakaṃ saññāpetvā taṃ divasaṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ pattā.
tika-s0403t0:871_1: Uttaramātā pana bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvāva sotāpannā jātā.
tika-s0403t0:872_2: Mahābrahmuno parisāya bhavāti brahmapārisajjā tassa paricārakaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā.
tika-s0403t0:872_5: Satipi tesaṃ tividhānampi paṭhamena jhānena gantvā nibbattabhāve jhānassa pana pavattibhedena ayaṃ visesoti
tika-s0403t0:872_8: Sā cassa hīnatā chandādīnaṃ hīnatāya veditabbā.
tika-s0403t0:872_12: Sā cassa majjhimatā chandādīnaṃ majjhimatāya veditabbā.
tika-s0403t0:872_15: Vipphārikataroti brahmapārisajjehi pamāṇato vipulataro sabhāvato uḷārataro ca hoti.
tika-s0403t0:872_18: Tassa hi parittābhādīnaṃ parittasubhādīnañca kāye satipi sabhāvavematte ekattavaseneva vavatthapīyatīti “ekattakāyā”tveva te vuccanti.
tika-s0403t0:872_20: Sā cassa ukkaṭṭhatā chandādīnaṃ ukkaṭṭhatāya veditabbā.
tika-s0403t0:872_24: Idhāpi kappo asaṅkhyeyyakappavaseneva veditabbo paripuṇṇamahākappassa asambhavato.
tika-s0403t0:872_28: Na hi tassā sampayuttadhammavasena aññopi koci bhedo atthi.
tika-s0403t0:872_29: Evanti iminā nānattakāyā ekattasaññino gahitāti dasseti.
tika-s0403t0:873_6: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena ābhassaraggahaṇeneva sabbepi te parittābhāappamāṇābhāpi gahitā.
tika-s0403t0:874_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana niccalāya ekagghanāya pabhāya subhoti pariyāyavacananti “subhena okiṇṇā vikiṇṇā”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0403t0:874_10: Catutthaviññāṇaṭṭhitimeva bhajanti kāyassa saññāya ca ekarūpattā.
tika-s0403t0:875_1: “Na sabbakālikā”ti vatvā tameva asabbakālikattaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “kappasatasahassampī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:875_2: Soḷasakappasahassaccayena uppannānaṃ suddhāvāsabrahmānaṃ parinibbāyanato aññesañca tattha anuppajjanato buddhasuññe loke suññaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0403t0:875_5: Iminā suttena suddhāvāsānaṃ sattāvāsabhāvadīpaneneva viññāṇaṭṭhitibhāvopi dīpito hoti,
tika-s0403t0:879_3: jhānakkho cakkavīriyo”ti hi ettha alaṅkāro parikkhāro nāma.
tika-s0403t0:879_4: “Sattahi nagaraparikkhārehi suparikkhataṃ hotī”ti ettha parivāro parikkhāro nāma.
tika-s0403t0:879_9: Parivāro hi sammādiṭṭhādayo maggadhammā sammāsamādhissa sahajātādipaccayabhāvena parikaraṇato abhisaṅkharaṇato.
tika-s0403t0:879_11: Ayaṃ vuccati ariyo sammāsamādhīti ayaṃ sattahi ratanehi parivuto cakkavattī viya sattahi aṅgehi parivuto ariyo sammāsamādhīti vuccati.
tika-s0403t0:882_1: Tatiye anuḍahanaṭṭhenāti kāmaṃ āhuneyyaggiādayo tayo aggī brāhmaṇehipi icchitā santi.
tika-s0403t0:882_12: Yadaggena ca te puttānaṃ bahūpakāratāya āhuneyyāti,
tika-s0403t0:883_2: ajja uposathiko hutvā vihāre sabbarattiṃ dhammassavanaṃ suṇohi,
tika-s0403t0:883_3: sahassaṃ te dassāmī”ti vutto dhanalobhena uposathaṃ samādāya vihāraṃ gantvā “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ akutobhaya”nti
tika-s0403t0:883_4: sallakkhetvā dhammāsanassa heṭṭhā nipanno sabbarattiṃ niddāyitvā gharaṃ agamāsi.
tika-s0403t0:883_12: So tassā vacanaṃ anādiyitvā gacchati eva.
tika-s0403t0:883_14: Atha naṃ kujjhitvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ purato tiṭṭhatī”ti pādena paharitvā patitaṃ antaraṃ katvā agamāsi.
tika-s0403t0:884_0: Mātā uṭṭhahitvā “mādisāya mātari evarūpaṃ kammaṃ katvā gatassa te gataṭṭhāne sukhaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃsaññī nāma tvaṃ puttā”ti āha.
tika-s0403t0:884_1: Tassa nāvaṃ āruyha gacchato sattame divase nāvā aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0403t0:884_2: Atha te manussā “addhā ettha pāpapuggalo atthi,
tika-s0403t0:884_5: Te tassa uḷumpaṃ datvā taṃ samudde pakkhipiṃsu.
tika-s0403t0:884_6: So ekaṃ dīpaṃ gantvā vimānapetīhi saddhiṃ sampattiṃ anubhavanto tāhi “purato purato mā agamāsī”ti vuccamānopi
tika-s0403t0:884_7: taddiguṇaṃ taddiguṇaṃ sampattiṃ passanto anupubbena khuracakkadharaṃ ekaṃ addasa.
tika-s0403t0:884_10: idaṃ tayā piḷandhitaṃ padumaṃ mayhaṃ dehī”ti. Na idaṃ, sāmi, padumaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:884_13: kiṃ mayā padumaṃ na diṭṭhapubba”nti vatvā “tvaṃ lohitacandanaṃ vilimpitvā piḷandhanaṃ padumapupphaṃ mayhaṃ na dātukāmo”ti āha.
tika-s0403t0:884_14: So cintesi “ayampi mayā katasadisaṃ kammaṃ katvā tassa phalaṃ anubhavitukāmo”ti.
tika-s0403t0:884_16: re”ti vatvā tassa matthake cakkaṃ khipi.
tika-s0403t0:888_3: kassapabuddhakāle sotāpannassa upāsakassa bhariyā aticāraṃ carati.
tika-s0403t0:888_4: So taṃ paccakkhato disvā “kasmā evaṃ karosī”ti āha.
tika-s0403t0:888_6: ayaṃ me sunakho viluppamāno khādatū”ti vatvā kālakatā kaṇṇamuṇḍakadahe vemānikapetī hutvā nibbattā divā sampattiṃ anubhavati,
tika-s0403t0:888_8: Tadā bārāṇasirājā migavaṃ caranto araññaṃ pavisitvā anupubbena kaṇṇamuṇḍakadahaṃ sampatto tāya saddhiṃ sampattiṃ anubhavati.
tika-s0403t0:888_9: Sā taṃ vañcetvā rattiṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavati.
tika-s0403t0:888_10: So ñatvā “kattha nu kho gacchatī”ti piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gantvā avidūre ṭhito kaṇṇamuṇḍakadahato nikkhamitvā
tika-s0403t0:888_11: taṃ “paṭapaṭa”nti khādamānaṃ ekaṃ sunakhaṃ disvā asinā dvidhā chindi,
tika-s0403t0:888_19: Sā “evaṃ akatvā kheḷapiṇḍaṃ bhūmiyaṃ niṭṭhubhitvā pādena ghaṃsāhī”ti āha.
tika-s0403t0:888_23: yadidaṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ bhūmiyaṃ niṭṭhubhitvā pādena ghaṃsanaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:889_0: Dakkhiṇāti cattāro paccayā dīyamānā dakkhanti etehi hitasukhānīti,
tika-s0403t0:892_1: Catutthe yaññavāṭaṃ sampādetvā mahāyaññaṃ uddissa saviññāṇakāni aviññāṇakāni ca yaññūpakaraṇāni sajjitānīti āha pāḷiyaṃ “mahāyañño upakkhaṭo”ti.
tika-s0403t0:892_2: Taṃ upakaraṇaṃ tesaṃ tathāsajjananti āha “upakkhaṭoti paccupaṭṭhito”ti.
tika-s0403t0:892_4: Te pana vacchā eva honti, na dammā,
tika-s0403t0:892_9: Upavāyatūti upagantvā sarīradarathaṃ nibbāpento saṇhasītalā vāto vāyatu.
tika-s0403t0:895_1: Chaṭṭhe nhāruvilekhananti cammaṃ likhantānaṃ cammaṃ likhitvā chaḍḍitakasaṭaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:898_3: Samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vāti pabbajjāmattena samaṇo vā,
tika-s0403t0:898_14: Idampi khoti ettha idanti yathāvuttaṃ sādiyanādiṃ khaṇḍādibhāvavasena ekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Pi-
tika-s0403t0:898_18: yadetaṃ brahmacāripaṭiññassa asatipi dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiyaṃ mātugāmassa ucchādananahāpanasambāhanasādiyanādi.
tika-s0403t0:898_19: Idampi ekaṃsena tassa brahmacariyassa khaṇḍādibhāvāpādanato khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi kammāsampīti.
tika-s0403t0:898_20: Evaṃ pana khaṇḍādibhāvāpattiyā so aparisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carati,
tika-s0403t0:898_24: Tato cassa na jātiādīhi parimuttīti dassento “ayaṃ vuccatī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t0:899_10: Yā kāci vā bhitti porisakā diyaḍḍharatanappamāṇā kuṭṭaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:899_27: Methunā virati brahmacariyanti evampettha pāḷivaṇṇanā veditabbā.
tika-s0403t0:902_1: Navame “sāhu dāna”nti dānaṃ detīti “dānaṃ nāma sādhu sundara”nti dānaṃ detīti attho.
tika-s0403t0:902_2: Dānañhi datvā taṃ paccavekkhantassa pāmojjapītisomanassādayo uppajjanti,
tika-s0403t0:902_4: Idāni dānaṃ anukūladhammaparibrūhanena paccanīkadhammavidūrīkaraṇena ca bhāvanācittassa upasobhanāya
tika-s0403t0:902_5: ca parikkhārāya ca hotīti “alaṅkārabhūtañceva parivārabhūtañca detī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:902_6: Jhānānāgāmī nāma hoti jhānaṃ nibbattetvā brahmalokūpapannānaṃ ariyānaṃ heṭṭhā anuppajjanato.
tika-s0403t0:902_7: Imaṃ pecca paribhuñjissāmīti sāpekkhassa dānaṃ paralokaphalāsāya sātisayāya ca pubbācāravasena uppajjamānāya
tika-s0403t0:902_8: anubhavattā taṇhuttaraṃ nāma hotīti āha “paṭhamaṃ taṇhuttariyadāna”nti.
tika-s0403t0:902_9: Dānaṃ nāma buddhādīhi pasatthanti garuṃ cittīkāraṃ upaṭṭhapetvā dātabbattā “dutiyaṃ cittīkāradāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:902_10: Pubbakehi pitupitāmahehi dinnapubbaṃ katapubbaṃ jahāpetuṃ nāma nānucchavikanti attabhāvasabhāgavasena
tika-s0403t0:902_14: nārahāmi pacanto apacantānaṃ dānaṃ adātu”nti evaṃsaññī hutvā dento niravasesaṃ katvā detīti āha “catutthaṃ niravasesadāna”nti.
tika-s0403t0:902_15: “Yathā tesaṃ pubbakānaṃ isīnaṃ tāni mahāyaññakāni ahesuṃ,
tika-s0403t0:902_16: evaṃ me ayaṃ dānaparibhogo bhavissatī”ti evaṃsaññino dānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ arahesu dātabbato “pañcamaṃ dakkhiṇeyyadāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:902_17: “Imaṃ me dānaṃ dadato cittaṃ pasīdatī”tiādinā pītisomanassaṃ uppādetvā dentassa dānaṃ somanassabāhullappattiyā
tika-s0403t0:902_18: somanassupacāraṃ nāma hotīti āha “chaṭṭhaṃ somanassupavicāradāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:905_3: Majjhimabhāṇakā pana vadanti “bhagavā upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya jetavanato bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto cārikaṃ nikkhami.
tika-s0403t0:905_4: Teneva ca akāle nikkhantattā kosalarājādayo vāretuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
tika-s0403t0:905_6: Puṇṇāya sammāpaṭipattiṃ paccāsīsanto bhagavā “mama nivattanapaccayā tvaṃ kiṃ karissasī”ti āha.
tika-s0403t0:905_8: pabbajīti ettha seṭṭhi “puṇṇāya bhagavā nivattito”ti sutvā taṃ bhujissaṃ katvā dhītuṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
tika-s0403t0:905_11: Athassā satthā āraddhavipassakabhāvaṃ ñatvā imaṃ obhāsagāthaṃ vissajjesi –
tika-s0403t0:908_0: Sā gāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ patvā abhiññātā sāvikā ahosi. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0403t0:914_2: Dutiye atīte attabhāve nibbattakaṃ kammanti “purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā,
tika-s0403t0:914_6: cetanā bhavo”ti evamāgataṃ saparikkhāraṃ pañcavidhaṃ kammavaṭṭamāha.
tika-s0403t0:914_7: Etarahi me attabhāvo na siyāti viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanāsahitaṃ paccuppannaṃ pañcavidhaṃ vipākavaṭṭamāha.
tika-s0403t0:914_11: Taṃ pajahāmīti tappaṭibaddhacchandarāgappahānena tato eva āyatiṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanavasena pajahāmi pariccajāmi.
tika-s0403t0:914_18: Ramaṇīyaṃ vā bhūmibhāganti tiṇagumbādirahitaṃ vivittaṃ abbhokāsabhūmibhāgaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:917_1: Tatiye vivittāni tādisāni pana pariyantāni atidūrāni hontīti āha “antimapariyantimānī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:917_5: Samannāhāre ṭhapayamānoti indriyaṃ samākārena vattento indriyasamataṃ paṭipādento nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t0:917_7: satipi saṅkhāranimittāvirahe niccanimittādivirahato “animitto”ti vuccatīti āha “animittanti balavavipassanāsamādhi”nti.
tika-s0403t0:920_2: Thaddhamacchariyasadisaṃ hi kucchitaṃ sabbanihīnaṃ natthi sabbakusalānaṃ ādibhūtassa nisedhanato.
tika-s0403t0:923_1: Aṭṭhame ālokasaññaṃ manasi kareyyāsīti divā vā rattiṃ vā sūriyapajjotacandamaṇiādīnaṃ ālokaṃ “āloko”ti manasi kareyyāsi.
tika-s0403t0:923_3: sūriyacandālokādiṃ divā rattiñca upaladdhaṃ yathāladdhavaseneva manasi kareyyāsi,
tika-s0403t0:923_5: Yathā te subhāvitālokakasiṇassa viya kasiṇāloko yadicchakaṃ yāvadicchakañca so āloko rattiyaṃ upatiṭṭhati,
tika-s0403t0:923_9: Iti vivaṭena cetasāti evaṃ apihitena cittena thinamiddhapidhānena apihitattā.
tika-s0403t0:923_12: Thinamiddhavinodanaālokopi vā hotu kasiṇālokopi vā parikammālokopi vā,
tika-s0403t0:923_17: sati samavāye kātabbato tāni karaṇīyānīti āha “itarāni karaṇīyānī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:923_18: Atha vā kattabbāni kammāni karaṇaṃ arahantīti karaṇīyāni.
tika-s0403t0:924_0: Ādinayappavattā viggāhikakathāti “na tvaṃ imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ ājānāsi,
tika-s0403t0:924_13: nibbeṭhehi vā sace pahosī”ti evaṃpavattā kathā.
tika-s0403t0:924_14: Tattha sahitaṃ meti mayhaṃ vacanaṃ sahitaṃ siliṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:924_17: Asahitaṃ teti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ asahitaṃ asiliṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:924_18: Adhiciṇṇaṃ te viparāvattanti yaṃ tuyhaṃ dīgharattāciṇṇavasena suppaguṇaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:924_19: taṃ mayhaṃ ekavacaneneva viparāvattaṃ parivattitvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:924_21: Āropito te vādoti mayā tava vāde doso āropito.
tika-s0403t0:924_24: Nibbeṭhehi vā sace pahosīti atha sayaṃ pahosi,
tika-s0403t0:925_0: Taṇhā sabbaso khīyanti etthāti taṇhāsaṅkhayo, tasmiṃ.
tika-s0403t0:925_1: Taṇhāsaṅkhayeti ca idaṃ visaye bhummanti āha “taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā”ti.
tika-s0403t0:925_4: Sā sāsanacārigocarā paccattaṃ veditabbatoti āha “pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ saṃkhittena desethāti pucchatī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:925_6: so eva aparihāyanasabhāvattā accantā niṭṭhā assāti accantaniṭṭhā.
tika-s0403t0:925_8: Na hi paṭividdhassa lokuttaradhammassa dassannaṃ kuppannaṃ nāma atthi.
tika-s0403t0:925_9: Accantameva catūhi yogehi khemo etassa atthīti accantayogakkhemī.
tika-s0403t0:925_10: Maggabrahmacariyassa vusitattā tassa ca aparihāyanasabhāvattā accantaṃ brahmacārīti accantabrahmacārī.
tika-s0403t0:926_1: Sakkāyasabbañhi sandhāya idha “sabbe dhammā”ti vuttaṃ vipassanāvisayassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0403t0:926_10: tassa pana sapaccayanāmarūpadassanabhāvato sati ca paccayapariggahe sapaccayattā aniccanti,
tika-s0403t0:926_12: dukkhañca anattāti atthato lakkhaṇattayaṃ supākaṭameva hotīti āha “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti ñātapariññāya abhijānātī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:926_13: Tatheva tīraṇapariññāyāti iminā aniccādibhāvena nālaṃ abhinivesāyāti nāmarūpassa upasaṃharati,
tika-s0403t0:926_15: Purimāya hi atthato āpannaṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ gaṇhāti salakkhaṇasallakkhaṇaparattā tassā.
tika-s0403t0:926_21: bhavassādagadhitamānasatāya ca therassa vedanāvasena nibbattetvā dasseti.

tika-s0403t0:927_4: Eseva nayoti atidisitvā taṃ ekadesena vivaranto “nirodhopi hi…pe…
tika-s0403t0:927_6: Khandhānaṃ pariccajanaṃ tappaṭibaddhakilesappahānavasenāti yenākārena vipassanā kilese pajahati,
tika-s0403t0:927_7: tenākārena taṃnimittakkhandhe ca pajahatīti vattabbataṃ arahatīti āha “sā hi…pe…
tika-s0403t0:927_10: Evañhi maggato aññesaṃ nibbānārammaṇānaṃ pakkhandanavossaggābhāvo siddhova hoti.
tika-s0403t0:927_11: Pariccajanena pakkhandanena cāti dvīhipi vā kāraṇehi.
tika-s0403t0:927_14: Yasmā vā vipassanācittaṃ pakkhandatīti maggasampayuttacittaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0403t0:927_15: Maggo ca samucchedavasena kilese khandhe ca pariccajati,
tika-s0403t0:927_16: tasmā yathākkamaṃ vipassanāmaggānañca vasena pakkhandanapariccāgavossaggāpi veditabbā.
tika-s0403t0:927_18: “Aniccānupassanāya niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”tiādivacanato hi yathā vipassanāya kilesānaṃ pariccāgappaṭinissaggo labbhati,
tika-s0403t0:927_19: evaṃ āyatiṃ tehi kilesehi uppādetabbakkhandhānampi pariccāgapaṭinissaggo vattabbo.
tika-s0403t0:927_20: Pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo pana magge labbhamānāya ekantakāraṇabhūtāya vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya vasena veditabbo.
tika-s0403t0:927_21: Magge pana tadubhayampi ñāyāgatameva nippariyāyatova labbhamānattā.
tika-s0403t0:927_23: Pucchantassa ajjhāsayavasena “na kiñci loke upādiyatī”ti ettha kāmupādānavasena upādiyanaṃ paṭikkhipatīti āha “taṇhāvasena na upādiyatī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:927_24: Taṇhāvasena vā asati upādiyane diṭṭhivasena upādiyanaṃ anavakāsamevāti “taṇhāvasena”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:927_27: Saṃkhitteneva kathesīti tassa ajjhāsayavasena papañcaṃ akatvā kathesi.
tika-s0403t0:930_3: puññānanti ettha māti paṭisedhe nipāto. Puñña-
tika-s0403t0:930_6: dhammānaṃ samādānahetu evamidaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”tiādīsu puññaphale āgato.
tika-s0403t0:930_21: devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā uccesu vimānesu ciraṭṭhitikā,
tika-s0403t0:930_22: tepi tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena bhayaṃ saṃvegaṃ santāsaṃ āpajjantī”ti āgataṃ ñāṇabhayaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:930_29: dīgharattaṃ kāyavacīsaṃyamo vattappaṭivattapūraṇaṃ ekāsanaṃ ekaseyyaṃ indriyadamo dhutadhammehi cittassa
tika-s0403t0:930_30: niggaho satisampajaññaṃ kammaṭṭhānānuyogavasena vīriyārambhoti evamādīni yāni bhikkhunā nirantaraṃ pavattetabbāni puññāni,
tika-s0403t0:930_33: Ekaccassa diṭṭhadhammasukhassa uparodhabhayena samparāyikanibbānasukhadāyakehi puññehi mā bhāyitthāti.
tika-s0403t0:931_8: na sukaraṃ akkhānena pāpuṇituṃ yāva sukhā saggā”tiādīsu sukhapaccayaṭṭhāne.
tika-s0403t0:931_16: vedanā vuttā pariyāyena sukhā vedanā dukkhā vedanā”tiādīsu iṭṭhasukhesu.
tika-s0403t0:931_19: Iṭṭhassātiādīsu icchitabbato ceva aniṭṭhappaṭipakkhato ca iṭṭhassa.
tika-s0403t0:931_22: Mananīyato manassa vaḍḍhanato ca manāpassāti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0403t0:931_24: etaṃ sukhassa iṭṭhassa vipākassa adhivacanaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:931_25: Sukhassetaṃ yadidaṃ puññānīti phalena kāraṇassa abhedopacāraṃ vadati.
tika-s0403t0:931_26: Tena katūpacitānaṃ puññānaṃ avassaṃbhāviphalaṃ sutvā appamattena sakkaccaṃ puññāni kattabbānīti puññakiriyāyaṃ niyojeti,
tika-s0403t0:932_0: Idāni attanā sunettakāle katena puññakammena dīgharattaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ bhavantarappaṭicchannaṃ uḷārataraṃ
tika-s0403t0:932_1: puññavipākaṃ udāharitvā tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karonto “abhijānāmi kho panāha”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0403t0:932_18: cittasīsena samādhi vuttoti mettāsamādhiṃ metābrahmavihāraṃ uppādetvā ceva vaḍḍhetvā ca.
tika-s0403t0:933_13: Ābhassarūpagoti tattha paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena ābhassarabrahmalokaṃ upagacchāmīti ābhassarūpago homi.
tika-s0403t0:933_15: Suññaṃ brahmavimānaṃ upapajjāmīti kassaci sattassa tattha nibbattassa abhāvato suññaṃ yaṃ paṭhamajjhānabhūmisaṅkhātaṃ brahmavimānaṃ ādito nibbattati,
tika-s0403t0:934_0: Brahmāti kāmāvacarasattehi visiṭṭhaṭṭhena tathā tathā brūhitaguṇatāya brahmavihārato nibbattanaṭṭhena ca brahmā.
tika-s0403t0:934_2: tato eva te abhibhavitvā ṭhitattā abhibhū.
tika-s0403t0:934_3: Tehi na kenacipi guṇena abhibhūtoti anabhibhūto.
tika-s0403t0:934_6: atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ dassanasamattho abhiññāñāṇena passitabbaṃ passāmīti attho.
tika-s0403t0:934_7: Sesabrahmānaṃ iddhipādabhāvanābalena attano cittañca mama vase vattemīti vasavattī homīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:934_8: Tadā kira bodhisatto aṭṭhasamāpattilābhīpi samāno tathā sattahitaṃ attano pāramipūraṇañca olokento tāsu
tika-s0403t0:934_9: eva dvīsu jhānabhūmīsu nikanti uppādetvā mettābrahmavihāravasena aparāparaṃ saṃsari.
tika-s0403t0:935_0: Evaṃ bhagavā rūpāvacarapuññassa vipākamahantataṃ pakāsetvā idāni kāmāvacarapuññassapi vipākaṃ dassento “chattiṃsakkhattu”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0403t0:935_1: Tattha sakko ahosinti chattiṃsakkhattuṃ chattiṃsavāre aññattha anupapajjitvā nirantaraṃ sakko devānamindo tāvatiṃsadevarājā ahosiṃ.
tika-s0403t0:935_2: Rājā ahosintiādīsu catūhi acchariyadhammehi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi ca lokaṃ rañjetīti rājā.
tika-s0403t0:935_6: parahitāya ca iriyāpathacakkānaṃ vatto etasmiṃ atthīti cakkavattī.
tika-s0403t0:935_11: Dhammeneva rajjaṃ labhitvā rājā jātoti dhammarājā,
tika-s0403t0:935_12: dasavidhe kusaladhamme agarahite ca rājadhamme niyuttoti dhammiko.
tika-s0403t0:935_13: Tena ca dhammena sakalaṃ lokaṃ rañjetīti dhammarājā.
tika-s0403t0:935_16: Yasmā cakkavattī dhammena ñāyena rajjaṃ adhigacchati,
tika-s0403t0:936_0: Catūsu disāsu samuddapariyosānatāya cāturantā nāma tattha tattha dīpe mahāpathavīti āha “puratthima…pe…
tika-s0403t0:936_3: kāmakodhādikassa abbhantarassa paṭirājabhūtassa bāhirassa ca arigaṇassa vijayī vijinitvā ṭhitoti attho.
tika-s0403t0:936_4: Kāmaṃ cakkavattino kenaci yuddhaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-s0403t0:936_5: yuddhena pana sādhetabbassa vijayassa siddhiyā “vijitasaṅgāmo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:936_6: Janapado vā catubbidhaacchariyadhammena samannāgato asmiṃ rājini thāvariyaṃ kenaci asaṃhāriyaṃ daḷhabhattibhāvaṃ patto,
tika-s0403t0:936_7: janapade vā attano dhammikāya paṭipattiyā thāvariyaṃ thirabhāvaṃ pattoti janapadatthāvariyappatto.
tika-s0403t0:936_8: Caṇḍassa hi rañño balidaṇḍādīhi lokaṃ pīḷayato manussā majjhimajanapadaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbatasamuddatīrakandarādīni nissāya paccante vāsaṃ kappenti.
tika-s0403t0:936_9: Atimudukassa rañño corehi sāhasikadhanavilopapīḷitā manussā paccantaṃ pahāya janapadamajjhe vāsaṃ kappenti.
tika-s0403t0:936_10: Iti evarūpe rājini janapado thirabhāvaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0403t0:937_1: Tesu hi rājā cakkavattī cakkaratanena ajitaṃ jināti,
tika-s0403t0:937_10: Visesato cassa purimāni tīṇi adosakusalamūlajanitakammānubhāvena sampajjanti,
tika-s0403t0:938_6: Yāva cakkavāḷapabbatā cakkassa vattanato “cakkavāḷapabbataṃ sīmaṃ katvā ṭhitasamuddapariyanta”nti vuttaṃ.

tika-s0403t0:938_8: Asatthenāti iminā pana senāya yujjhanassāti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ “na daṇḍenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:938_10: ye katāparādhe satte satampi sahassampi gaṇhanti,
tika-s0403t0:938_14: Ahaṃ pana duvidhampi daṇḍaṃ pahāya adaṇḍena ajjhāvasiṃ.

tika-s0403t0:939_0: Iti bhagavā attānaṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā puññānaṃ vipākamahantataṃ pakāsetvā idāni tamevatthaṃ gāthābandhanena dassento “passa,
tika-s0403t0:939_4: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “passathā”ti vattabbe “passā”ti vacanabyattayo katoti daṭṭhabbo.

tika-s0403t0:942_2: Vacīghosopi hi bahūhi ekajjhaṃ pavattito atthato ca saddato ca duravabodho kevalaṃ mahānigghoso eva hutvā sotapathamāgacchati.

tika-s0403t0:942_9: Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “kevaṭṭānaṃ macchapacchiṃ otāretvā ṭhitaṭṭhāne”ti.
tika-s0403t0:942_10: Macchaggahaṇatthaṃ jāle pakkhittepi tasmiṃ ṭhāne kevaṭṭā ceva aññe ca “paviṭṭho na paviṭṭho,
tika-s0403t0:945_7: Dubbaṇṇova hotīti pakatiyā vaṇṇavāpi alaṅkatappaṭiyattopi mukhavikārādivasena virūpo eva hoti.
tika-s0403t0:945_8: Etarahi āyatiñcāti kodhābhibhūtassa ekantamidaṃ phalanti dīpetuṃ “dubbaṇṇovā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ katvā puna “kodhābhibhūto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:946_4: Taṃ jano nāvabujjhatīti kodhasaṅkhātaṃ antarato abbhantare attano citteyeva jātaṃ anatthajananacittappakopanādibhayaṃ
tika-s0403t0:946_11: yasmā kodho uppajjamāno naraṃ sahate abhibhavati,
tika-s0403t0:946_18: Atha vā yaṃ naraṃ kodho sahate abhibhavati,
tika-s0403t0:946_20: Tato ca kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti,
tika-s0403t0:947_3: saddena vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ paññāvīriyena diṭṭhiyāti vuttanti dassento “katarena damenā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0403t0:947_6: vedantagū vusitabrahmacariyo”ti ettha hi indriyasaṃvaro damoti vutto “manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni dametī”ti katvā.
tika-s0403t0:947_8: khantyā bhiyyodha vijjatī”ti ettha paññā damo “saṃkilesaṃ dameti pajahatī”ti katvā.
tika-s0403t0:947_10: atthi puññassa āgamo”ti ettha uposathakammaṃ damo “upavasanavasena kāyakammādīni dametī”ti katvā.
tika-s0403t0:947_12: iminā damūpasamena samannāgato sunāparantasmiṃ janapadantare viharitu”nti ettha adhivāsanakkhanti damo
tika-s0403t0:947_15: na monamatthi asamāhitassā”ti ettha abhisambojjhaṅgādiko samādhipakkhiko dhammo damo “dammati cittaṃ etenā”ti katvā.
tika-s0403t0:952_8: Yadā hi kappo tejena saṃvaṭṭati vinassati,
tika-s0403t0:952_14: Vitthārato pana sadāpi ekaṃ buddhakkhettaṃ vinassati.
tika-s0403t0:952_15: Buddhakkhettaṃ nāma tividhaṃ hoti jātikkhettaṃ āṇākkhettaṃ visayakkhettanti.
tika-s0403t0:952_24: Evametesu tīsu buddhakkhettesu ekaṃ āṇākkhettaṃ vinassati.
tika-s0403t0:952_25: Tasmiṃ pana vinassante jātikkhettaṃ vinaṭṭhameva hoti.
tika-s0403t0:953_1: Rāgādīsu hi akusalamūlesu ussannesu loko vinassati.
tika-s0403t0:953_2: Tathā hi rāge ussannatare agginā vinassati,
tika-s0403t0:954_3: Tattha “vassasatasahassamatthake kappuṭṭhānaṃ nāma bhavissatī”tiādinā devatāhi ugghositasaddo kappakolāhalaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t0:954_5: bhāvetha karuṇaṃ muditaṃ upekkha”nti manussapathe devatā ghosantiyo caranti.
tika-s0403t0:954_7: “Ito vassasahassamatthake buddho uppajjitvā dhammānudhammappaṭipanno saṅgharatanena parivārito dhammaṃ desento vicarissatī”ti devatā ugghosanti.
tika-s0403t0:954_8: “Vassasatamatthake pana cakkavattī uppajjissatī”ti cakkavattikolāhalaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0403t0:954_9: “Ito vassasatamatthake sattaratanasampanno cātuddīpissaro sahassaparivāro vehāsaṅgamo cakkavattī rājā uppajjissatī”ti devatā ugghosanti.
tika-s0403t0:955_0: Aciraṭṭhena na dhuvāti udakabubbuḷādayo viya na ciraṭṭhāyitāya dhuvabhāvarahitā.
tika-s0403t0:955_1: Assāsarahitāti supinake pītapānīyaṃ viya anulittacandanaṃ viya ca assāsavirahitā.
tika-s0403t0:956_2: āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷe ekamahāvassaṃ vassati.
tika-s0403t0:956_4: Sassesu pana gokhāyitakamattesu jātesu gadrabharavaṃ ravanto ekabindumpi na vassati,
tika-s0403t0:956_8: “Vassasatasahassa accayena kappavuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”tiādinā devatāhi vuttavacanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena manussā
tika-s0403t0:956_9: ca bhummadevatā ca saṃvegajātā aññamaññaṃ muducittā hutvā mettādīni puññānī katvā devaloke nibbattanti,
tika-s0403t0:957_0: Pañca bījajātānīti mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phaḷubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījanti pañca bījāni jātāni.
tika-s0403t0:957_10: Paccayantarasamavāye visadisuppattiyā visesakāraṇabhāvato ruhanasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bīja-
tika-s0403t0:957_11: saddo tadatthasiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci pavattatīti mūlādito nivattanatthaṃ ekena bīja-
tika-s0403t0:961_3: jhānakkho cakkavīriyo”tiādīsu viya alaṅkāravacano parikkhārasaddoti āha “nagarālaṅkārehi alaṅkata”nti.
tika-s0403t0:961_7: Suṭṭhu sannisīdāpitāti bhūmiṃ nikhanitvā sammadeva ṭhapitā.
tika-s0403t0:962_0: Anupariyāyeti etenāti anupariyāyo, soyeva pathoti anupariyāyapatho, parito pākārassa anuyāyamaggo.
tika-s0403t0:963_1: Yena hi payogena puriso hatthino ārohanayoggo hoti,
tika-s0403t0:963_2: hatthissa taṃ payogaṃ vidhāyantānaṃ sabbesampetesaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:963_4: Tattha hatthācariyā nāma ye hatthino hatthārohakānañca sikkhāpakā.
tika-s0403t0:963_14: Celena celapaṭākāya yuddhe akanti gacchantīti celakāti āha –
tika-s0403t0:963_16: Yathā tathā ṭhite senike brūhakaraṇavasena tato tato calayanti uccālentīti calakā.
tika-s0403t0:963_17: Sakuṇagghiādayo viya maṃsapiṇḍaṃ parasenāsamūhaṃ sāhasikamahāyodhatāya chetvā chetvā dayanti uppatitvā gacchantīti piṇḍadāyakā.
tika-s0403t0:963_18: Dutiyavikappe piṇḍe dayanti janasammadde uppatantā viya gacchantīti piṇḍadāyakāti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0403t0:963_21: Pakkhandantīti attano vīrasūrabhāvena asajjamānā parasenaṃ anupavisantīti attho.
tika-s0403t0:963_23: Ekasūrāti ekākisūrā attano sūrabhāveneva ekākino hutvā yujjhanakā.
tika-s0403t0:964_4: Ayaṃ anudhammoti ayaṃ navannaṃ lokuttaradhammānaṃ anulomadhammo.
tika-s0403t0:964_6: Saddhā bandhati pātheyyanti saddhā nāmāyaṃ sattassa maraṇavasena mahāpathaṃ saṃvajato mahākantāraṃ paṭipajjato
tika-s0403t0:964_14: Issariye hi abhimukhībhūte thalatopi jalatopi bhogā āgacchantiyeva.
tika-s0403t0:964_16: Saddhā dutiyā purisassa hotīti purisassa devaloke,
tika-s0403t0:964_17: manussaloke ceva nibbānañca gacchantassa saddhā dutiyā hoti,
tika-s0403t0:967_2: Tassa tasseva suttageyyādinā bhāsitassa tadaññassa suttapadatthassa bodhakassa saddassa atthakusalatāvasena atthaṃ jānātīti atthaññū.
tika-s0403t0:967_3: “Ettakomhi sīlena samādhinā paññāyā”ti evaṃ yathā attano pamāṇajānanavasena attānaṃ jānātīti attaññū.
tika-s0403t0:967_5: Niddese pana paṭiggahaṇamattaññutāya eva paribhogādimattaññutā pabodhitā hotīti paṭiggahaṇamattaññutāva dassitā.
tika-s0403t0:967_8: ayaṃ kālo yogassa adhigamāyā”ti evaṃ kālaṃ jānātīti kālaññū.
tika-s0403t0:967_12: atikkhapaññassa tāvatā kālena tīretuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā dasa vassāni uddesassa kālo,
tika-s0403t0:967_17: khattiyaparisādikaṃ manussaparisaṃyeva puna catubbidhaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhavidhaṃ vadanti apare.
tika-s0403t0:967_22: vipariyāyato añño asevitabbo”ti sevitabbāsevitabbapuggalaṃ jānātīti puggalaparoparaññū.
tika-s0403t0:967_23: Evañhi tesaṃ puggalānaṃ paroparaṃ ukkaṭṭhanihīnataṃ jānāti nāma.
tika-s0403t0:970_5: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mahāgovindasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ imameva pāḷiṃ āharitvā dassentena paṭhamaṃ paṇḍupalāsataṃ,
tika-s0403t0:970_10: te tassa paṇḍupalāsabhāvato paṭṭhāya attamanā honti. Yathāha –
tika-s0403t0:971_5: devā tāvatiṃsā tasmiṃ samaye honti ‘paṇḍupalāso dāni pāricchattako, koviḷāro,
tika-s0403t0:971_7: Yasmiṃ samaye devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ pāricchattako, koviḷāro,
tika-s0403t0:971_14: devā tāvatiṃsā tasmiṃ samaye honti ‘korakajāto dāni pāricchattako koviḷāro,
tika-s0403t0:972_3: Ye hi nīlapattakā ativiya khuddakā makuḷā,
tika-s0403t0:972_5: Jālakajātoti tehiyeva khuddakamakuḷehi jātajālako sabbaso jālo viya jāto.
tika-s0403t0:972_6: Keci pana “jālakajātoti ekajālo viya jāto”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0403t0:972_7: Pāricchattako kira khārakaggahaṇakāle sabbatthakameva pallaviko hoti,
tika-s0403t0:974_0: Anupharaṇānubhāvoti khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno kittisaddassa yāva brahmalokā anupharaṇasaṅkhāto ānubhāvo.
tika-s0403t0:974_1: Pabbajjānissitaṃ hotīti pabbajjāya catupārisuddhisīlampi dassitamevāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0403t0:974_3: Idha pana ubhayato paricchedo heṭṭhā sīlato upari arahattato ca paricchedassa dassitattā.
tika-s0403t0:974_4: Tenetaṃ vuttanti tena kāraṇena etaṃ “catupārisuddhisīlaṃ pabbajjānissitaṃ hotī”tiādivacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:977_2: Sambhāvanattheti “api nāma evaṃ siyā”ti vikappanattho sambhāvanattho.
tika-s0403t0:977_3: Evañhi loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ hotīti ekameva saṅkhaṃ avatvā aparāya saṅkhāya saddhiṃ vacanaṃ loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ
tika-s0403t0:977_4: hoti yathā “dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitānī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:977_5: Sammā adhisayitānīti pādādīhi attanā nesaṃ kiñci upaghātaṃ akarontiyā bahivātādiparissayapariharaṇatthaṃ sammadeva upari sayitāni.
tika-s0403t0:977_7: Utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyāti tesaṃ allasinehapariyādānatthaṃ attano kāyusmāvasena utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā.
tika-s0403t0:977_9: Sammā paribhāvitānīti sammadeva sabbaso kukkuṭavāsanāya vāsitāni.
tika-s0403t0:977_11: Ettha ca sammāparisedanaṃ kukkuṭagandhaparibhāvanañca sammāadhisayanasammāparisedananipphattiyā ānubhāvanipphāditanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:977_13: Na hi sammāadhisayanato visuṃ sammāparisedanassa sammāparibhāvanassa ca kāraṇaṃ atthi.
tika-s0403t0:977_14: Tena pana saddhiṃyeva itaresaṃ dvinnampi ijjhanato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:978_1: Kiñcāpi “evaṃ aho vata me”tiādinā na icchā uppajjeyya kāraṇassa pana sampāditattā,
tika-s0403t0:978_2: atha kho bhabbāva te abhinibbhijjitunti yojanā.
tika-s0403t0:978_3: Kasmā bhabbāti āha “te hi yasmā tāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:978_6: Yathā kapālassa tanutā ālokassa anto paññāyamānassa kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:978_7: tathā kapālassa tanutāya nakhasikhāmukhatuṇḍakānaṃ kharatāya ca allasinehapariyādānaṃ kāraṇavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:978_8: Tasmāti ālokassa anto paññāyamānato sayañca paripākagatattā.
tika-s0403t0:979_5: Ñāṇassa hi sabhāvato satinepakkato ca tikkhabhāvo,
tika-s0403t0:979_10: Anulomaṭṭhāniyā hi vipassanā gahitagabbhā nāma tadā maggagabbhassa gahitattā.
tika-s0403t0:980_3: Gaṇḍaṃ haratīti palagaṇḍoti etena “palena gaṇḍahāro palagaṇḍoti pacchimapade uttarapadalopena niddeso”ti dasseti.
tika-s0403t0:980_7: Tena vipassanaṃ anuyuñjantassa puggalassa ajānantasseva āsavānaṃ parikkhayo idha vipassanānisaṃsoti adhippeto.
tika-s0403t0:981_7: Pariyāyanaṃ viyāti parito aparāparaṃ yāyanaṃ viya.
tika-s0403t0:984_7: Taṃ kiṃ maññathāti taṃ idāni mayā vuccamānatthaṃ kiṃ maññathāti anumatiggahaṇatthaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0403t0:985_2: Asucisaṅkassarasamācārassāti aparisuddhatāya asuci hutvā saṅkāya saritabbasamācārassa.
tika-s0403t0:985_3: Dussīlo hi kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā “idaṃ asukena kataṃ bhavissatī”ti paresaṃ āsaṅkā hoti.
tika-s0403t0:985_4: Kenacideva karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā “kacci nu kho ime mayā katakammaṃ jānitvā mantentī”ti attanoyeva saṅkāya saritabbasamācāro.
tika-s0403t0:985_10: Pūtinā kammena sīlavipattiyā anto anupaviṭṭhattā antopūtikassa.
tika-s0403t0:989_3: Pabandhānupacchedassa paccayabhāvo idha jīvitassa raso kiccanti adhippetanti āha “sarasaparittatāyapī”ti.
tika-s0403t0:989_7: so vassasataṃ appaṃ vā bhiyyo”ti vacanato parittaṃ khaṇaparittatāyapi.
tika-s0403t0:989_8: Paramatthato hi atiparitto sattānaṃ jīvitakkhaṇo ekacittakkhaṇappavattimattoyeva.
tika-s0403t0:989_9: Yathā nāma rathacakkaṃ pavattamānampi ekeneva nemippadesena pavattati,
tika-s0403t0:989_11: evamevaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ tasmiṃ citte niruddhamatte satto niruddhoti vuccati.
tika-s0403t0:989_12: Yathāha “atīte cittakkhaṇe jīvittha na jīvati na jīvissati.
tika-s0403t0:989_13: Anāgate cittakkhaṇe na jīvittha na jīvati jīvissati.
tika-s0403t0:989_14: Paccuppanne cittakkhaṇe na jīvittha jīvati na jīvissati.
tika-s0403t0:996_2: Parittaṃ lahusanti ubhayaṃ panetaṃ appakassa vevacanaṃ.
tika-s0403t0:996_5: Idha pana āyuno adhippetattā rassanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:996_6: Mantāyanti karaṇatthe etaṃ bhummavacananti āha “mantāya boddhabbaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:996_10: Paññāya jānitabbanti jānitabbaṃ jīvitassa parittabhāvo bahudukkhādibhāvo.
tika-s0403t0:996_11: Jānitvā ca pana sabbapalibodhe chinditvā kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:996_14: appaṃ vā bhiyyo vassasatato upari appaṃ aññaṃ vassasataṃ appatvā vīsaṃ vā tiṃsaṃ vā cattālīsaṃ vā paṇṇāsaṃ vā saṭṭhi vā vassāni jīvati,
tika-s0403t0:996_16: “Asuko hi evaṃ ciraṃ jīvatī”ti tattha tattha gantvā daṭṭhabbo hoti.
tika-s0403t0:1001_2: Tatiye vinayalakkhaṇe patiṭṭhito lajjibhāvena vinayalakkhaṇe ṭhito hoti.
tika-s0403t0:1001_3: Alajjī hi bahussutopi samāno lābhagarukatāya tantiṃ visaṃvādetvā uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ dīpetvā sāsane mahantaṃ upaddavaṃ karoti,
tika-s0403t0:1001_5: Lajjī pana kukkuccako sikkhākāmo jīvitahetupi tantiṃ avisaṃvādetvā dhammameva vinayameva ca dīpeti,
tika-s0403t0:1001_8: so vinayaṃ ajahanto avokkamantova lajjibhāvena vinayalakkhaṇe ṭhito hoti patiṭṭhito.
tika-s0403t0:1002_0: Asaṃhīroti ettha saṃhīro nāma yo pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā heṭṭhā vā uparito vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno vitthunati vipphandati,
tika-s0403t0:1002_5: Yo pana pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā heṭṭhupariyavasena vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno na vitthunati na vipphandati,
tika-s0403t0:1002_6: ekekalomaṃ saṇḍāsena gaṇhanto viya “evaṃ mayaṃ vadāma,
tika-s0403t0:1002_8: Yamhi pāḷi ca pāḷivinicchayo ca suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ agacchanto tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0403t0:1002_10: Yasmā pana evarūpo yaṃ yaṃ parena vuccati,
tika-s0403t0:1002_12: attanā suvinicchinitaṃ katvā gahitaṃ aviparītamatthaṃ na vissajjeti,
tika-s0403t0:1005_3: Satiavippavāse ṭhitoti kammaṭṭhāne satiṃ avijahitvā ṭhito.
tika-s0403t0:1005_4: Pesitattoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya nibbānaṃ pesitacitto tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro.
tika-s0403t0:1008_5: Tasmā te tesaṃ samanavasena pavattantīti āha “adhikaraṇāni samentī”tiādi.
tika-s0403t0:1008_9: adhikaraṇesu tāva dhammoti vā adhammoti vā aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yo vivādo,
tika-s0403t0:1008_11: Sīlavipattiyā vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā vā anuvadantānaṃ yo anuvādo upavadanā ceva codanā ca,
tika-s0403t0:1008_16: Yaṃ saṅghassa apalokanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ karaṇaṃ,
tika-s0403t0:1009_0: Tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca.
tika-s0403t0:1009_1: Sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṃ yasmiṃ vihāre uppannaṃ tasmiṃyeva vā,
tika-s0403t0:1009_5: saṅghe vūpasametuṃ asakkonte tattheva ubbāhikāya sammatapuggalehi vā vinicchitaṃ sammati.
tika-s0403t0:1009_6: Evaṃ sammamāne ca panetasmiṃ yā saṅghasammukhato dhammasammukhato vinayasammukhatā puggalasammukhatā,
tika-s0403t0:1009_8: Tattha ca kārakasaṅghassa saṅghasāmaggivasena sammukhibhāvo saṅghasammukhatā.
tika-s0403t0:1010_1: atha naṃ ubbāhikāya sammatā bhikkhū “na mayaṃ sakkoma vūpasametu”nti saṅghasseva niyyātenti.
tika-s0403t0:1010_2: Tato saṅgho pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ salākaggāhāpakaṃ sammannati,
tika-s0403t0:1010_3: tena guḷhakavivaṭakasakaṇṇajappakesu tīsu salākaggāhakesu aññataravasena salākaṃ gāhāpetvā sannipatitāya
tika-s0403t0:1010_4: parisāya dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyatāya yathā te dhammavādino vadanti,
tika-s0403t0:1010_5: evaṃ vūpasantaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:1011_0: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catūhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
tika-s0403t0:1011_3: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā sace kāci āpatti natthi,
tika-s0403t0:1011_5: sace atthi ayaṃ nāmettha āpattīti evaṃ vinicchitaṃ vūpasammati.
tika-s0403t0:1012_0: Yadā pana khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsitassa sativinayaṃ yācamānassa saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena sativinayaṃ deti,
tika-s0403t0:1012_1: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:1012_2: Dinne pana sativinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci anuvādo na ruhati.
tika-s0403t0:1012_3: Yadā ummattako bhikkhu ummādavasena kate assāmaṇake ajjhācāre “saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpatti”nti bhikkhūhi codiyamāno “ummattakena me, āvuso,
tika-s0403t0:1012_5: nāhaṃ taṃ sarāmī”ti bhaṇantopi bhikkhūhi codiyamānova puna acodanatthāya amūḷhavinayaṃ yācati,
tika-s0403t0:1012_6: saṅgho cassa ñatticatutthena kammena amūḷhavinayaṃ deti.
tika-s0403t0:1012_7: Tadā sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
tika-s0403t0:1012_8: Dinne pana amūḷhavinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci tappaccayā anuvādo na ruhati.
tika-s0403t0:1012_9: Yadā pana pārājikena vā pārājikasāmantena vā codiyamānassa aññenaññaṃ paṭicarato pāpussannatāya pāpiyassa
tika-s0403t0:1012_13: ayamevassa nāsanā bhavissatī”ti maññamāno saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena tassapāpiyasikaṃ karoti,
tika-s0403t0:1012_14: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0403t0:1013_0: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
tika-s0403t0:1013_2: Yadā pana ekassa vā bhikkhuno santike saṅghagaṇamajjhesu vā bhikkhu lahukaṃ āpattiṃ deseti,
tika-s0403t0:1013_3: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca vūpasammati.
tika-s0403t0:1013_4: Tattha sammukhāvinaye tāva yo ca deseti,
tika-s0403t0:1014_0: Puggalassa ca gaṇassa ca desanākāle saṅghasammukhato parihāyati.
tika-s0403t0:1015_0: Dvepakkhajātā pana bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhācāraṃ caritvā puna lajjidhamme uppanne
tika-s0403t0:1015_2: siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya saṃvatteyyā”ti aññamaññaṃ āpattiyā kārāpane dosaṃ disvā yadā bhikkhū tiṇavatthārakakammaṃ karonti,
tika-s0403t0:1015_3: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati.
tika-s0403t0:1015_4: Tatra hi yattakā hatthapāsūpagatā “na metaṃ khamatī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ akatvā “dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamma”nti na ukkoṭenti,
tika-s0403t0:1015_6: sabbesaṃ ṭhapetvā thullavajjañca gihipaṭisaṃyuttañca sabbāpattiyo vuṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0403t0:1016_1: Iti imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni yathānurūpaṃ imehi sattahi samathehi sammanti.
